MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind.... I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before, I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they ... whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain. And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain. And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am continually with thee: thou hast holden me by my right hand. Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I am continually with thee: thou hast holden me by my right hand. Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sing unto the Lord a new song.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sing unto the Lord a new song, and his praise from the end of the earth, ye that go down to the sea, and all that is therein; the isles, and the inhabitants thereof.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sing aloud unto God our strength; make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob. Take a psalm, and bring hither the timbrel, the pleasant harp with the psaltery.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob. Take a psalm, and bring hither the timbrel, the pleasant harp with the psaltery.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The joy of the Lord is your strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Paul ... thanked God, and took courage.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And from thence, when the brethren heard of us, they came to meet us as far as Appii forum, and The three taverns: whom when Paul saw, he thanked God, and took courage.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light. Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying. But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt make an altar to burn incense upon: ... and thou shalt put it before the vail that is by the ark of the testimony, before the mercy seat that is over the testimony, where I will meet with thee. And Aaron shall burn thereon sweet incense every morning: . . . and when Aaron lighteth the lamps at even, he shall burn incense upon it, a perpetual incense before the LORD throughout your generations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt make an altar to burn incense upon: of shittim wood shalt thou make it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [Jesus] is able to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Pray without ceasing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Pray without ceasing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He led them forth by the right way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He found [Jacob] in a desert land, and in the waste howling wilderness; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye. As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: so the LORD alone did lead him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He found him in a desert land, and in the waste howling wilderness; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even to your old age I am he; and even to hoar hairs will I carry you: I have made, and I will bear; even I will carry, and will deliver you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And even to your old age I am he; and even to hoar hairs will I carry you: I have made, and I will bear; even I will carry, and will deliver you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD shall guide thee continually, and satisfy thy soul in drought, and make fat thy bones: and thou shalt be like a watered garden, and like a spring of water, whose waters fail not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord shall guide thee continually, and satisfy thy soul in drought, and make fat thy bones: and thou shalt be like a watered garden, and like a spring of water, whose waters fail not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who teacheth like him? Job 36:22
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee? ... Lord, that I may receive my sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying, What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee? And he said, Lord, that I may receive my sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name.... shall teach you all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory... give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him: the eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints, and what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the Lord your God giveth you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the Lord your God giveth you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is not your rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Within the veil; whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil; Whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus, made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself, that where I am, there ye may be also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: With Christ; which is far better.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain; for the former things are passed away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There the wicked cease from troubling: and there the weary be at rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven. For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O death, where is thy sting? O grave where is thy victory? I Cor 15:55
EVENING.verse_kjv: O death, where is thy sting? O grave, where is thy victory?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sting of death is sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sting of death is sin; and the strength of sin is the law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: But now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself. And as it is appointed unto men once to die, but after this the judgment: so Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shalt he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world: but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand. I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith: henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We which have believed do enter into rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we which have believed do enter into rest, as he said, As I have sworn in my wrath, if they shall enter into my rest: although the works were finished from the foundation of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They weary themselves to commit iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they will deceive every one his neighbour, and will not speak the truth: they have taught their tongue to speak lies, and weary themselves to commit iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members 0 wretched man that I am! who shall deliver me from the body of this death? Rom 7:23, 24
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ: by whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To whom he said, This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing: yet they would not hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Set a watch, O Lord, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Set a watch, O Lord, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, 0 Lord, who shall stand? Psa 130:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: If thou, Lord, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They provoked his spirit, so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because they provoked his spirit, so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man; but that which cometh out of the mouth, this defileth a man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man; but that which cometh out of the mouth, this defileth a man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A whisperer separateth chief friends.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A froward man soweth strife: and a whisperer separateth chief friends.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health. The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health. The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The tongue can no man tame; it is an unruly evil, full of deadly poison. Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing. My brethren, these things ought not so to be.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the tongue can no man tame; it is an unruly evil, full of deadly poison. Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing. My brethren, these things ought not so to be.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put off ... anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth. Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth. Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the will of God, even your sanctification.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In their mouth was found no guile.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us and establish thou the work of our hands.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord GOD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways. For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is every one that feareth the Lord; that walketh in his ways. For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus, and told him all things they had done.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus, and told him all things, both what they had done, and what they had taught.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is a friend that sticketh closer than a brother.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A man that hath friends must shew himself friendly: and there is a friend that sticketh closer than a brother.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD spake unto Moses face to face, as a man speaketh unto his friend.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord spake unto Moses face to face, as a man speaketh unto his friend. And he turned again into the camp: but his servant Joshua, the son of Nun, a young man, departed not out of the tabernacle.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you. Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you. Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The prayer of the upright is his delight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Think upon me, my God, for good.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Think upon me, my God, for good, according to all that I have done for this people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD; I remember thee, the kindness of thy youth, the love of thine espousals, when thou wentest after me in the wilderness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Go and cry in the ears of Jerusalem, saying, Thus saith the Lord; I remember thee, the kindness of thy youth, the love of thine espousals, when thou wentest after me in the wilderness, in a land that was not sown.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will visit you, and perform my good word toward you. For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord, That after seventy years be accomplished at Babylon I will visit you, and perform my good word toward you, in causing you to return to this place. For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the heavens are higher than the earth so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause: which doeth great things and unsearchable; marvellous things without number.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause: Which doeth great things and unsearchable; marvellous things without number:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them they are more than can be numbered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Many, O Lord my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There shall not any man be able to stand before thee all the days of thy life: as I was with Moses, so I will be with thee: I will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There failed not ought of any good thing which the LORD had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There failed not ought of any good thing which the Lord had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good? Num 23:19
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD thy God, he is God, the faithful God, which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Know therefore that the Lord thy God, he is God, the faithful God, which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him and keep his commandments to a thousand generations;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He will ever be mindful of his covenant.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee. Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee. Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The name of the Lord is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For the LORD loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints, they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the LORD to make you his people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the Lord to make you his people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They are without fault before the throne of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In those days, and in that time, saith the Lord, the iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made us accepted in the beloved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jehovah Nissi (The LORD my banner).
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Moses built an altar, and called the name of it Jehovah–nissi:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the LORD shall lift up a standard against him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So shall they fear the name of the Lord from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the Lord fulfil all thy petitions.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath brought forth our righteousness: come, and let us declare in Zion the work of the LORD our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath brought forth our righteousness: come, and let us declare in Zion the work of the Lord our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The captain of their salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Valiant for the truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they bend their tongues like their bow for lies: but they are not valiant for the truth upon the earth; for they proceed from evil to evil, and they know not me, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fight the LORD'S battles.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Saul said to David, Behold my elder daughter Merab, her will I give thee to wife: only be thou valiant for me, and fight the Lord's battles. For Saul said, Let not mine hand be upon him, but let the hand of the Philistines be upon him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong, all ye people of the land, saith the LORD, and work: ... fear ye not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet now be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the Lord; and be strong, O Joshua, son of Jehozadak, the high priest; and be strong, all ye people of the land, saith the Lord, and work: for I am with you, saith the Lord of hosts: According to the word that I covenanted with you when ye came out of Egypt, so my spirit remaineth among you: fear ye not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One thing is needful.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us. Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us. Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, 0 God. My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God. My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst. Lord, evermore give us this bread.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst. Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Mary . . . sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One thing have I desired of the LORD, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to enquire in his temple.
EVENING.verse_kjv: One thing have I desired of the Lord, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to enquire in his temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it; That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The peace of God ... passeth all understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth? II Chron 6:18
EVENING.verse_kjv: But will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth? behold, heaven and the heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house which I have built!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will meet with the children of Israel, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified by my glory. And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will be their God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there I will meet with the children of Israel, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified by my glory. And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will be their God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the Lord God might dwell among them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the Lord God might dwell among them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye ... are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heathen shall know that I the LORD do sanctify Israel, when my sanctuary shall be in the midst of them for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the heathen shall know that I the Lord do sanctify Israel, when my sanctuary shall be in the midst of them for evermore.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Zion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To us there is but one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom are all things, and we by him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But to us there is but one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom are all things, and we by him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands; and cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb. Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands; And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb. Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Their Redeemer is strong; the LORD of hosts is his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall thoroughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God. When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God. When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The only wise God our Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection? It is as high as heaven; what canst thou do? deeper than hell; what canst thou know? Job 11:7, 8
MORNING.verse_kjv: Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ: to the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known, by the church, the manifold wisdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shalt be given him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be in-treated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be entreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When shall I arise, and the night be gone? Job 7:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I lie down, I say, When shall I arise, and the night be gone? and I am full of tossings to and fro unto the dawning of the day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watchman, what of the night? The watchman said, The morning cometh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The burden of Dumah. He calleth to me out of Seir, Watchman, what of the night? Watchman, what of the night? The watchman said, The morning cometh, and also the night: if ye will enquire, enquire ye: return, come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds; as the tender grass springing out of the earth by clear shining after rain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I go to prepare a place for you And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself, that where I am, there ye may be also. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid. Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also. Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let all thine enemies perish, O LORD; but let them that love him be as the sun when he goeth forth in his might.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So let all thine enemies perish, O Lord: but let them that love him be as the sun when he goeth forth in his might. And the land had rest forty years.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be no night there.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee; he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Matt 8:26
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In quietness and in confidence shall be your strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord God, the Holy One of Israel; In returning and rest shall ye be saved; in quietness and in confidence shall be your strength: and ye would not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The effect of righteousness [shall be] quietness and assurance for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let not the sun go down upon your wrath.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother... Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times? Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother. Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times? Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put on, therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering; forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering; Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My Father is greater than I.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you. If ye loved me, ye would rejoice, because I said, I go unto the Father: for my Father is greater than I.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done, as in heaven, so in earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My Father, and your Father; my God and your God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father gave me commandment, even so I do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I and my Father are one.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I and my Father are one.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love. If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love. John 15:9-John 15:10.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love. If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [The woman's seed] shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His visage was so marred more than any man, and his form more than the sons of men.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As many were astonished at thee; his visage was so marred more than any man, and his form more than the sons of men:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is your hour, and the power of darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered, Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He cast out many devils; and suffered not the devils to speak, because they knew him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases, and cast out many devils; and suffered not the devils to speak, because they knew him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my name shall they cast out devils.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye ... be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God. Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth. For . . . your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, we are debtors, not to the flesh, to live after the flesh. For if ye live after the flesh, ye shall die: but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, brethren, we are debtors, not to the flesh, to live after the flesh. For if ye live after the flesh, ye shall die: but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The measure of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Him that is weak in the faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye, but not to doubtful disputations.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strong in faith, giving glory to God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O thou of little faith, wherefore didst thou doubt? Matt 14:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand, and caught him, and said unto him, O thou of little faith, wherefore didst thou doubt?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord.... According to your faith be it unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord. Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, increase our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Building up yourselves on your most holy faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which stablisheth us with you in Christ. . . . is God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace ... after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We ... that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not . . . judge one another: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father, that in him should all fulness dwell.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven, and things in earth, and things under the earth; and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For to this end Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fulness have all we received.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have. And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his bands and his feet.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have. And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that saw it bare record, and his record is true: and he knoweth that he saith truth, that ye might believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he that saw it bare record, and his record is true: and he knoweth that he saith true, that ye might believe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast in love to my soul delivered it from the pit of corruption.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, for peace I had great bitterness: but thou hast in love to my soul delivered it from the pit of corruption: for thou hast cast all my sins behind thy back.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me. O LORD, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me. O Lord, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the Lord: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I waited patiently for the LORD. He brought me up ... out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I waited patiently for the Lord; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry. He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The things which are.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now we see through a glass, darkly.
