EVENING.verse_kjv: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now we see not yet all things put under him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet. For in that he put all in subjection under him, he left nothing that is not put under him. But now we see not yet all things put under him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have ... a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ; how that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, it is the last time.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Him that was to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses, even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam's transgression, who is the figure of him that was to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus ... made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, . . . that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One died for all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As by one man's disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as by one man's disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit. That was not first which is spiritual, but that which is natural; and afterward that which is spiritual.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit. Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual, but that which is natural; and afterward that which is spiritual.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness. So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth. So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son.... the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast given him power over all flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The first man is of the earth, earthy: the second man is the Lord from heaven. As is the earthy, such are they also that are earthy: and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The first man is of the earth, earthy: the second man is the Lord from heaven. As is the earthy, such are they also that are earthy: and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Things which shall be hereafter.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit of truth ... will shew you things to come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him. For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven, with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him. For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Serving the Lord with all humility of mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Serving the Lord with all humility of mind, and with many tears, and temptations, which befell me by the lying in wait of the Jews:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister; and whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant: even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man.... not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our rejoicing is this.... that in simplicity and godly sincerity, not with fleshly wisdom, but by the grace of God, we have had our conversation in the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our rejoicing is this, the testimony of our conscience, that in simplicity and godly sincerity, not with fleshly wisdom, but by the grace of God, we have had our conversation in the world, and more abundantly to you-ward.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have turned every one to his own way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Noah ... planted a vineyard: and he drank of the wine, and was drunken.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Noah began to be an husbandman, and he planted a vineyard: And he drank of the wine, and was drunken; and he was uncovered within his tent.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Abram said unto Sarai his wife.... Say, I pray thee, thou art my sister: that it may be well with me for thy sake.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, when he was come near to enter into Egypt, that he said unto Sarai his wife, Behold now, I know that thou art a fair woman to look upon: Say, I pray thee, thou art my sister: that it may be well with me for thy sake; and my soul shall live because of thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Isaac said unto Jacob.... Art thou my very son Esau? And he said, I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Isaac said unto Jacob, Come near, I pray thee, that I may feel thee, my son, whether thou be my very son Esau or not. And he said, Art thou my very son Esau? And he said, I am.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Moses... spake unadvisedly with his lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They angered him also at the waters of strife, so that it went ill with Moses for their sakes: Because they provoked his spirit, so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The men took of their victuals, and asked not counsel at the mouth of the LORD. And Joshua made peace with them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the men took of their victuals, and asked not counsel at the mouth of the Lord. And Joshua made peace with them, and made a league with them, to let them live: and the princes of the congregation sware unto them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: David did that which was right in the eyes of the LORD, and turned not aside from any thing that he commanded him all the days of his life, save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because David did that which was right in the eyes of the Lord, and turned not aside from any thing that he commanded him all the days of his life, save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These all ... obtained a good report through faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And these all, having obtained a good report through faith, received not the promise:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not for your sakes do I this, saith the Lord GOD, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your own ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not for your sakes do I this, saith the Lord God, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your own ways, O house of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be called Wonderful.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come; and hath put all things under his feet.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He had a name written, that no man knew, but he himself... KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His eyes were as a flame of fire, and on his head were many crowns; and he had a name written, that no man knew, but he himself. And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND Lord OF LORDS.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out: he is excellent in power, and in judgment, and in plenty of justice: he will not afflict.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What is his name, and what is his son's name, if thou canst tell? Prov 30:4
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who hath ascended up into heaven, or descended? who hath gathered the wind in his fists? who hath bound the waters in a garment? who hath established all the ends of the earth? what is his name, and what is his son's name, if thou canst tell?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord's portion is his people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord's portion is his people; Jacob is the lot of his inheritance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am my beloved's, and his desire is toward me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am my beloved's, and his desire is toward me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am his.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My beloved is mine, and I am his: he feedeth among the lilies.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God ... loved me, and gave himself for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are not your own, ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of Egypt, to be unto him a people of inheritance, as ye are this day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Lord hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of Egypt, to be unto him a people of inheritance, as ye are this day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A spiritual house, an holy priesthood.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall be mine, saith the LORD of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they shall be mine, saith the Lord of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels; and I will spare them, as a man spareth his own son that serveth him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The glory of his inheritance in the saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is like a refiner's fire, and like fullers' soap: and he shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the LORD an offering in righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But who may abide the day of his coming? and who shall stand when he appeareth? for he is like a refiner's fire, and like fullers' soap: And he shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the Lord an offering in righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations: knowing that tribulation worketh patience; and patience, experience; and experience, hope: and hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye endure chastening, God dealeth with you as with sons; for what son is he whom the Father chasteneth not? But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons. Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby. Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down, and the feeble knees.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye endure chastening, God dealeth with you as with sons; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not? But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons. Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now we call the proud happy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now we call the proud happy; yea, they that work wickedness are set up; yea, they that tempt God are even delivered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Better it is to be of an humble spirit with the lowly, than to divide the spoil with the proud.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Better it is to be of an humble spirit with the lowly, than to divide the spoil with the proud.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These six things doth the LORD hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him: a proud look...
EVENING.verse_kjv: These six things doth the Lord hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him: A proud look, a lying tongue, and hands that shed innocent blood,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the Lord: though hand join in hand, he shall not be unpunished.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ. I thank my God upon every remembrance of you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ. I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O Lord, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance, and of my cup.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He leadeth me in the paths of righteousness, for his name's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast holden me by my right hand. Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory. Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee. My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I am continually with thee: thou hast holden me by my right hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul Psa 94:19
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
EVENING.verse_kjv: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD I am oppressed; undertake for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like a crane or a swallow, so did I chatter: I did mourn as a dove: mine eyes fail with looking upward: O Lord, I am oppressed; undertake for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am but a little child: I know not how to go out or come in.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now, O Lord my God, thou hast made thy servant king instead of David my father: and I am but a little child: I know not how to go out or come in.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God.... and it shall be given him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is sufficient for these things? II Cor 2:16
EVENING.verse_kjv: To the one we are the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who is sufficient for these things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For l know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.... Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee. But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; ... when I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hope maketh not ashamed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD: ... they shall not be ashamed that wait for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And kings shall be thy nursing fathers, and their queens thy nursing mothers: they shall bow down to thee with their face toward the earth, and lick up the dust of thy feet; and thou shalt know that I am the Lord: for they shall not be ashamed that wait for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the LORD, and whose hope the LORD is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee. Trust ye in the LORD for ever: for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee. Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him. He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him. He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am not ashamed, for I know whom I have believed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: that by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us; which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil; whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The offence of the cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will come after me, let him deny himself; and take up his cross, and follow me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As it is written, Behold, I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence: and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner, and a stone of stumbling, and a rock of offence.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner, And a stone of stumbling, and a rock of offence, even to them which stumble at the word, being disobedient: whereunto also they were appointed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am crucified with Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we suffer, we shall also reign with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If we suffer, we shall also reign with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is at hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your moderation be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain, shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly; Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abstain from all appearance of evil. And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts; for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The choice vine.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Binding his foal unto the vine, and his ass's colt unto the choice vine; he washed his garments in wine, and his clothes in the blood of grapes:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My well beloved hath a vineyard in a very fruitful hill: and he fenced it, and gathered out the stones thereof, and planted it with the choicest vine, . . and he looked that it should bring forth grapes, and it brought forth wild grapes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now will I sing to my wellbeloved a song of my beloved touching his vineyard. My wellbeloved hath a vineyard in a very fruitful hill: And he fenced it, and gathered out the stones thereof, and planted it with the choicest vine, and built a tower in the midst of it, and also made a winepress therein: and he looked that it should bring forth grapes, and it brought forth wild grapes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yet I had planted thee a noble vine, wholly a right seed: how then art thou turned into the degenerate plant of a strange vine unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yet I had planted thee a noble vine, wholly a right seed: how then art thou turned into the degenerate plant of a strange vine unto me?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness.... envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like:... but the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman. Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit. Abide in me, and I in you.... Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit: so shall ye be my disciples.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ, and be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ, And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus... lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, Holy Father... O righteous Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are. O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He said, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellow citizens with the saints, and of the household of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Doubtless thou art our father... thou, O LORD, art our father, our redeemer; thy name is from everlasting.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Doubtless thou art our father, though Abraham be ignorant of us, and Israel acknowledge us not: thou, O Lord, art our father, our redeemer; thy name is from everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will arise and go to my father, and will say unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and before thee, and am no more worthy to be called thy son: make me as one of thy hired servants. And he arose, and came to his father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will arise and go to my father, and will say unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and before thee,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us go forth unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach. For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach. For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: but rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As ye are partakers of the sufferings, so shall ye be also of the consolation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And our hope of you is stedfast, knowing, that as ye are partakers of the sufferings, so shall ye be also of the consolation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the Spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season; esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt: for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season; Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt: for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Jesus Christ ... shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it. And I saw as the colour of amber, as the appearance of fire round about within it, from the appearance of his loins even upward, and from the appearance of his loins even downward, I saw as it were the appearance of fire, and it had brightness round about. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And above the firmament that was over their heads was the likeness of a throne, as the appearance of a sapphire stone: and upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face, beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him for we shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins and in him is no sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son,. . who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Pass the time of your sojourning here in fear: forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold; ... but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot: who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: and that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For I have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth, saith the Lord GOD: wherefore turn yourselves, and live ye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth, saith the Lord God: wherefore turn yourselves, and live ye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloke for their sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That servant, which knew his lord's will, and prepared not himself, neither did according to his will, shall be beaten with many stripes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that servant, which knew his lord's will, and prepared not himself, neither did according to his will, shall be beaten with many stripes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life, through Jesus Christ our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life: but the wrath of God abideth on him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness? Rom 6:16
EVENING.verse_kjv: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As thy days, so shall thy strength be.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy shoes shall be iron and brass; and as thy days, so shall thy strength be.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth power to the faint: and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O my soul, thou hast trodden down strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The river of Kishon swept them away, that ancient river, the river Kishon. O my soul, thou hast trodden down strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Awake, O north wind, and ... blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O north wind; and come, thou south; blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out. Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In measure, when it shooteth forth, thou wilt debate with it: he stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day. For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory; while we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though [Jesus] were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou God seest me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And she called the name of the Lord that spake unto her, Thou God seest me: for she said, Have I also here looked after him that seeth me?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, thou hast searched me, and known me. Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off. Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways. For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O LORD, thou knowest it altogether... Such knowledge is too wonderful for me: it is high, I cannot attain unto it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The eyes of the Lord are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The ways of man are before the eyes of the LORD, and he pondereth all his goings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the ways of man are before the eyes of the Lord, and he pondereth all his goings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God knoweth your hearts: for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Ye are they which justify yourselves before men; but God knoweth your hearts: for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of the LORD run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him. Herein thou hast done foolishly: therefore from henceforth thou shalt have wars.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus ... knew all men, and needed not that any should testify of man; for he knew what was in man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men, And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He saith unto him the third time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High: to shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the Lord, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let every thing that hath breath praise the Lord. Praise ye the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you.... brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice,. holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus, . .. that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate. By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate. By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said to them all, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath, he cannot be my disciple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So likewise, whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath, he cannot be my disciple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us therefore cast off the works of darkness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible. I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air: but I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible. But I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before, I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before, I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have had fathers of our flesh, which corrected us; and we gave them reverence: shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits, and live? For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure; but he for our profit, that we might be partakers of his holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us, and we gave them reverence: shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits, and live? For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure; but he for our profit, that we might be partakers of his holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word. It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word. It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before you; ... those which ye let remain of them shall be pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and shall vex you in the land wherein ye dwell.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if ye will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before you; then it shall come to pass, that those which ye let remain of them shall be pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and shall vex you in the land wherein ye dwell.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fight the good fight of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds; casting down imaginations.... and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds;) Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, we are debtors, not to the flesh, to live after the flesh. For if ye live after the flesh, ye shall die; but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, brethren, we are debtors, not to the flesh, to live after the flesh. For if ye live after the flesh, ye shall die: but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If a man sin against the Lord, who shall intreat for him? I Sam 2:25
EVENING.verse_kjv: If one man sin against another, the judge shall judge him: but if a man sin against the Lord, who shall entreat for him? Notwithstanding they hearkened not unto the voice of their father, because the Lord would slay them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous: and he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for our's only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God; to declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God; To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea, rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us? Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We walk by faith, not by sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We love him, because he first loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom ye trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen? I John 4:20
MORNING.verse_kjv: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Our Righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In his days Judah shall be saved, and Israel shall dwell safely: and this is his name whereby he shall be called, THE Lord OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will go in the strength of the Lord God: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will greatly rejoice in the LORD, my soul shall be joyful in my God: for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the father said to his servants, Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him; and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord ... that I may win Christ, and be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith. Phil 3:8-Phil 3:9 var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ, And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that thou wouldest keep me from evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Two things have I required of thee; deny me them not before I die: remove far from me vanity and lies: give me neither poverty nor riches; feed me with food convenient for me: lest I be full, and deny thee, and say, Who is the LORD? or lest I be poor, and steal, and take the name of my God in vain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Two things have I required of thee; deny me them not before I die:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will deliver thee out of the hand of the wicked, and I will redeem thee out of the hand of the terrible.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will deliver thee out of the hand of the wicked, and I will redeem thee out of the hand of the terrible.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.
