MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations, and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One star differeth from another star in glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the way they had disputed among themselves, who should be the greatest. And he sat down, and called the twelve, and saith unto them, If any man desire to be first, the same shall be last of all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But they held their peace: for by the way they had disputed among themselves, who should be the greatest. And he sat down, and called the twelve, and saith unto them, If any man desire to be first, the same shall be last of all, and servant of all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble. Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble. Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus: who ... made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men. Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever. Dan 12:3 var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong, and work; for I am with you, saith the Lord of hosts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet now be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the Lord; and be strong, O Joshua, son of Jehozadak, the high priest; and be strong, all ye people of the land, saith the Lord, and work: for I am with you, saith the Lord of hosts:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the vine, ye are the branches: he that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The joy of the Lord is your strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Let your hands be strong, ye that hear in these days these words by the mouth of the prophets.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; Let your hands be strong, ye that hear in these days these words by the mouth of the prophets, which were in the day that the foundation of the house of the Lord of hosts was laid, that the temple might be built.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD looked upon him, and said, Go in this thy might.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord looked upon him, and said, Go in this thy might, and thou shalt save Israel from the hand of the Midianites: have not I sent thee?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
MORNING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore seeing we have this ministry, as we have received mercy, we faint not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore seeing we have this ministry, as we have received mercy, we faint not;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The darkness hideth not from thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His eyes are upon the ways of man, and he seeth all his goings. There is no darkness, nor shadow of death, where the workers of iniquity may hide themselves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For his eyes are upon the ways of man, and he seeth all his goings. There is no darkness, nor shadow of death, where the workers of iniquity may hide themselves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? ... Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? saith the Lord. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; ... nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness.... Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation; there shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day; Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday. Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that keepeth thee will not slumber. The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand. The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night. The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord hath said unto you, Ye shall henceforth return no more that way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he shall not multiply horses to himself, nor cause the people to return to Egypt, to the end that he should multiply horses: forasmuch as the Lord hath said unto you, Ye shall henceforth return no more that way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Truly if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out, they might have had opportunity to have returned. But now they desire a better country, that is a heavenly. Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season; esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And truly, if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out, they might have had opportunity to have returned. But now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city. Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition, but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto him, No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you, will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I was but a little displeased, and they helped forward the affliction.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I am very sore displeased with the heathen that are at ease: for I was but a little displeased, and they helped forward the affliction.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Comfort the feeble-minded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not . . . judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We . . . that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Charity ... rejoiceth not in iniquity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up, Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall. I Cor 10:12 var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: She took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If by one man's offence death reigned by one; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one, Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For if by one man's offence death reigned by one; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one, Jesus Christ.)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Since by man came death, by man came also the resurrection of the dead. For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For since by man came death, by man came also the resurrection of the dead. For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Saviour Jesus Christ.... hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life. For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The judgment seat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shalt he sit upon the throne of his glory: and before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea, rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are chastened of the Lord, that we should not be condemned with the world. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where sin abounded, grace did much more abound.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Moreover the law entered, that the offence might abound. But where sin abounded, grace did much more abound:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus. For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: not of works, lest any man should boast.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus. Not of works, lest any man should boast.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: According to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am ... the bright and morning Star.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall come a star out of Jacob.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I shall see him, but not now: I shall behold him, but not nigh: there shall come a Star out of Jacob, and a Sceptre shall rise out of Israel, and shall smite the corners of Moab, and destroy all the children of Sheth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Until the day break, and the shadows flee away, turn, my beloved, and be thou like a roe or a young hart upon the mountains of Bether.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Until the day break, and the shadows flee away, turn, my beloved, and be thou like a roe or a young hart upon the mountains of Bether.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watchman, what of the night? The watchman said, The morning cometh, and also the night: if ye will enquire, enquire ye: return, come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The burden of Dumah. He calleth to me out of Seir, Watchman, what of the night? Watchman, what of the night? The watchman said, The morning cometh, and also the night: if ye will enquire, enquire ye: return, come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the light of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will give him the morning star.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will give him the morning star.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is. For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch. Watch ye therefore: ... lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping. And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch. MORNING.verse_kjv: When thou hast eaten and art full, then thou shalt bless the Lord thy God for the good land which he hath given thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beware that thou forget not the LORD thy God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beware that thou forget not the Lord thy God, in not keeping his commandments, and his judgments, and his statutes, which I command thee this day:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving: for it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that eateth, eateth to the Lord, for he giveth God thanks.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that regardeth the day, regardeth it unto the Lord; and he that regardeth not the day, to the Lord he doth not regard it. He that eateth, eateth to the Lord, for he giveth God thanks; and he that eateth not, to the Lord he eateth not, and giveth God thanks.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blessing of the LORD, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name. Bless the LORD, O my soul.... who forgiveth all thine iniquities; ... who crowneth thee with loving-kindness and tender mercies.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus ... was moved with compassion toward them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and today, and forever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who can have compassion on the ignorant, and on them that are out of the way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who can have compassion on the ignorant, and on them that are out of the way; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour? Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour? Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

MORNING.verse_kjv: He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.

MORNING.verse_kjv: But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory:

MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt call thy walls Salvation, and thy gates Praise.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Violence shall no more be heard in thy land, wasting nor destruction within thy borders; but thou shalt call thy walls Salvation, and thy gates Praise.

EVENING.verse_kjv: And the wall of the city had twelve foundations, and in them the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God; and are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord: in whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious. To whom coming, as unto a living stone, disallowed indeed of men, but chosen of God, and precious, ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Zion. MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the Lord shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.

EVENING.verse_kjv: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.

EVENING.verse_kjv: The dead praise not the Lord, neither any that go down into silence.

EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

MORNING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, that, while they communed together and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My fellow-labourers, whose names are in the book of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I entreat thee also, true yokefellow, help those women which laboured with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and with other my fellowlabourers, whose names are in the book of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Exhort one another daily, while it is called to day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment. For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I say unto you, That every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment. For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, it is written before me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, it is written before me: I will not keep silence, but will recompense, even recompense into their bosom,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The trees of the Lord are full of sap.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The trees of the Lord are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon. His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the LORD, and whose hope the LORD is. For he shall be as a tree planted by the waters, and that spreadeth out her roots by the river, and shall not see when heat cometh, but her leaf shall be green; and shall not be careful in the year of drought, neither shall cease from yielding fruit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I the LORD have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all the trees of the field shall know that I the Lord have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish: I the Lord have spoken and have done it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon. Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God. They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will come again, and receive you unto myself John 14:3
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe ... in that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the LORD, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the Lord, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.... No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth. No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

EVENING.verse_kjv: My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou saidst, Seek ye my face: my heart said unto thee, Thy face, LORD, will I seek.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, Lord, will I seek.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore.

MORNING.verse_kjv: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?

MORNING.verse_kjv: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.

MORNING.verse_kjv: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God. For we also are weak in him, but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word hath quickened me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

EVENING.verse_kjv: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father hath life in himself, so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In him was life; and the life was the light of men.... As many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name: which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In him was life; and the life was the light of men. But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name: Which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.

MORNING.verse_kjv: Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil. For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is well pleased for his righteousness'sake; he will magnify the law, and make it honourable.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is well pleased for his righteousness' sake; he will magnify the law, and make it honourable.

MORNING.verse_kjv: For what the law could not do, in that it was weak through the flesh, God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh, and for sin, condemned sin in the flesh: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.

EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.

EVENING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Emmanuel ... God with us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The name of the Lord is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.... Mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee. For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O wretched man that I am! who shall deliver me from the body of this death? Rom 7:24
EVENING.verse_kjv: O wretched man that I am! who shall deliver me from the body of this death?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now. And not only they, but ourselves.... which have the first-fruits of the Spirit.... groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shortly I must put off this my tabernacle.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality. So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory. I Cor 15:53-I Cor 15:54var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality. So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The whole bullock shall he carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Even the whole bullock shall he carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out shall he be burnt.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They took Jesus, and led him away. And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha: where they crucified him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified. And they took Jesus, and led him away. Where they crucified him, and two other with him, on either side one, and Jesus in the midst.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp. Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate. Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fellowship of his sufferings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings: that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God created man in his own image.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God, we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold, or silver, or stone, graven by art and man's device.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God, we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold, or silver, or stone, graven by art and man's device.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ. We are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;) For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall be satisfied, when I awake with thy likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ. Rom 8:17var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art my hope in the day of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not a terror unto me: thou art my hope in the day of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved. Thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled. I cried to thee, O LORD: and unto the LORD I made supplication. What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth? Hear, 0 LORD, and have mercy upon me: LORD, be thou my helper.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee. In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the LORD thy Redeemer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee. In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the Lord thy Redeemer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sorrow shall be turned into joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Adam.. begat a son in his own likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who can bring a clean thing out of an unclean? Job 14:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who can bring a clean thing out of an unclean? not one.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Dead in trespasses and sins; ... by nature the children of wrath, even as others.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins; Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am carnal, sold under sin. That which I do I allow not; for what I would, that do I not; but what I hate, that do I. I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we know that the law is spiritual: but I am carnal, sold under sin. For that which I do I allow not: for what I would, that do I not; but what I hate, that do I. For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By one man sin entered into the world.... by one man's disobedience many were made sinners.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, as by one man sin entered into the world, and death by sin; and so death passed upon all men, for that all have sinned: For as by one man's disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If through the offence of one many be dead, much more the grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But not as the offence, so also is the free gift. For if through the offence of one many be dead, much more the grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ. I Cor 15:57var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord giveth wisdom; out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise. That no flesh should glory in his presence.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty; That no flesh should glory in his presence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word have I hid in my heart, that I might not sin against thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Never man spake like this man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The year of my redeemed is come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the day of vengeance is in mine heart, and the year of my redeemed is come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall hallow the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof: it shall be a jubilee unto you; and ye shall return every man unto his possession.... and unto his family.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye shall hallow the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof: it shall be a jubilee unto you; and ye shall return every man unto his possession, and ye shall return every man unto his family.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Their Redeemer is strong; the LORD of hosts is his name. Jer 50:34var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall thoroughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus ... said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God, according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God, According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The day of temptation in the wilderness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man: but every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed. Then when lust hath conceived, it bringeth forth sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They lusted exceedingly in the wilderness, and tempted God in the desert.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But lusted exceedingly in the wilderness, and tempted God in the desert.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost ... was led by the Spirit into the wilderness, being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered. And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Simon, Simon, . . . Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: but I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not. Luke 22:31-Luke 22:32var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the Lord which sanctify you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the Lord which sanctify you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD your God, which have separated you from other people. And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the LORD am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I have said unto you, Ye shall inherit their land, and I will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: I am the Lord your God, which have separated you from other people. And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the Lord am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctified by God the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jude, the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ, and called:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus ... that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Saviour Jesus Christ . . . gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ; Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience, and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy. He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy. He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which thou sowest, thou sowest not that body that shall be.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that which thou sowest, thou sowest not that body that shall be, but bare grain, it may chance of wheat, or of some other grain:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead. Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations: that the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
MORNING.verse_kjv: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye. Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee. Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the LORD, mercy shall compass him about. Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid: yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There arose a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that it was now full. And he was in the hinder part of the ship, asleep on a pillow.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there arose a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that it was now full. And he was in the hinder part of the ship, asleep on a pillow: and they awake him, and say unto him, Master, carest thou not that we perish?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth his beloved sleep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They stoned Stephen, calling upon God, and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit. And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they stoned Stephen, calling upon God, and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit. And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.

MORNING.verse_kjv: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour.

EVENING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

EVENING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_kjv: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree:

MORNING.verse_kjv: The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry. The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

EVENING.verse_kjv: I know, O Lord, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Righteous art thou, O Lord, when I plead with thee: yet let me talk with thee of thy judgments: Wherefore doth the way of the wicked prosper? wherefore are all they happy that deal very treacherously?

EVENING.verse_kjv: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.

EVENING.verse_kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We declare unto you glad tidings, how that the promise which was made unto the fathers, God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children, in that he hath raised up Jesus again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And we declare unto you glad tidings, how that the promise which was made unto the fathers, God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children, in that he hath raised up Jesus again; as it is also written in the second psalm, Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and today, and for ever. EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Reckon ye yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I through the law am dead to the law, that I might live unto God. I am crucified with Christ; nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I through the law am dead to the law, that I might live unto God. I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because I live, ye shall live also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I give unto them eternal life: and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand. My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand. I and my Father are one.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: if ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God ... For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God. For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God ... giveth ... liberally, and upbraideth not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee? She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee? She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many... The free gift is of many offences unto justification.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But not as the offence, so also is the free gift. For if through the offence of one many be dead, much more the grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many. And not as it was by one that sinned, so is the gift: for the judgment was by one to condemnation, but the free gift is of many offences unto justification.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;) and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus: that in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

MORNING.verse_kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ, and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation; to wit, that God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself; not imputing their trespasses unto them; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation.
