MORNING.verse_kjv: And all things are of God, who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ, and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is love. In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins. Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit of man is the candle of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The spirit of man is the candle of the Lord, searching all the inward parts of the belly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is without sin among you, let him first cast a stone at her... And they which heard it, being convicted by their own conscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, even unto the last.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So when they continued asking him, he lifted up himself, and said unto them, He that is without sin among you, let him first cast a stone at her. EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who told thee that thou wast naked? Hast thou eaten of the tree, whereof I commanded thee that thou shouldest not eat? Gen 3:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Who told thee that thou wast naked? Hast thou eaten of the tree, whereof I commanded thee that thou shouldest not eat?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things. Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things. Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All things indeed are pure; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence. Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For meat destroy not the work of God. All things indeed are pure; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence. Hast thou faith? have it to thyself before God. Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Boast not thyself of tomorrow; for thou knowest not what a day may bring forth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Boast not thyself of to morrow; for thou knowest not what a day may bring forth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth. While ye have light, believe in the light, that ye may be the children of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth. While ye have light, believe in the light, that ye may be the children of light. These things spake Jesus, and departed, and did hide himself from them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.

Thou fool, this night thy soul shall be required of thee: then whose shall those things be, which thou hast provided? So is he that layeth up treasure for himself, and is not rich toward God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will say to my soul, Soul, thou hast much goods laid up for many years; take thine ease, eat, drink, and be merry.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The world passeth away, and the lust thereof. but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD, I change not; therefore ye sons of Jacob are not consumed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am the Lord, I change not; therefore ye sons of Jacob are not consumed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The gifts and calling of God are without repentance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is not a man, that he should lie: neither the son of man, that he should repent.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is of the LORD'S mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is of the Lord's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But this man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is love: and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

MORNING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

MORNING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.

MORNING.verse_kjv: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

MORNING.verse_kjv: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

EVENING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me? Psa 118:6
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.

EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident.

EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.

EVENING.verse_kjv: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing? He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the LORD shall have them in derision.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing? He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord shall have them in derision.

EVENING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence. For wherein shall it be known here that I and thy people have found grace in thy sight? is it not in that thou goest with us? so shall we be separated, I and thy people, from all the people that are upon the face of the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt have treasure in heaven.... come and follow me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am ... thy exceeding great reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: After these things the word of the Lord came unto Abram in a vision, saying, Fear not, Abram: I am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall reign for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The crown of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A crown of righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: An incorruptible crown.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us. Rom 8:18var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal: but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal: for where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We walk by faith, not by sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day. For our light affliction which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory: while we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: An inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He bowed his shoulder to bear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he saw that rest was good, and the land that it was pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant unto tribute.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take, my brethren, the prophets, who have spoken in the name of the Lord, for an example of suffering affliction, and of patience.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Take, my brethren, the prophets, who have spoken in the name of the Lord, for an example of suffering affliction, and of patience.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples: and they are written for our admonition, upon whom the ends of the world are come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples: and they are written for our admonition, upon whom the ends of the world are come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shall we receive good at the hand of God, and shall we not receive evil? in all this did not Job sin with his lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he said unto her, Thou speakest as one of the foolish women speaketh. What? shall we receive good at the hand of God, and shall we not receive evil? In all this did not Job sin with his lips.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Aaron held his peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Moses said unto Aaron, This is it that the Lord spake, saying, I will be sanctified in them that come nigh me, and before all the people I will be glorified. And Aaron held his peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is the LORD; let him do what seemeth him good.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the Lord: let him do what seemeth him good.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light. Matt 11:28-30var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O Lord, I am oppressed; undertake for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Like a crane or a swallow, so did I chatter: I did mourn as a dove: mine eyes fail with looking upward: O Lord, I am oppressed; undertake for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer. From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I. For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy. I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fight the good fight of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We were troubled on every side; without were fightings, within were fears.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For, when we were come into Macedonia, our flesh had no rest, but we were troubled on every side; without were fightings, within were fears.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not: for they that be with us are more than they that be with them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he answered, Fear not: for they that be with us are more than they that be with them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the LORD of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the Lord of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is my strength and power: ... he teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect. He teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our sufficiency is of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the mountain was full of horses and chariots of fire round about Elisha.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Elisha prayed, and said, Lord, I pray thee, open his eyes, that he may see. And the Lord opened the eyes of the young man; and he saw: and, behold, the mountain was full of horses and chariots of fire round about Elisha.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The time would fail me to tell of [those] who through faith subdued kingdoms.... out of weakness were made strong, waxed valiant in fight, turned to flight the armies of the aliens. Heb 11:32-34var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And what shall I more say? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon, and of Barak, and of Samson, and of Jephthae; of David also, and Samuel, and of the prophets:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He preserveth the way of his saints.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He keepeth the paths of judgment, and preserveth the way of his saints.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD your God ... went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet in this thing ye did not believe the Lord your God, Who went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: so the LORD alone did lead him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: So the Lord alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For the LORD knoweth the way of the righteous; but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: With us is the LORD our God to help us, and to fight our battles.
MORNING.verse_kjv: With him is an arm of flesh; but with us is the Lord our God to help us, and to fight our battles. And the people rested themselves upon the words of Hezekiah king of Judah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me? Matt 27:46
EVENING.verse_kjv: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani? that is to say, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; ... the LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.... For the transgression of my people was he stricken.... It pleased the Lord to bruise him; he hath put him to grief.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed. All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all. He was taken from prison and from judgment: and who shall declare his generation? for he was cut off out of the land of the living: for the transgression of my people was he stricken.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus our Lord ... was delivered for our offences.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But for us also, to whom it shall be imputed, if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead; Who was delivered for our offences, and was raised again for our justification.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh, but quickened by the Spirit:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us. MORNING.verse_kjv: For thy Maker is thine husband; the Lord of hosts is his name; and thy Redeemer the Holy One of Israel; The God of the whole earth shall he be called.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken but thou shalt be called Hephzi-bah.... for the LORD delighteth in thee. And as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi–bah, and thy land Beulah: for the Lord delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married. For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath sent me ... to comfort all that mourn; to appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Spirit of the Lord God is upon me; because the Lord hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will greatly rejoice in the LORD, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation.... as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will betroth thee unto me for ever; yea, I will betroth thee unto me in righteousness, and in judgment, and in lovingkindness, and in mercies.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will betroth thee unto me for ever; yea, I will betroth thee unto me in righteousness, and in judgment, and in lovingkindness, and in mercies.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? Rom 8:35
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My times are in thy hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All his saints are in thy hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, he loved the people; all his saints are in thy hand: and they sat down at thy feet; every one shall receive of thy words.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The word of the LORD came unto [Elijah], saying, Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward, and hide thyself by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan. And it shall be, that thou shalt drink of the brook; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there. And the word of the LORD came unto him, saying, Arise, get thee to Zarephath, which belongeth to Zidon, and dwell there: behold, I have commanded a widow woman there to sustain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you. EVENING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
