MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, for peace I had great bitterness: but thou hast in love to my soul delivered it from the pit of corruption: for thou hast cast all my sins behind thy back.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion Upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee. In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the LORD thy Redeemer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee. In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the Lord thy Redeemer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they shall teach no more every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the Lord: for they shall all know me, from the least of them unto the greatest of them, saith the Lord: for I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. Blessed is the man unto whom the Lord imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able to succour them that are tempted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able ... to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able to keep you from failing, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Believe ye that I am able to do this? ... Yea, Lord. According to your faith be it unto you. Matt 9:28-Matt 9:29var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord. Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The living God giveth us richly all things to enjoy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beware that thou forget not the LORD thy God, in not keeping his commandments, and his judgments, and his statutes, which I command thee this day: lest when thou hast eaten and art full, and hast built goodly houses, and dwelt therein; ... then thine heart be lifted up, and thou forget the LORD thy God: ... for it is he that giveth thee power to get wealth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beware that thou forget not the Lord thy God, in not keeping his commandments, and his judgments, and his statutes, which I command thee this day: Lest when thou hast eaten and art full, and hast built goodly houses, and dwelt therein; But thou shalt remember the Lord thy God: for it is he that giveth thee power to get wealth, that he may establish his covenant which he sware unto thy fathers, as it is this day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain. It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Except the Lord build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the Lord keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain. It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They sung as it were a new song.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they sung as it were a new song before the throne, and before the four beasts, and the elders: and no man could learn that song but the hundred and forty and four thousand, which were redeemed from the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God; not of works, lest any man should boast.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not unto us, O Lord, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, and hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, ... cried.... saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb. Rev 7:9-Rev 7:10var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands; And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord will provide.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Abraham called the name of that place Jehovah–jireh: as it is said to this day, In the mount of the Lord it shall be seen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Abraham said, My son, God will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering: so they went both of them together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the LORD'S hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, the Lord's hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And so all Israel shall be saved: as it is written, There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy; to deliver their soul from death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, the eye of the Lord is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy; To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need, according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath said, I will never leave thee nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is my strength and my shield, my heart trusteth in him, and I am helped, therefore, my heart greatly rejoiceth, and with my song will I praise him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He feedeth among the lilies.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My beloved is mine, and I am his: he feedeth among the lilies.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits. I am come into my garden, my sister, my spouse: I have gathered my myrrh with my spice; I have eaten my honeycomb with my honey.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O north wind; and come, thou south; blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out. Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God. Phil 1:11var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord bless thee, and keep thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord bless thee, and keep thee:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blessing of the LORD, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou, LORD, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou, Lord, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber. Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep. The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand. The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul. The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber. The Lord is thy keeper: the Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand. The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I the LORD do keep it; I will water it every moment: lest any hurt it, I will keep it night and day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I the Lord do keep it; I will water it every moment: lest any hurt it, I will keep it night and day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me. While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are. While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus wept.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus wept.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For it became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I was not rebellious, neither turned away back. I gave my back to the smiters, and my cheeks to them that plucked off the hair: I hid not my face from shame and spitting.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord God hath opened mine ear, and I was not rebellious, neither turned away back. I gave my back to the smiters, and my cheeks to them that plucked off the hair: I hid not my face from shame and spitting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold how he loved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said the Jews, Behold how he loved him!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham. In all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people. Heb 2:16-Heb 2:17var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham. Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord make his face shine upon thee, and be gracious unto thee. The Lord lift up his countenance upon thee, and give the peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord make his face shine upon thee, and be gracious unto thee: The Lord lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of God the Father, he hath declared him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies sake. Let me not be ashamed, O LORD; for I have called upon thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies' sake. Let me not be ashamed, O Lord; for I have called upon thee: let the wicked be ashamed, and let them be silent in the grave.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: they shall walk, O Lord in the light of thy countenance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: they shall walk, O Lord, in the light of thy countenance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord will give strength unto his people; the Lord will bless his people with peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Things that are pleasing in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD taketh pleasure in his people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully. If, when ye do well, and suffer for it, ye take it patiently, this is acceptable with God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully. For what glory is it, if, when ye be buffeted for your faults, ye shall take it patiently? but if, when ye do well, and suffer for it, ye take it patiently, this is acceptable with God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The ornament of a meek and quiet spirit.... is in the sight of God of great price.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving. This also shall please the LORD better than an ox or bullock that hath horns and hoofs.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving. This also shall please the Lord better than an ox or bullock that hath horns and hoofs.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you.... brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. Rom 12:1var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth: for I am God, and there is none else.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth: for I am God, and there is none else.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In Christ Jesus, ye who sometime were far off, are made nigh by the blood of Christ. For he is our peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ. For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us. And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament, that by means of death, for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament, they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us. And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament, that by means of death, for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament, they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O my God, my soul is cast down within me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O my God, my soul is cast down within me: therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan, and of the Hermonites, from the hill Mizar.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee. Trust ye in the LORD for ever: for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee. Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted; neither hath he hid his face from him; but when he cried unto him, he heard.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he hath not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted; neither hath he hid his face from him; but when he cried unto him, he heard.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is any among you afflicted? let him pray.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is any among you afflicted? let him pray. Is any merry? let him sing psalms.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be not faithless, but believing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then saith he to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you alway. Matt 28:20var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye. But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified. But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart; so shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth, that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The letter killeth, but the spirit giveth life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament; not of the letter, but of the spirit: for the letter killeth, but the spirit giveth life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word, that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word. Thy word hath quickened me. Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee. I will not forget thy word. I trust in thy word. The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver. I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me. How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth! Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way. Psa 119: 9, 50, 11, 16, 42, 72, 93, 103, 104var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Perfect through sufferings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me. And he went a little farther, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me. And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that in them is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that in them is, and rested the seventh day: wherefore the Lord blessed the sabbath day, and hallowed it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth. For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By the word of the Lord were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth. For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the nations are as a drop of a bucket, and are counted as the small dust of the balance: behold, he taketh up the isles as a very little thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, the nations are as a drop of a bucket, and are counted as the small dust of the balance: behold, he taketh up the isles as a very little thing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy ringers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained; what is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him? Psa 8:3, 4var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My days are swifter than a post: they flee away, they see no good. They are passed away as the swift ships: as the eagle that hasteth to the prey.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now my days are swifter than a post: they flee away, they see no good. They are passed away as the swift ships: as the eagle that hasteth to the prey.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up. In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up: in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up. In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble. He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down: he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The world passeth away, and the lust thereof. but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed: but thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ, the same yesterday, and today, and forever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be filled with the Spirit, speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit; Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My mouth shall speak the praise of the Lord: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely. Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Praise ye the Lord: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely. Sing unto the Lord with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I heard a voice from heaven, as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of a great thunder; and I heard the voice of harpers harping with their harps. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers; but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers; But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made us accepted in the Beloved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As lively stones.... built up a spiritual house, a holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to keep you from failing, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the woman saw that the tree was good for food (the lust of the flesh), and that it was pleasant to the eyes (the lust of the eyes), and a tree to be desired to make one wise (the pride of life), she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat. For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the tempter came to [Jesus], he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread (the lust of the flesh). But he answered.... Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God. The devil ... sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them (the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life). Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread. For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation.
