EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mine eyes fail with looking upward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Like a crane or a swallow, so did I chatter: I did mourn as a dove: mine eyes fail with looking upward: O Lord, I am oppressed; undertake for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed. My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long? Return, O LORD deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; for I am weak: O Lord, heal me; for my bones are vexed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My heart is sore pained within me and the terrors of death are fallen upon me Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me and horror hath overwhelmed me. And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have need of patience.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: While they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel; which also said Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel; Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation is in heaven from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That blessed hope.... the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be in their foreheads.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep, and am known of mine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: After that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, which is the earnest of our inheritance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God; who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God; Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, which is new Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: and I will write upon him my new name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out: and I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, which is new Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: and I will write upon him my new name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the name wherewith she shall be called, The LORD our righteousness. Jer 33:16var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In those days shall Judah be saved, and Jerusalem shall dwell safely: and this is the name wherewith she shall be called, The Lord our righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, having raised up his Son Jesus, sent him to bless you, in turning away every one of you from his iniquities.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto you first God, having raised up his Son Jesus, sent him to bless you, in turning away every one of you from his iniquities.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Saved by his life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Saviour Jesus Christ.... who gave himself for us that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ; Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.... hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily. And ye are complete in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily. And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fulness have all we received and grace for grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I am oppressed; undertake for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like a crane or a swallow, so did I chatter: I did mourn as a dove: mine eyes fail with looking upward: O Lord, I am oppressed; undertake for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the LORD your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth: and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the Lord your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not: peace be unto thee, be strong, yea, be strong. And when he had spoken unto me, I was strengthened, and said, Let my lord speak; for thou hast strengthened me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And said, O man greatly beloved, fear not: peace be unto thee, be strong, yea, be strong. And when he had spoken unto me, I was strengthened, and said, Let my lord speak; for thou hast strengthened me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong.... and work: for I am with you, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yet now be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the Lord; and be strong, O Joshua, son of Jehozadak, the high priest; and be strong, all ye people of the land, saith the Lord, and work: for I am with you, saith the Lord of hosts:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might. Eph 6:10var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The entrance of thy words giveth light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This ... is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was God. In him was life; and the life was the light of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. In him was life; and the life was the light of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were sometime darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood ,a holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Noah was a just man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The just shall live by faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, it is evident: for, The just shall live by faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Noah builded an altar unto the LORD; and took of every clean beast, and of every clean fowl, and offered burnt offerings on the altar. And the LORD smelled a sweet savour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Noah builded an altar unto the Lord; and took of every clean beast, and of every clean fowl, and offered burnt offerings on the altar. And the Lord smelled a sweet savour; and the Lord said in his heart, I will not again curse the ground any more for man's sake; for the imagination of man's heart is evil from his youth; neither will I again smite any more every thing living, as I have done.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin. But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets; even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We ... joy in God, through our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom we have now received the atonement.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom we have now received the atonement.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom he did predestinate, them he also called: and whom he called, them he also justified. Rom 8:30var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Moreover whom he did predestinate, them he also called: and whom he called, them he also justified: and whom he justified, them he also glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed to thyself, and keep thy soul diligently, lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen, and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Only take heed to thyself, and keep thy soul diligently, lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen, and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life: but teach them thy sons, and thy sons' sons;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness. I the LORD thy God will hold thy right hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness. For I the Lord thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? Psa 77:8
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His mercy endureth for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is longsuffering, and of great mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is longsuffering, and of great mercy, forgiving iniquity and transgression, and by no means clearing the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity? ... he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy. He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; Who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people. For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted. Heb 2:17-Heb 2:18var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people. For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of Jordan, that it was well watered every where, before the Lord destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah, even as the garden of the Lord. Then Lot chose him all the plain of Jordan.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of Jordan, that it was well watered every where, before the Lord destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah, even as the garden of the Lord, like the land of Egypt, as thou comest unto Zoar. Then Lot chose him all the plain of Jordan; and Lot journeyed east: and they separated themselves the one from the other.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Just Lot ... that righteous man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And delivered just Lot, vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked: (For that righteous man dwelling among them, in seeing and hearing, vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Remember Lot's wife.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Remember Lot's wife.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness? Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness? Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not ye ... partakers with them. For ye were sometime darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light: proving what is acceptable unto the Lord. And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not ye therefore partakers with them. For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If so be the Lord will be with me, then I shall be able to drive them out, as the Lord said.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now therefore give me this mountain, whereof the Lord spake in that day; for thou heardest in that day how the Anakims were there, and that the cities were great and fenced: if so be the Lord will be with me, then I shall be able to drive them out, as the Lord said.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will go in the strength of the Lord God: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will go in the strength of the Lord God: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Stand ... having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness. For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness; For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is with thee.... Go in this thy might. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art holy, O thou that inhabiteth the praises of Israel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thou art holy, O thou that inhabitest the praises of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Draw not nigh hither; put off thy shoes from off thy feet, for the place whereon thou standest is holy ground.... I am the God of thy father, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. And Moses hid his face; for he was afraid to look upon God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Draw not nigh hither: put off thy shoes from off thy feet, for the place whereon thou standest is holy ground. Moreover he said, I am the God of thy father, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. And Moses hid his face; for he was afraid to look upon God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To whom then will ye liken me, or shall I be equal? saith the Holy One.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To whom then will ye liken me, or shall I be equal? saith the Holy One.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD thy God, the Holy One O Israel, thy Saviour. I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I am the Lord thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt for thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee. I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own.
MORNING.verse_kjv: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Can two walk together, except they be agreed? Amos 3:3
MORNING.verse_kjv: Can two walk together, except they be agreed?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They constrained him, saying, Abide with us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Tell me, O thou whom my soul loveth, where thou feedest, where thou makest thy flock to rest at noon: for why should I be as one that turneth aside by the flocks of thy companions? Song 1:7
EVENING.verse_kjv: Tell me, O thou whom my soul loveth, where thou feedest, where thou makest thy flock to rest at noon: for why should I be as one that turneth aside by the flocks of thy companions?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I found him whom my soul loveth: I held him, and would not let him go.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It was but a little that I passed from them, but I found him whom my soul loveth: I held him, and would not let him go, until I had brought him into my mother's house, and into the chamber of her that conceived me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O north wind; and come, thou south; blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out. Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am come into my garden.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am come into my garden, my sister, my spouse: I have gathered my myrrh with my spice; I have eaten my honeycomb with my honey; I have drunk my wine with my milk: eat, O friends; drink, yea, drink abundantly, O beloved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have not spoken in secret, in a dark place of the earth: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain: I the Lord speak righteousness, I declare things that are right.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The world seeth me no more; but ye see me. John 14:19var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abraham believed in the Lord; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he believed in the Lord; and he counted it to him for righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God; and being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform. And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness. Now it was not written for his sake alone, that it was imputed to him: but for us also, to whom it shall be imputed, if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The promise, that he should be the heir of the world, was not to Abraham, or to his seed, through the law, but through the righteousness of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the promise, that he should be the heir of the world, was not to Abraham, or to his seed, through the law, but through the righteousness of faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The just shall live by faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith: as it is written, The just shall live by faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised).
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our God is in the heavens; he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: With God nothing shall be impossible. And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For with God nothing shall be impossible. And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, . . . but now is my kingdom not from hence.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ and he shall reign for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw thrones, and they sat upon them, and judgment was given unto them; ... and they lived and reigned with Christ a thousand years.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw thrones, and they sat upon them, and judgment was given unto them: and I saw the souls of them that were beheaded for the witness of Jesus, and for the word of God, and which had not worshipped the beast, neither his image, neither had received his mark upon their foreheads, or in their hands; and they lived and reigned with Christ a thousand years.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me; that ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me; That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy kingdom come. Matt 6:10var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I am with thee, and will keep thee in all places whither thou goest, and will bring thee again into this land; for I will not leave thee, until I have done that which I have spoken to thee of.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And, behold, I am with thee, and will keep thee in all places whither thou goest, and will bring thee again into this land; for I will not leave thee, until I have done that which I have spoken to thee of.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world. At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge. Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia. At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge. Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When my father and my mother forsake me, then the Lord will take me up.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When my father and my mother forsake me, then the Lord will take me up.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not leave you comfortless; I will come to you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My peace I give unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Master, we have toiled all the night, and have taken nothing; nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Simon answering said unto him, Master, we have toiled all the night, and have taken nothing: nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth. Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: ... and, lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a net, that was cast into the sea.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net, that was cast into the sea, and gathered of every kind:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of. for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel! I am made all things to all men, that I might by all means save some.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of: for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel! To the weak became I as weak, that I might gain the weak: I am made all things to all men, that I might by all means save some.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My word ... shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase. I Cor 3:7var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods ... to every man according to his several ability.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When he arose, he took the young child and his mother by night, and departed into Egypt: And was there until the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying, Out of Egypt have I called my son.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey? Rom 6:16
MORNING.verse_kjv: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All these worketh that one and the self-same Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will. The manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will. But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he that knew not, and did commit things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few stripes. For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is sufficient for these things? II Cor 2:16
MORNING.verse_kjv: To the one we are the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who is sufficient for these things?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Distributing to the necessity of saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: David said, Is there yet any that is left ...
EVENING.verse_kjv: And David said, Is there yet any that is left of the house of Saul, that I may shew him kindness for Jonathan's sake?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: for I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me. Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple, verily I say unto you, he shall in no wise lose his reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple, verily I say unto you, he shall in no wise lose his reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister. Heb 6:10var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them. And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more. His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith: henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is faithful.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is not a man that he should lie; neither the Son of man that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good? Num 23:19
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord sware and will not repent.
EVENING.verse_kjv: (For those priests were made without an oath; but this with an oath by him that said unto him, The Lord sware and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec:)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: that by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: That by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All the promises of God in him are yea, and in him Amen, unto the glory of God by us. II Cor 1:20var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all the promises of God in him are yea, and in him Amen, unto the glory of God by us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and of a good courage.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whosoever he be that doth rebel against thy commandment, and will not hearken unto thy words in all that thou commandest him, he shall be put to death: only be strong and of a good courage.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my light and my salvation: whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life: of whom shall I be afraid? Psa 27:1
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength. Even the youths shall faint and be weary, and the young men shall utterly fall: but they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
MORNING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me? Psa 118:6
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Arise therefore, and be doing, and the LORD be with thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Of the gold, the silver, and the brass, and the iron, there is no number. Arise therefore, and be doing, and the Lord be with thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our friend sleepeth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These things said he: and after that he saith unto them, Our friend Lazarus sleepeth; but I go, that I may awake him out of sleep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the dead rise not, then is not Christ raised: and if Christ be not raised, your faith is vain; ye are yet in your sins. Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished. But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if the dead rise not, then is not Christ raised:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It came to pass, when all the people were clean passed over Jordan, that the LORD spake unto Joshua, saying, Take you hence out of the midst of Jordan, out of the place where the priests' feet stood firm, twelve stones.... and these stones shall be for a memorial unto the children of Israel for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, when all the people were clean passed over Jordan, that the Lord spake unto Joshua, saying, And command ye them, saying, Take you hence out of the midst of Jordan, out of the place where the priests' feet stood firm, twelve stones, and ye shall carry them over with you, and leave them in the lodging place, where ye shall lodge this night. Then ye shall answer them, That the waters of Jordan were cut off before the ark of the covenant of the Lord; when it passed over Jordan, the waters of Jordan were cut off: and these stones shall be for a memorial unto the children of Israel for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him? James 2:5
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that overcometh shall inherit all things and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Riches are not for ever; and doth the crown endure to every generation? Prov 27:24
EVENING.verse_kjv: For riches are not for ever: and doth the crown endure to every generation?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew: surely they are disquieted in vain: he heapeth up riches, and knoweth not who shall gather them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew: surely they are disquieted in vain: he heapeth up riches, and knoweth not who shall gather them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal: but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven. For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They do it to obtain a corruptible crown, but we an incorruptible.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A crown of glory that fadeth not away. I Pet 5:4var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Isaac went out to meditate in the field at the eventide.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Isaac went out to meditate in the field at the eventide: and he lifted up his eyes, and saw, and, behold, the camels were coming.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O Lord, my strength, and my redeemer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained; what is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him? Psa 8:3, 4
MORNING.verse_kjv: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The works of the Lord are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful. But his delight is in the law of the LORD; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful. But his delight is in the law of the Lord; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips: when I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How long wilt thou forget me, O Lord! for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me? Psa 13:1
EVENING.verse_kjv: How long wilt thou forget me, O Lord? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every good gift, and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: But Zion said, The LORD hath forsaken me, and my Lord hath forgotten me. Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Zion said, The Lord hath forsaken me, and my Lord hath forgotten me. Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt not be forgotten of me. I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Remember these, O Jacob and Israel; for thou art my servant: I have formed thee; thou art my servant: O Israel, thou shalt not be forgotten of me. I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus. When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus. When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A woman ... cried unto him, saying, Have mercy on me, O Lord, thou son of David! But he answered her not a word.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts, and cried unto him, saying, Have mercy on me, O Lord, thou Son of David; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil. But he answered her not a word. And his disciples came and besought him, saying, Send her away; for she crieth after us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth. I Pet 1:7var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all ... things shall be added unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things are yours: whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours; and ye are Christ's and Christ is God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord God is a sun and shield: the Lord will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The living God.... giveth us richly all things to enjoy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What communion hath light with darkness? II Cor 6:14
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the condemnation, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Darkness hath blinded his eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Have respect unto the covenant: for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God. He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God. He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble. The path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble. But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am come a light into the world, that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am come a light into the world, that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were sometime darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light. Eph 5:8var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Joy in the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unspeakable and full of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; ... exceeding joyful in all our tribulation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; ... for the joy that was set before him, endured the cross, despising the shame.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The joy of the LORD is your strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In thy presence is fulness of joy: at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jehovah-shalom: (The Lord send peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Gideon built an altar there unto the Lord, and called it Jehovah–shalom: unto this day it is yet in Ophrah of the Abi–ezrites.
