EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about: for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about: for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, a greater than Solomon is here.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given; and the government shall be upon his shoulder, and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, the mighty God, the everlasting Father, the Prince of Peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places; when it shall hail, coming down on the forest; and the city shall be low in a low place.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places; When it shall hail, coming down on the forest; and the city shall be low in a low place.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is our peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This man shall be the peace when the Assyrian shall come into our land.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this man shall be the peace, when the Assyrian shall come into our land: and when he shall tread in our palaces, then shall we raise against him seven shepherds, and eight principal men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye do return unto the Lord with all your hearts, then put away the strange gods and Ashtaroth from among you, and prepare your hearts unto the Lord, and serve him only.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Samuel spake unto all the house of Israel, saying, If ye do return unto the Lord with all your hearts, then put away the strange gods and Ashtoreth from among you, and prepare your hearts unto the Lord, and serve him only: and he will deliver you out of the hand of the Philistines.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, keep yourselves from idols.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you, and will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you, And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye cannot serve God and Mammon.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt worship no other god: for the LORD, whose name is Jealous, is a jealous God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou shalt worship no other god: for the Lord, whose name is Jealous, is a jealous God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the LORD searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the Lord searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Man looketh on the outward appearance, but the LORD looketh on the heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the Lord said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the Lord seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the Lord looketh on the heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth? Luke 18:8
EVENING.verse_kjv: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He came unto his own, and his own received him not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He came unto his own, and his own received him not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine. For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears; and they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father. Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father. Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching: verily I say unto you, that he shall gird himself, and make them to sit down to meat, and will come forth and serve them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Looking for that blessed hope, . . . the glorious appearing of the great God, and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day. The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day. The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts. For as the rain cometh down, and the snow from heaven, and returneth not thither, but watereth the earth.... so shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath concluded them all in unbelief; that he might have mercy upon all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief, that he might have mercy upon all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were as a firebrand plucked out of the burning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have overthrown some of you, as God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah, and ye were as a firebrand plucked out of the burning: yet have ye not returned unto me, saith the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sinners in Zion are afraid; fearfulness hath surprised the hypocrites.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sinners in Zion are afraid; fearfulness hath surprised the hypocrites. Who among us shall dwell with the devouring fire? who among us shall dwell with everlasting burnings?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We had the sentence of death in ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God which raiseth the dead: who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God which raiseth the dead: Who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord, we persuade men.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord, we persuade men; but we are made manifest unto God; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be instant in season, out of season.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not; I am the first and the last.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched, and that burned with fire, nor unto blackness, and darkness, and tempest.... but ye are come unto mount Sion.... to God the Judge of all, and to the spirits of just men made perfect, and to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched, and that burned with fire, nor unto blackness, and darkness, and tempest,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have not a high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin. Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin. Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD the King of Israel, and his redeemer the LORD of hosts; I am the first, and I am the last; and beside me there is no God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thus saith the Lord the King of Israel, and his redeemer the Lord of hosts; I am the first, and I am the last; and beside me there is no God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Art thou not from everlasting, O LORD my God, mine Holy One? Hab 1:12
MORNING.verse_kjv: Art thou not from everlasting, O Lord my God, mine Holy One? we shall not die. O Lord, thou hast ordained them for judgment; and, O mighty God, thou hast established them for correction.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is God, save the LORD? and who is a rock, save our God? II Sam 22:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: For who is God, save the Lord? and who is a rock, save our God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
EVENING.verse_kjv: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a rock save our God? Psa 18:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: For who is God save the Lord? or who is a rock save our God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Or let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: According to your faith be it unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and (Jesus) made as though he would have gone further But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: ... he vanished out of their sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee, that I may find grace in thy sight. My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee, that I may find grace in thy sight: and consider that this nation is thy people. And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who hath wrought and done it, calling the generations from the beginning? I the LORD, the first, and with the last: I am He.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who hath wrought and done it, calling the generations from the beginning? I the Lord, the first, and with the last; I am he.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ. The very God of peace sanctify you wholly: and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit, are ye now made perfect by the flesh? Gal 3:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit, are ye now made perfect by the flesh?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He ever liveth to make intercession.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died ... who also maketh intercession for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands, which are the figures of the true; but into heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands, which are the figures of the true; but into heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God for us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ... that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast our profession. For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin. Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast our profession.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through him we ... have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that know thy name will put their trust in thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is his name whereby he shalt be called, THE LORD OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In his days Judah shall be saved, and Israel shall dwell safely: and this is his name whereby he shall be called, THE Lord OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I Will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will go in the strength of the Lord God: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself. it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The mighty God, The everlasting Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Prince of Peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is our peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The name of the Lord is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help; and stay on horses, and trust in chariots, because they are many; and in horsemen, because they are very strong; but they look not unto the Holy One of Israel, neither seek the Lord!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As birds flying, so will the LORD of hosts defend Jerusalem; defending also he will deliver it; and passing over he will preserve it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As birds flying, so will the Lord of hosts defend Jerusalem; defending also he will deliver it; and passing over he will preserve it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ... rejoice in hope of the glory of God. And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God. And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am filled with comfort, I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Great is my boldness of speech toward you, great is my glorying of you: I am filled with comfort, I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ; and to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ; And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him? James 2:5
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness Psa 41:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He whom thou lovest is sick.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore his sisters sent unto him, saying, Lord, behold, he whom thou lovest is sick.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.-I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We faint not; . . . though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In him we live, and move, and have our being.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength. Even the youths shall faint and be weary, and the young men shall utterly fall: but they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In everything ye are enriched by him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and in all knowledge;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For when we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily. And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily. And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. I am the vine, ye are the branches: he that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall see his face.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech thee shew me thy glory. And he said, Thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory. And he said, Thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall see him, but not now: I shall behold him, but not nigh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I shall see him, but not now: I shall behold him, but not nigh: there shall come a Star out of Jacob, and a Sceptre shall rise out of Israel, and shall smite the corners of Moab, and destroy all the children of Sheth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know that my Redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth: and though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know that my redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord himself shall descend from heaven ... the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not; for I have redeemed thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not; for thou shalt not be ashamed: neither be thou confounded; for thou shalt not be put to shame: for thou shalt forget the shame of thy youth, and shalt not remember the reproach of thy widowhood any more. For thy Maker is thine husband; the LORD of hosts is his name; and thy Redeemer the Holy One of Israel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear not; for thou shalt not be ashamed: neither be thou confounded; for thou shalt not be put to shame: for thou shalt forget the shame of thy youth, and shalt not remember the reproach of thy widowhood any more. For thy Maker is thine husband; the Lord of hosts is his name; and thy Redeemer the Holy One of Israel; The God of the whole earth shall he be called.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: With the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Their Redeemer is strong; the LORD of hosts is his name: he shall throughly plead their cause.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall thoroughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ, who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will mention the lovingkindnesses of the Lord, and the praises of the Lord, according to all that the Lord hath bestowed on us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will mention the lovingkindnesses of the Lord, and the praises of the Lord, according to all that the Lord hath bestowed on us, and the great goodness toward the house of Israel, which he hath bestowed on them according to his mercies, and according to the multitude of his lovingkindnesses.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He brought me up ... out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God loved me, and gave himself for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;) and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am black, but comely.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am black, but comely, O ye daughters of Jerusalem, as the tents of Kedar, as the curtains of Solomon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord GOD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am a sinful man, O Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, thou art fair, my love; behold, thou art fair.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, thou art fair, my love; behold, thou art fair; thou hast doves' eyes within thy locks: thy hair is as a flock of goats, that appear from mount Gilead.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I abhor myself, and repent in dust and ashes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore I abhor myself, and repent in dust and ashes.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art all fair, my love; there is no spot in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art all fair, my love; there is no spot in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When I would do good, evil is present with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I find then a law, that, when I would do good, evil is present with me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are complete in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Perfect in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are washed.... ye are sanctified.... ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law. And a man's foes shall be they of his own household.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law. And a man's foes shall be they of his own household.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever ... will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world the love of the Father is not in him. For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him. For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you. If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you. The servant is not greater than his lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin but he that refraineth his lips is wise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin: but he that refraineth his lips is wise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that is slow to anger is better than the mighty: and he that ruieth his spirit than he that taketh a city.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that is slow to anger is better than the mighty; and he that ruleth his spirit than he that taketh a city.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man offend not in word, the same is a perfect man, and able also to bridle the whole body.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in many things we offend all. If any man offend not in word, the same is a perfect man, and able also to bridle the whole body.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Set a watch, O LORD, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Set a watch, O Lord, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth: who when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps: Who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Teach me thy way, 0 Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teach me thy way, O Lord, and lead me in a plain path, because of mine enemies.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way. The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way. The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having ... boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; and having an high priest over the house of God; let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What the law could not do, in that it was weak through the flesh, God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh, and for sin, condemned sin in the flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For what the law could not do, in that it was weak through the flesh, God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh, and for sin, condemned sin in the flesh:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The law having a shadow of good things to come, and not the very image of the things, can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the law having a shadow of good things to come, and not the very image of the things, can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is the devil; and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage. For verily he took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham. Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All have sinned, and come short of the glory of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is none righteous, no, not one: there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one: They are all gone out of the way, they are together become unprofitable; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is not a just man upon earth, that doeth good, and sinneth not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For there is not a just man upon earth, that doeth good, and sinneth not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How can he be clean that is born of a woman? Job 25:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: How then can man be justified with God? or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us therefore fear, lest a promise being left us of entering into his rest, any of you should seem to come short of it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us therefore fear, lest, a promise being left us of entering into his rest, any of you should seem to come short of it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me. Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me. Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD. . . hath put away thy sin; thou shalt not die.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And David said unto Nathan, I have sinned against the Lord. And Nathan said unto David, The Lord also hath put away thy sin; thou shalt not die.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom he justified, them he also glorified.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Moreover whom he did predestinate, them he also called: and whom he called, them he also justified: and whom he justified, them he also glorified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory I Thess 2:12
EVENING.verse_kjv: That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Honour the Lord with thy substance, and with the firstfruits of all thine increase.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Honour the Lord with thy substance, and with the firstfruits of all thine increase:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But this I say, He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints and do minister.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you.... brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: and that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be no night there.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the Lord shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light: who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were sometime darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are not of the night, nor of darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul shall he satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips when I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How precious ... are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth! Psa 119:103
MORNING.verse_kjv: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy love is better than wine.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth: for thy love is better than wine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art fairer than the children of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste. He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste. He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His countenance is as Lebanon, excellent as the cedars. His mouth is most sweet: yea, he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, and this is my friend.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His legs are as pillars of marble, set upon sockets of fine gold: his countenance is as Lebanon, excellent as the cedars. His mouth is most sweet: yea, he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, and this is my friend, O daughters of Jerusalem.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have seen his ways, and will heal him; I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have seen his ways, and will heal him: I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Return, ye backsliding children, and I will heal your backslidings. Behold, we come unto thee; for thou art the LORD our God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Return, ye backsliding children, and I will heal your backslidings. Behold, we come unto thee; for thou art the Lord our God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits: who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He restoreth my soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in that day thou shalt say, O Lord, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Their redeemer is strong.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall thoroughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know your manifold transgressions and your mighty sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know your manifold transgressions and your mighty sins: they afflict the just, they take a bribe, and they turn aside the poor in the gate from their right.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have laid help upon one that is mighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD ... thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the mighty One of Jacob.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will feed them that oppress thee with their own flesh; and they shall be drunken with their own blood, as with sweet wine: and all flesh shall know that I the Lord am thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the mighty One of Jacob.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mighty to save.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is this that cometh from Edom, with dyed garments from Bozrah? this that is glorious in his apparel, travelling in the greatness of his strength? I that speak in righteousness, mighty to save.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Able to keep you from falling.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where sin abounded, grace did much more abound.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Moreover the law entered, that the offence might abound. But where sin abounded, grace did much more abound:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is able ... to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? Isa 50:2
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man? when I called, was there none to answer? Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea, I make the rivers a wilderness: their fish stinketh, because there is no water, and dieth for thirst.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? ...
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seekest thou great things for thyself seek them not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And seekest thou great things for thyself? seek them not: for, behold, I will bring evil upon all flesh, saith the Lord: but thy life will I give unto thee for a prey in all places whither thou goest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus; who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God: but made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Godliness with contentment is great gain. For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out. And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therewith to be content.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therewith to be content.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Waters flowed over mine head; then I said, I am cut off. I called upon thy name, O LORD, out of the low dungeon. Thou hast heard my voice: hide not thine ear at my breathing, at my cry. Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee: thou saidst, Fear not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Waters flowed over mine head; then I said, I am cut off.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Will the LORD cast off for ever? and wilt he be favourable no more? Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore? Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? And I said, This is my infirmity: but I will remember the years of the right hand of the most High. I will remember the works of the LORD: surely I will remember thy wonders of old.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Will the Lord cast off for ever? and will he be favourable no more?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ask what I shall give thee. And Solomon said unto God.... Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In that night did God appear unto Solomon, and said unto him, Ask what I shall give thee. And Solomon said unto God, Thou hast shewed great mercy unto David my father, and hast made me to reign in his stead. Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this thy people, that is so great?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Asa cried unto the LORD his God, and said, LORD, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power... O LORD, thou art our God; let not man prevail against thee. So the LORD smote the Ethiopians before Asa.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Asa cried unto the Lord his God, and said, Lord, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power: help us, O Lord our God; for we rest on thee, and in thy name we go against this multitude. O Lord, thou art our God; let not man prevail against thee. So the Lord smote the Ethiopians before Asa, and before Judah; and the Ethiopians fled.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord. And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord. And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a royal priesthood.... that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye ... as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, a holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him ... let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips, giving thanks to his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad. O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad. O magnify the Lord with me, and let us exalt his name together.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Draw me, we will run after thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Draw me, we will run after thee: the king hath brought me into his chambers: we will be glad and rejoice in thee, we will remember thy love more than wine: the upright love thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.
