EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath appeared of old unto me, saying, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I drew them with cords of a man, with bands of love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I drew them with cords of a man, with bands of love: and I was to them as they that take off the yoke on their jaws, and I laid meat unto them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, if I be lifted up from the earth, will draw all men unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I, if I be lifted up from the earth, will draw all men unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the Lamb of God! John 1:36
EVENING.verse_kjv: And looking upon Jesus as he walked, he saith, Behold the Lamb of God!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up: that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We love him, because he first loved us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved spake, and said unto me, Rise up, my love, my fair one, and come away. For, lo, the winter is past, the rain is over and gone; the flowers appear on the earth; the time of the singing of birds is come, and the voice of the turtle is heard in our land; the fig tree putteth forth her green figs, and the vines with the tender grape give a good smell. Arise, my love, my fair one, and come away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My beloved spake, and said unto me, Rise up, my love, my fair one, and come away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will raise them up a Prophet from among their Brethren like unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will raise them up a Prophet from among their brethren, like unto thee, and will put my words in his mouth; and he shall speak unto them all that I shall command him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: [Moses] stood between the LORD and you at that time, to shew you the word of the LORD: for ye were afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (I stood between the Lord and you at that time, to shew you the word of the Lord: for ye were afraid by reason of the fire, and went not up into the mount;) saying,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now the man Moses was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face of the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (Now the man Moses was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face of the earth.)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus: who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God: but made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after; but Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after; But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Everlasting consolation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is able to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The gifts and calling of God are without repentance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? Rom 8:35
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is not your rest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus unto them again, Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh, but quickened by the Spirit:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Holy Ghost this signifying, that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through him we ... have access by one Spirit unto the Father. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having ... boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ: by whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His word was in mine heart as a burning fire shut up in my bones, and I was weary with forbearing, and I could not stay.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then I said, I will not make mention of him, nor speak any more in his name. But his word was in mine heart as a burning fire shut up in my bones, and I was weary with forbearing, and I could not stay.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel! What is my reward then? Verily that, when I preach the gospel, I may make the gospel of Christ without charge, that I abuse not my power in the gospel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of: for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel! What is my reward then? Verily that, when I preach the gospel, I may make the gospel of Christ without charge, that I abuse not my power in the gospel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus. But Peter and John answered and said unto them.... We cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ constraineth us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth. Thou wicked and slothful servant.... thou oughtest ... to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Go ... to thy friends, and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not, but saith unto him, Go home to thy friends, and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee, and hath had compassion on thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There shall cleave nought of the cursed thing to thine hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And there shall cleave nought of the cursed thing to thine hand: that the Lord may turn from the fierceness of his anger, and shew thee mercy, and have compassion upon thee, and multiply thee, as he hath sworn unto thy fathers;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself even as he is pure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men, teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ: who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who art thou, Lord? I am Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I said, Who art thou, Lord? And he said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is I; be not afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee. For I am the LORD thy God.... thy Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee. For I am the Lord thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt for thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Emmanuel, God with us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast in the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my brethren dearly beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my dearly beloved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition: but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the just shall live by faith: but if any man draw back, my soul shall have no pleasure in him. But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye continue in my word then are ye my disciples indeed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Enoch walked with God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Can two walk together, except they be agreed? Amos 3:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: Can two walk together, except they be agreed?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having made peace through the blood of his cross.... You, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In Christ Jesus ye who sometime were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life. And not only so, but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life. And not only so, but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom we have now received the atonement.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ, I John 1:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If his offering be a burnt sacrifice of the herd, let him offer a male without blemish: he shall offer it of his own voluntary will. And he shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If his offering be a burnt sacrifice of the herd, let him offer a male without blemish: he shall offer it of his own voluntary will at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the Lord. And he shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Abraham said, My son, God will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering: so they went both of them together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A ransom for many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will love them freely.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God ... loved me and gave himself for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made us accepted in the beloved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Great is thy mercy toward me and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine. I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour. I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine. I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour. I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that trust in their wealth, and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches; none of them can by any means redeem his brother, nor give to God a ransom for him: for the redemption of their soul is precious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They that trust in their wealth, and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have found a ransom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord was my stay.
MORNING.verse_kjv: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the Lord was my stay.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Truly in vain is salvation hoped for from the hills, and from the multitude of mountains: truly in the LORD our God is the salvation of Israel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Truly in vain is salvation hoped for from the hills, and from the multitude of mountains: truly in the Lord our God is the salvation of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion; for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them. The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them. The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For who is God save the LORD? or who is a rock save our God? It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For who is God save the Lord? or who is a rock save our God? It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By the grace of God I am what I am.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All we like sheep have gone astray.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is none righteous, no, not one: there is none that understandeth. They are all gone out of the way, they are together become unprofitable.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me: and I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What man of you, having an hundred sheep, if he lose one of them, doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness, and go after that which is lost, until he find it? Luke 15:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: What man of you, having an hundred sheep, if he lose one of them, doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness, and go after that which is lost, until he find it?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord visited Sarah as he had said, and the Lord did unto Sarah as he had spoken.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord visited Sarah as he had said, and the Lord did unto Sarah as he had spoken.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: David encouraged himself in the LORD his God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And David was greatly distressed; for the people spake of stoning him, because the soul of all the people was grieved, every man for his sons and for his daughters: but David encouraged himself in the Lord his God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land which he sware to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Joseph said unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land which he sware to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. And now come, I will send thee into Egypt. He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There failed not ought of any good thing which the LORD had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There failed not ought of any good thing which the Lord had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is faithful that promised.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good? Num 23:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of all wait upon thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth to all life, and breath, and all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Neither is worshipped with men's hands, as though he needed any thing, seeing he giveth to all life, and breath, and all things;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek: for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And therefore will the Lord wait, that he may be gracious unto you, and therefore will he be exalted, that he may have mercy upon you: for the Lord is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: this is the LORD; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the Lord; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we hope for that we see not, then do we with patience wait for it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if we hope for that we see not, then do we with patience wait for it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed. The LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed. All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus it behoved Christ to suffer... that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world: but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, . . . to give repentance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins: and by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be it known unto you therefore, men and brethren, that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins: And by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ, ... though he was rich, yet for your sakes ... became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high; being made so much better than the angels, as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high; Being made so much better than the angels, as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God: but made himself of no reputation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All things are yours; whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come all are your's; and ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His left hand is under my head, and his right hand doth embrace me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His left hand is under my head, and his right hand doth embrace me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Underneath are the everlasting arms.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When [Peter] saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when he saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The beloved of the LORD shall dwell in safety by him; and the LORD shall cover him all the day long, and he shall dwell between his shoulders.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of Benjamin he said, The beloved of the Lord shall dwell in safety by him; and the Lord shall cover him all the day long, and he shall dwell between his shoulders.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon Him, for he careth for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that toucheth you, toucheth the apple of his eye.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand. My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand. My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is she that looketh forth as the morning, fair as the moon, clear as the sun, and terrible as an army with banners? Song 6:10
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is she that looketh forth as the morning, fair as the moon, clear as the sun, and terrible as an army with banners?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The church of God, which he hath purchased with his own blood.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Take heed therefore unto yourselves, and to all the flock, over the which the Holy Ghost hath made you overseers, to feed the church of God, which he hath purchased with his own blood.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word, that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There appeared a great wonder in heaven a woman clothed with the sun.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there appeared a great wonder in heaven; a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and upon her head a crown of twelve stars:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready. And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honour to him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready. And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The glory which thou gavest me I have given them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, the time is short.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But this I say, brethren, the time is short: it remaineth, that both they that have wives be as though they had none;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble. He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down: he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble. He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down: he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive. Death is swallowed up in victory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive. So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord's, Rom 14:8
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord's.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To live is Christ, and to die is gain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast not away . . . your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward. For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise. For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A new name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he had found him, he brought him unto Antioch. And it came to pass, that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church, and taught much people. And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world. For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world. For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... followers of God, as dear children; and walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour. But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints. Now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the Lamb of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins. Wherefore when he cometh into the world, he saith, Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not, but a body hast thou prepared me: in burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure. Then said I, Lo, I come (in the volume of the book it is written of me,) to do thy will, O God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, yet he opened not his mouth: he is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, so he openeth not his mouth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, yet he opened not his mouth: he is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, so he openeth not his mouth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold.... but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot: ... manifest in these last times for you who by him do believe in God ... that your faith and hope might be in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom; and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more Psa 71:14
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ, let us go on unto perfection; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works of faith toward God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ, let us go on unto perfection; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works, and of faith toward God,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will bless the LORD at all times his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Zion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice evermore. Pray without ceasing. In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord, alway; and again I say, Rejoice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Consider how great things He hath done for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Only fear the Lord, and serve him in truth with all your heart: for consider how great things he hath done for you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt remember all the way which the Lord thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness to humble the, and to prove the, to know what was in thine heart whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no. Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that as a man chastenth his son, so the Lord thy God chasteneth thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt remember all the way which the Lord thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no. Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his son, so the Lord thy God chasteneth thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me. It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes. Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I know, O Lord, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me. It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes. Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath not dealt with us after our sins, nor rewarded us according to our iniquities. For as the heaven is high above the earth so great is his mercy toward them that fear him. He knoweth our frame. He remembereth that we are dust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That blessed hope, . the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil: whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil; Whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus, made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things, which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now. And not only they, but ourselves also.... groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now. And not only they, but ourselves also, which have the firstfruits of the Spirit, even we ourselves groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him for we shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory Col 3:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant, make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant, Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his cornmandments.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him. Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him. Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding: but he that is hasty of spirit exalteth folly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD passed by before him, and proclaimed, The LORD, The LORD God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord passed by before him, and proclaimed, The Lord, The Lord God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant in goodness and truth,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... followers of God, as dear children; and walk in love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children; And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully. If, when ye do well, and suffer for it, ye take it patiently, this is acceptable with God. Christ ... suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye angry, and sin not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To be spiritually minded is life and peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath called us to peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if the unbelieving depart, let him depart. A brother or a sister is not under bondage in such cases: but God hath called us to peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever. And my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever. And my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Great peace have they which love thy law.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jehovah-shammah. (The Lord is there.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It was round about eighteen thousand measures: and the name of the city from that day shall be, The Lord is there.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw no temple: ... for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple. The city had no need of the sun neither of the moon to shine for it; for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw no temple therein: for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it. And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation. For I will cleanse their blood that I have not cleansed: for the LORD dwelleth in Zion.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation. For I will cleanse their blood that I have not cleansed: for the Lord dwelleth in Zion.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion; for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion: for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Surely the Lord is in this place; and I knew it not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jacob awaked out of his sleep, and he said, Surely the Lord is in this place; and I knew it not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence? If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence? If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Am I a God at hand, saith the LORD, and not a God afar off? Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? saith the LORD. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Am I a God at hand, saith the Lord, and not a God afar off? Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? saith the Lord. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded? I Kings 8:27
MORNING.verse_kjv: But will God indeed dwell on the earth? behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy: I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the temple of the living God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Keep yourselves from idols.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My son, give me thine heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My son, give me thine heart, and let thine eyes observe my ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Son of man, these men have set up their idols in their heart, and put the stumbling-block of their iniquity before their face: should I be enquired of at all by them? Ezek 14:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: Son of man, these men have set up their idols in their heart, and put the stumblingblock of their iniquity before their face: should I be enquired of at all by them?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Mortify ... your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare. For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows. But thou, O man of God, flee these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My fruit is better than gold, yea, than fine gold; and my revenue than choice silver.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My fruit is better than gold, yea, than fine gold; and my revenue than choice silver.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD looketh on the heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Lord said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the Lord seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the Lord looketh on the heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the Lord appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall be holy unto me: for I the LORD am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the Lord am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Perfecting holiness in the fear of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Teaching us that denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
