EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ: till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ: Till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the Lord's hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, the Lord's hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: While I was speaking in prayer, even the man Gabriel, whom I had seen in the vision at the beginning, being caused to fly swiftly, touched me about the time of the evening oblation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yea, whiles I was speaking in prayer, even the man Gabriel, whom I had seen in the vision at the beginning, being caused to fly swiftly, touched me about the time of the evening oblation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help, leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not thou far from me, O LORD. O my strength, haste thee to help me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But be not thou far from me, O Lord: O my strength, haste thee to help me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ah Lord God! behold, thou hast made the heaven and the earth by thy great power and stretched out arm, and there is nothing too hard for thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ah Lord God! behold, thou hast made the heaven and the earth by thy great power and stretched out arm, and there is nothing too hard for thee:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who delivered us from so great a death, and doth deliver: in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have glorified thee on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business? And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business? And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This sickness is not unto death, but for the glory of God, that the Son of God might be glorified thereby.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When Jesus heard that, he said, This sickness is not unto death, but for the glory of God, that the Son of God might be glorified thereby.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art my beloved Son; in thee I am well pleased.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art worthy ... for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood, out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation; and hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation; And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed? for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O fear the LORD, ye his Saints: for there is no want to them that fear him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly. O LORD of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord God is a sun and shield: the Lord will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly. O Lord of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I would have you without carefulness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father. The very hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith? Mark 4:40
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Have faith in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be a tabernacle for a shadow in the daytime from the heat, and for a place of refuge, and for a covert from storm and from rain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there shall be a tabernacle for a shadow in the daytime from the heat, and for a place of refuge, and for a covert from storm and from rain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand. The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is thy keeper: the Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand. The Lord shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD went before them by day in a pillar of a cloud, to lead them the way; and by night in a pillar of fire, to give them light; to go by day and night: he took not away the pillar of the cloud by day, nor the pillar of fire by night, from before the people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord went before them by day in a pillar of a cloud, to lead them the way; and by night in a pillar of fire, to give them light; to go by day and night: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day, nor the pillar of fire by night, from before the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and today, and for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A just God and a Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Tell ye, and bring them near; yea, let them take counsel together: who hath declared this from ancient time? who hath told it from that time? have not I the Lord? and there is no God else beside me; a just God and a Saviour; there is none beside me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is well pleased for his righteousness' sake; he will magnify the law, and make it honourable.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is well pleased for his righteousness' sake; he will magnify the law, and make it honourable.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God; to declare I say at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God; To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To him that worketh not, but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly; his faith is counted for righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But to him that worketh not, but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly, his faith is counted for righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come? I Cor 15:35
EVENING.verse_kjv: But some man will say, How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God; ... it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And as we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ; ... shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you. But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you. But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He was seen of Cephas, then of the twelve: after that he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that he was seen of Cephas, then of the twelve: After that, he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once; of whom the greater part remain unto this present, but some are fallen asleep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea; though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast. For, behold, the LORD cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast. For, behold, the Lord cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They persecute him whom thou hast smitten.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is impossible but that offences will come: but woe unto him, through whom they come! Luke 17:1
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said he unto the disciples, It is impossible but that offences will come: but woe unto him, through whom they come!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They did spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands, saying, Prophesy unto us, thou Christ, Who is he that smote thee? Matt 26:67, 68
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then did they spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him, with the scribes and elders, said, He saved others; himself he cannot save. If he be the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him, with the scribes and elders, said, He saved others; himself he cannot save. If he be the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross, and we will believe him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together, to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together, For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted. EVENING.verse_kjv: Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Lord to bruise him; he hath put him to grief.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet it pleased the Lord to bruise him; he hath put him to grief: when thou shalt make his soul an offering for sin, he shall see his seed, he shall prolong his days, and the pleasure of the Lord shall prosper in his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour. Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour. Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done. And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done. And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it? John 18:11
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus unto Peter, Put up thy sword into the sheath: the cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Father hath not left me alone; for I do always those things that please him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he that sent me is with me: the Father hath not left me alone; for I do always those things that please him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mine elect, in whom my soul delighteth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold my servant, whom I uphold; mine elect, in whom my soul delighteth; I have put my spirit upon him: he shall bring forth judgment to the Gentiles.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [Ye that are the Lord's remembrancers,] keep not silence.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, which shall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the Lord, keep not silence,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou ... hast made us unto our God kings and priests.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw in the right hand of him that sat on the throne a book written within and on the backside, sealed with seven seals.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sons of Aaron, the priests, shall blow with the trumpets; and they shall be to you for an ordinance for ever throughout your generations. And if ye go to war in your land against the enemy that oppresseth you, then ye shall blow an alarm with the trumpets; and ye shall be remembered before the LORD your God, and ye shall be saved from your enemies.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the sons of Aaron, the priests, shall blow with the trumpets; and they shall be to you for an ordinance for ever throughout your generations. And if ye go to war in your land against the enemy that oppresseth you, then ye shall blow an alarm with the trumpets; and ye shall be remembered before the Lord your God, and ye shall be saved from your enemies.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have not spoken in secret, in a dark place of the earth: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain: I the Lord speak righteousness, I declare things that are right.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Their voice was heard, and their prayer came up to his holy dwelling place, even unto heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then the priests the Levites arose and blessed the people: and their voice was heard, and their prayer came up to his holy dwelling place, even unto heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Pray one for another: the effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come, Lord Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Make no tarrying, O my God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Looking for and hasting unto the Coming of the day of God. EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After that ye believed ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed; blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory: receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory: Receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We walk by faith, not by sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is I; be not afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he saith unto them, It is I; be not afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Woe is me! for I am undone; ... mine eyes have seen the King, the LORD of hosts. Then flew one of the seraphims unto me, having a live coal in his hand, which he had taken with the tongs from off the altar: and he laid it upon my mouth, and said, Lo, this hath touched thy lips; and thine iniquity is taken away, and thy sin purged.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said I, Woe is me! for I am undone; because I am a man of unclean lips, and I dwell in the midst of a people of unclean lips: for mine eyes have seen the King, the Lord of hosts. And he laid it upon my mouth, and said, Lo, this hath touched thy lips; and thine iniquity is taken away, and thy sin purged.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But this is a people robbed and spoiled; they are all of them snared in holes, and they are hid in prison houses: they are for a prey, and none delivereth; for a spoil, and none saith, Restore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous. I John 2:1var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night. And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night. And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Vanity of vanities; all is vanity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Vanity of vanities, saith the Preacher, vanity of vanities; all is vanity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We spend our years as a tale that is told. The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told. The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD, I change not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am the Lord, I change not; therefore ye sons of Jacob are not consumed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation (citizenship) is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ; who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The creature was made subject to vanity, not willingly, but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the creature was made subject to vanity, not willingly, but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come. Rev 4:8var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Awake to righteousness, and sin not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Awake to righteousness, and sin not; for some have not the knowledge of God: I speak this to your shame.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day. Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness. Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast away from you all your transgressions, whereby ye have transgressed: and make you a new heart and a new spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast away from you all your transgressions, whereby ye have transgressed; and make you a new heart and a new spirit: for why will ye die, O house of Israel?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming. If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming. If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My sheep hear my voice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: If any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sleep, but my heart waketh: it is the voice of my beloved that knocketh, saying, Open to me, my sister, my love, my dove, my undefiled. I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I sleep, but my heart waketh: it is the voice of my beloved that knocketh, saying, Open to me, my sister, my love, my dove, my undefiled: for my head is filled with dew, and my locks with the drops of the night. I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Speak; for thy servant heareth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When Jesus came to the place, he looked up, and saw him, and said unto him, Zaccheus, make haste and come down; for to day I must abide at thy house. And he made haste, and came down, and received him joyfully.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when Jesus came to the place, he looked up, and saw him, and said unto him, Zacchaeus, make haste, and come down; for to day I must abide at thy house. And he made haste, and came down, and received him joyfully.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly. Psa 85:8var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost, which is given unto us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear, but ye have received the spirit of adoption whereby we cry, Abba Father. The spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father. The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Reproach hath broken my heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is not this the carpenter's son? Matt 13:55
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is not this the carpenter's son? is not his mother called Mary? and his brethren, James, and Joses, and Simon, and Judas?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? John 1:46
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Nathanael said unto him, Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? Philip saith unto him, Come and see.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil? John 8:48
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Pharisees said, He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We know that this man is a sinner.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He deceiveth the people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This man blasphemeth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, certain of the scribes said within themselves, This man blasphemeth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold a man gluttonous, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Son of man came eating and drinking, and they say, Behold a man gluttonous, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners. But wisdom is justified of her children.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully. For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps. Who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye. I Pet 4:14var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him. God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him. God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then shalt thou call, and the LORD shall answer; thou shalt cry, and he shall say, Here I am.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shalt thou call, and the Lord shall answer; thou shalt cry, and he shall say, Here I am. If thou take away from the midst of thee the yoke, the putting forth of the finger, and speaking vanity;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea, driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive anything of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the LORD will not hear me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not, And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous: and he is the propitiation for our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer. From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer. From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. For when I am weak, then am I strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When (Peter) saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But when he saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eternal God is. thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power. Col 1:11var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fellowship of His sufferings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief; and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the world ye shall have tribulation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I looked for some to take pity, but there was none.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They overcame ... by the blood of the Lamb.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay anything to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD. The blood shall be to you for a token upon the houses where ye are: and when I see the blood, I will pass over you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I will pass through the land of Egypt this night, and will smite all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, both man and beast; and against all the gods of Egypt I will execute judgment: I am the Lord. And the blood shall be to you for a token upon the houses where ye are: and when I see the blood, I will pass over you, and the plague shall not be upon you to destroy you, when I smite the land of Egypt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is ... no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they? These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they? And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, and hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen. Rev 1:5-Rev 1:6var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God shall wipe away all tears: ... there shall he no more death, neither sorrow, ... for the former things are passed away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord GOD will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the LORD hath spoken it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the Lord hath spoken it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself. for the LORD shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the Lord shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The inhabitant shall not say, I am sick: the people that dwell therein shall be forgiven their iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the inhabitant shall not say, I am sick: the people that dwell therein shall be forgiven their iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people: and the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the ransomed of the Lord shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death. So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The things which are not seen are eternal 2 Cor 4:18
MORNING.verse_kjv: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Raised up together in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not ... I am he that liveth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are complete in him, which is the head.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil: and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality. So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.
