So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A servant of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art no more a servant, but a son.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage. For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage. For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding, I have strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself. it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth the way that I take.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Man's goings are of the LORD: how can a man then understand his own way? Prov 20:24
EVENING.verse_kjv: Man's goings are of the Lord; how can a man then understand his own way?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death. Psa 48:14var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the Lord your God; walk in my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am the Lord your God; walk in my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked. If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked. If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing, but the keeping of the commandments of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing, but the keeping of the commandments of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing, as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teach me, O Lord, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of peace.... make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Verily he took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham. In all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham. Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And above the firmament that was over their heads was the likeness of a throne, as the appearance of a sapphire stone: and upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of man ... which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross. Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God. Rev 3:2var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to The Son to have life in himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Saviour Jesus Christ.... hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the resurrection, and the life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because I live, ye shall live also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are made partakers of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Partakers of the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened, and have tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Partakers of the divine nature.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit. Behold, I shew you a mystery; We shall not all sleep, but we shall be changed, in a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trump: for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit. Behold, I shew you a mystery; We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed, In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trump: for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who liveth for ever and ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when those beasts give glory and honour and thanks to him that sat on the throne, who liveth for ever and ever,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords; who only hath immortality.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Which in his times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords; Who only hath immortality, dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom be honour and power everlasting. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto the King eternal, immortal.... be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be desirous of vain glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Gideon said unto them, I would desire a request of you, that ye would give me every man the earrings of his prey. (For they had golden earrings, because they were Ishmaelites.) And they answered, We will willingly give them. And they spread a garment, and did cast therein every man the earrings of his prey. And Gideon made an ephod thereof, and put it in his city, even in Ophrah: and all Israel went thither a whoring after it: which thing became a snare unto Gideon, and to his house.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Gideon said unto them, I would desire a request of you, that ye would give me every man the earrings of his prey. (For they had golden earrings, because they were Ishmaelites.) And they answered, We will willingly give them. And they spread a garment, and did cast therein every man the earrings of his prey. And Gideon made an ephod thereof, and put it in his city, even in Ophrah: and all Israel went thither a whoring after it: which thing became a snare unto Gideon, and to his house.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seekest thou great things for thyself? seek them not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And seekest thou great things for thyself? seek them not: for, behold, I will bring evil upon all flesh, saith the Lord: but thy life will I give unto thee for a prey in all places whither thou goest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, the messenger of Satan to buffet me, lest I should be exalted above measure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let nothing be done, through strife or vain glory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wash me thoroughly from mine iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wash me thoroughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from ail your idols, will I cleanse you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of a heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh: how much more shall the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God, purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God? MORNING.verse_kjv: For if the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He saved them for his name's sake, that he might make his mighty power to be known.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless he saved them for his name's sake, that he might make his mighty power to be known.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not unto us, O Lord, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fellowship in the gospel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ. EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ. EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed unto thyself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take heed unto thyself, and unto the doctrine; continue in them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself, and them that hear thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts. If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts. If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, they are the sons of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, they are the sons of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus saith unto her, Mary.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Mary. She turned herself, and saith unto him, Rabboni; which is to say, Master.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name: thou art mine.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name. And the sheep follow him: for they know his voice.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.

EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast our profession.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The gospel of Christ ... is the power of God unto salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.

MORNING.verse_kjv: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The joy of the LORD is your strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;

But they rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old. But they rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After that ye believed, ye were sealed with that Holy Spirit of promise, which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise, Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh. For the flesh lusteth against the spirit, and the spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh. For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit helpeth our infirmities.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will go and return to my place, till they acknowledge their offence, and seek my face.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will go and return to my place, till they acknowledge their offence, and seek my face: in their affliction they will seek me early.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: ... I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I hid me, and was wroth, and he went on frowardly in the way of his heart. I have seen his ways, and will heal him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the iniquity of his covetousness was I wroth, and smote him: I hid me, and was wroth, and he went on frowardly in the way of his heart. I have seen his ways, and will heal him: I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken the LORD thy God, when he led thee by the way? Jer 2:17
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken the Lord thy God, when he led thee by the way?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness. EVENING.verse_kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee! Psa 31:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How excellent is thy loving kindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings. They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures. For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God, ... hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it? I the LORD search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it? I the Lord search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men, and needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men, And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord knoweth them that are his.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep. My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me: and I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The chief Shepherd.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters. He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will seek that which was lost, and bring again that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will seek that which was lost, and bring again that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick: but I will destroy the fat and the strong; I will feed them with judgment.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw in the way a light from heaven, above the brightness of the sun, shining round about me. And I said, Who art thou, Lord? And he said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: At midday, O king, I saw in the way a light from heaven, above the brightness of the sun, shining round about me and them which journeyed with me. And I said, Who art thou, Lord? And he said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart, and was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart, And was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the LORD shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory. Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself. for the LORD shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the Lord shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory. Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the Lord shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace.... hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus. EVENING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praise the LORD of hosts: for the LORD is good; for his mercy endureth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The voice of joy, and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom, and the voice of the bride, the voice of them that shall say, Praise the Lord of hosts: for the Lord is good; for his mercy endureth for ever: and of them that shall bring the sacrifice of praise into the house of the Lord. For I will cause to return the captivity of the land, as at the first, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O people saved by the LORD, the shield of thy help, and who is the sword of thy excellency! Deut 33:29
MORNING.verse_kjv: Happy art thou, O Israel: who is like unto thee, O people saved by the Lord, the shield of thy help, and who is the sword of thy excellency! and thine enemies shall be found liars unto thee; and thou shalt tread upon their high places.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the Lord is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man love God, the same is known of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if any man love God, the same is known of him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast found grace in my sight, and I know thee by name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said unto Moses, I will do this thing also that thou hast spoken: for thou hast found grace in my sight, and I know thee by name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would have you without carefulness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He careth for you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him. Herein thou hast done foolishly: therefore from henceforth thou shalt have wars.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment? Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus. MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We look for the Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men, teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ; who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the LORD; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the Lord; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So run, that ye may obtain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The slothful man saith, There is a lion without.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The slothful man saith, There is a lion without, I shall be slain in the streets.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I press toward the mark.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I ... so run, not as uncertainty; ... I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means.... I myself should be a castaway.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air: But I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fashion of this world passeth away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that use this world, as not abusing it: for the fashion of this world passeth away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_kjv: But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:

MORNING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It came to pass, when the sun did arise, that God prepared a vehement east wind and the sun beat upon the head of Jonah, that he fainted, and wished in himself to die, and said, It is better for me to die than to live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Job spake, and said, Wherefore is light given to him that is in misery, and life unto the bitter in soul; which long for death, but it cometh not; and dig for it more than for hid treasures? Job 3:2, 20, 21
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Job spake, and said,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people. For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted. Heb 2:17-Heb 2:18var refTagger = {settings: {bibleVersion: "NKJV",roundCorners: true,socialSharing: [],customStyle : {heading: {backgroundColor : "#ffffff",color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt"},body: {color : "#000000",fontFamily : "TimesNewRoman, 'Times New Roman', Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif",fontSize : "14pt",moreLink : {color: "#0000ff"}}}}};(function(d, t) {var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];g.src = "//api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js";s.parentNode.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people. For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us labour to enter into that rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest, lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction: ... strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Give diligence to make your calling and election sure: ... for so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: So run, that ye may obtain. And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain. And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the Lord shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hearest me always.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I knew that thou hearest me always: but because of the people which stand by I said it, that they may believe that thou hast sent me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said, Father, I thank thee that thou hast heard me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid. And Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said, Father, I thank thee that thou hast heard me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I come to do thy will, O God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said I, Lo, I come (in the volume of the book it is written of me,) to do thy will, O God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not my will, but thine, be done.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As he is, so are we in this world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy name shall he called Israel: for as a prince hast thou power with God and with men, and hast prevailed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Thy name shall be called no more Jacob, but Israel: for as a prince hast thou power with God and with men, and hast prevailed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By his strength he had power with God: yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He took his brother by the heel in the womb, and by his strength he had power with God: Yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him in Beth–el, and there he spake with us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: [Abraham] staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Have faith in God. For verily I say unto you, That whosoever shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass; he shall have whatsoever he saith. Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, increase our faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, abide in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. Let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord. A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel: which is not another. Though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For all the promises of God in him are yea, and in him, Amen, unto the glory of God by us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all the promises of God in him are yea, and in him Amen, unto the glory of God by us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is . . . longsuffering, gentleness . . .
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD, the LORD God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant in goodness and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord passed by before him, and proclaimed, The Lord, The Lord God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant in goodness and truth,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called, with all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be entreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be entreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Charity suffereth long, and is kind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be patient therefore, brethren, unto the coming of the Lord. Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain. Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be patient therefore, brethren, unto the coming of the Lord. Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Emmanuel, . . . God with us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth? behold, heaven and the heaven of heavens cannot contain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth? behold, heaven and the heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house which I have built!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The first day of the week, when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled . . . came Jesus and stood in the midst. Then were the disciples glad, when they saw the Lord. After eight days again his disciples were within, and Thomas with them. Then saith [Jesus] to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing. Thomas ... said.... My Lord and my God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then the same day at evening, being the first day of the week, when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews, came Jesus and stood in the midst, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto us a Son is given: . . . the mighty God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus shall ye eat it; with your loins girded, and ye shall eat it in haste; it is the Lord's passover.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thus shall ye eat it; with your loins girded, your shoes on your feet, and your staff in your hand; and ye shall eat it in haste: it is the Lord's passover.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning; and ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately. Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind.... I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus. Let us therefore, as many as be perfect, be thus minded.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All things are your's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved is mine.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My beloved is mine, and I am his: he feedeth among the lilies.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God ... loved me, and gave himself for me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD spake unto Aaron, Thou shalt have no inheritance in their land, neither shalt thou have any part among them: I am thy part and thine inheritance among the children of Israel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord spake unto Aaron, Thou shalt have no inheritance in their land, neither shalt thou have any part among them: I am thy part and thine inheritance among the children of Israel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee. My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Watch, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares. For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth. Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night. For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape. But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief. Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day; we are not of the night, nor of darkness. Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the Lord appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect. I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before, I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These words spake Jesus, I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil. I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil. I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former, and in this place will I give peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former, saith the Lord of hosts: and in this place will I give peace, saith the Lord of hosts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The house that is to be builded for the LORD must be exceeding magnifical, of fame and of glory throughout all countries.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And David said, Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house that is to be builded for the Lord must be exceeding magnifical, of fame and of glory throughout all countries: I will therefore now make preparation for it. So David prepared abundantly before his death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The glory of the LORD ... filled the LORD'S house.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the priests could not enter into the house of the Lord, because the glory of the Lord had filled the Lord's house.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up. He spake of the temple of his body.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up. But he spake of the temple of his body.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That which was made glorious had no glory in this respect, by reason of the glory that excelleth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect, by reason of the glory that excelleth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Prince of Peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is our peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us put on the armour of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put ... on the Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That I may win Christ, and be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, The righteousness which is of God by faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath covered me with the robe of righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will go in the strength of the Lord God: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were sometime darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light. Have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them. All things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light. Awake thou that steepest, and rise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light. See then that ye walk circumspectly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.
