MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive it, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received it? I Cor 4:7
MORNING.verse_kjv: For who maketh thee to differ from another? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive it, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received it?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: not of works, lest any man should boast. For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But who am I, and what is my people, that we should be able to offer so willingly after this sort? for all things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works: and that my soul knoweth right well. My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret. Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Have we not all one father? hath not one God created us? Mal 2:10
EVENING.verse_kjv: Have we not all one father? hath not one God created us? why do we deal treacherously every man against his brother, by profaning the covenant of our fathers?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In him we live, and move, and have our being.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He, being full of compassion, forgave their iniquity, and destroyed them not: yea, many a time turned he his anger away, and did not stir up all his wrath. For he remembered that they were but flesh; a wind that passeth away, and cometh not again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he, being full of compassion, forgave their iniquity, and destroyed them not: yea, many a time turned he his anger away, and did not stir up all his wrath.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He will rest in his love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD did not set his love upon you, nor choose you, because ye were more in number than any people; for ye were the fewest of all people: but because the Lord loved you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord did not set his love upon you, nor choose you, because ye were more in number than any people; for ye were the fewest of all people:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We love him, because he first loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: You ... hath he reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God commendeth his love toward us, in that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His Son ... who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A new and living way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cain went out from the presence of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Cain went out from the presence of the Lord, and dwelt in the land of Nod, on the east of Eden.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without holiness, no man shall see the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the way, and the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our Saviour Jesus Christ ... hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Holy Ghost this signifying, that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Men ought always to pray, and not to faint.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he spake a parable unto them to this end, that men ought always to pray, and not to faint;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at midnight, and say unto him, Friend, lend me three loaves; for a friend of mine in his journey is come to me, and I have nothing to set before him? And he from within shall answer and say, Trouble me not: the door is now shut, and my children are with me in bed; I cannot rise and give thee. I say unto you, Though he will not rise and give him, because he is his friend, yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at midnight, and say unto him, Friend, lend me three loaves;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not let thee go, except thou bless me. As a prince hast thou power with God and with men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me. And he said, Thy name shall be called no more Jacob, but Israel: for as a prince hast thou power with God and with men, and hast prevailed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: [Jesus] went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Forgive all my sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (then saith he to the sick of the palsy,) Arise, take up thy bed, and go unto thine house.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having forgiven you all trespasses; blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my soul.... who forgiveth all thine iniquities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord made all that he did to prosper In his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And his master saw that the Lord was with him, and that the Lord made all that he did to prosper in his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways. For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is every one that feareth the Lord; that walketh in his ways.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed. Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As long as he sought the LORD, God made him to prosper.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he sought God in the days of Zechariah, who had understanding in the visions of God: and as long as he sought the Lord, God made him to prosper.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beware that thou forget not the LORD thy God, in not keeping his commandments, and his judgments, and his statutes, which I command thee this day: and thou say in thine heart, My power and the might of mine hand hath gotten me this wealth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beware that thou forget not the Lord thy God, in not keeping his commandments, and his judgments, and his statutes, which I command thee this day: And thou say in thine heart, My power and the might of mine hand hath gotten me this wealth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Is not the LORD your God with you? and hath he not given you rest on every side? I Chron 22:18
MORNING.verse_kjv: Is not the Lord your God with you? and hath he not given you rest on every side? for he hath given the inhabitants of the land into mine hand; and the land is subdued before the Lord, and before his people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why reason ye these things in your hearts? Mark 2:8
EVENING.verse_kjv: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves, he said unto them, Why reason ye these things in your hearts?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being not weak in faith, [Abraham] considered not his own body now dead, when he was about an hundred years old, neither yet the deadness of Sarah's womb; he staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And being not weak in faith, he considered not his own body now dead, when he was about an hundred years old, neither yet the deadness of Sara's womb:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and take up thy bed, and walk? Mark 2:9
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and take up thy bed, and walk?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith? Mark 4:40
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the fowls of the air; ... your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they? Matt 6:26Why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread? Do ye not ...
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they? Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Never man spake like this man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord GOD hath given me the tongue of the learned, that I should know how to speak a word in season to him that is weary.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord God hath given me the tongue of the learned, that I should know how to speak a word in season to him that is weary: he wakeneth morning by morning, he wakeneth mine ear to hear as the learned.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His mouth is most sweet: yea, he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, and this is my friend.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His mouth is most sweet: yea, he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, and this is my friend, O daughters of Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He taught them as one having authority, and not as the scribes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he taught them as one having authority, and not as the scribes.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sword of the Spirit ... is the word of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword, piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit, and of the joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds; casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds;)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The triumphing of the wicked is short.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt bruise his heel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is your hour, and the power of darkness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour: whom resist stedfast in the faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth. The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The devil ... was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone.... and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are, and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The younger son took his journey into a far country, and there wasted his substance with riotous living.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together, and took his journey into a far country, and there wasted his substance with riotous living.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ... were by nature the children of wrath, even as others. But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;) and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. If; when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors: the one owed five hundred pence, and the other fifty. And when they had nothing to pay, he frankly forgave them both.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors: the one owed five hundred pence, and the other fifty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I forgave thee all that debt; shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellow-servant, even as I had pity on thee? Matt 18:32-33
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses. But if ye do not forgive, neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put on.... as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering; forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times? Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Charity ... is the bond of perfectness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy. He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever. He hath not dealt with us after our sins; not rewarded us according to our iniquities. For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him. As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us. Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father. The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father. The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye who sometime were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellow-citizens with the saints, and of the household of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I make all things new.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he that sat upon the throne said, Behold, I make all things new. And he said unto me, Write: for these words are true and faithful.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man be in Christ, he is a new creature; old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the LORD shall name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the Lord shall name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ...
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved, what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every thing that may abide the fire, ye shall make it go through the fire, and it shall be clean.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Every thing that may abide the fire, ye shall make it go through the fire, and it shall be clean: nevertheless it shall be purified with the water of separation: and all that abideth not the fire ye shall make go through the water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD your God proveth you, to know whether ye love the LORD your God with all your heart, and with all your soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not hearken unto the words of that prophet, or that dreamer of dreams: for the Lord your God proveth you, to know whether ye love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the LORD an offering in righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the Lord an offering in righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will turn my hand upon thee, and purely purge away thy dross, and take away all thy tin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will turn my hand upon thee, and purely purge away thy dross, and take away all thy tin:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will melt them, and try them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts, Behold, I will melt them, and try them; for how shall I do for the daughter of my people?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou, O God, hast proved us; thou hast tried us, as silver is tried. We went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou, O God, hast proved us: thou hast tried us, as silver is tried. Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put off, concerning the former conversation, the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts; and be renewed in the spirit of your mind; and ... put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life. Knowing this, that our old man is crucified with him, that the body of sin might be destroyed, that henceforth we should not serve sin. For he that is dead is freed from sin. Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our LORD. Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof; but yield yourselves unto God, as those that are alive from the dead, and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life. Knowing this, that our old man is crucified with him, that the body of sin might be destroyed, that henceforth we should not serve sin. For he that is dead is freed from sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abide in me, and I in you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not. O wretched man that I am who shall deliver me from the body of this death? I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not. O wretched man that I am! who shall deliver me from the body of this death? I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord. So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God; but with the flesh the law of sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If Christ be in you, the body is dead because of sin; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if Christ be in you, the body is dead because of sin; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his corning.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Dost thou believe on the Son of God? John 9:35
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him? John 9:36
EVENING.verse_kjv: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords; who only hath immortality, dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom be honour and power everlasting. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which in his times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords; Who only hath immortality, dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom be honour and power everlasting. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, I believe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I lay in Sion a chief corner stone, elect, precious: and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded. Unto you therefore which believe he is precious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture, Behold, I lay in Sion a chief corner stone, elect, precious: and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded. Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fellowship of his sufferings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For if we be dead with him, we shall also live with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is a faithful saying: For if we be dead with him, we shall also live with him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: that by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: That by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Martha, Martha, thou art careful and troubled about many things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answered and said unto her, Martha, Martha, thou art careful and troubled about many things:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap. Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not. Seek not ye what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, neither be ye of doubtful mind. Your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap; which neither have storehouse nor barn; and God feedeth them: how much more are ye better than the fowls? Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these. And seek not ye what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, neither be ye of doubtful mind.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having food and raiment let us be therewith content. . . . They that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition. For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The cares of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, and the lusts of other things entering in, choke the word, and it becometh unfruitful.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the cares of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, and the lusts of other things entering in, choke the word, and it becometh unfruitful.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The secret things belong unto the Lord our God: but those things which are revealed belong unto us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The secret things belong unto the Lord our God: but those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children for ever, that we may do all the words of this law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me. Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me. Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him: and he will shew them his covenant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is a God in heaven that revealeth secrets.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But there is a God in heaven that revealeth secrets, and maketh known to the king Nebuchadnezzar what shall be in the latter days. Thy dream, and the visions of thy head upon thy bed, are these;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? Job 26:14
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye love me, keep my commandments. And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever; even the Spirit of truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye love me, keep my commandments.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit ... maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us: and if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the will of God, even your sanctification.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath ... called us ... unto holiness: ... who hath also given unto us his Holy Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness. He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice evermore. Pray without ceasing. In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you. Quench not the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice evermore.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: See that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise, redeeming the times because the days are evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise, Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take diligent heed to do the commandment and the law.... to love the LORD your God, and to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and to cleave unto him, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But take diligent heed to do the commandment and the law, which Moses the servant of the Lord charged you, to love the Lord your God, and to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and to cleave unto him, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time. Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time. Let your speech be always with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept. And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him. Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept. And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him. Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure; for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching: verily I say unto you, that he shall gird himself, and make them to sit down to meat, and will come forth and serve them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For she said within herself, If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean. I will; be thou clean.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, there came a leper and worshipped him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean. And Jesus put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Faith as a grain of mustard seed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cast not away . . . your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. It is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: First the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself; first the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So run, that ye may obtain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith: henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests he made known unto God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit ... helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All thy works shall praise thee, O Lord; and thy saints shall bless thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All thy works shall praise thee, O Lord; and thy saints shall bless thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my SOUL and all that is within me, bless his holy name. Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name. Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee. Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name. My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My soul doth magnify the Lord, and my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord, And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark, and there I will meet with thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee. And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Holy Ghost this signifying, that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus, when he had cried again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost. And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus, when he had cried again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost. And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having ... brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; ... let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus: whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation [mercy seat] through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Through him we . . . have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Faith as a grain of mustard seed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Barak said unto [Deborah I, if thou wilt go with me, then I will go: but if thou wilt not go with me, then I will not go. God subdued on that day Jabin the king of Canaan.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Barak said unto her, If thou wilt go with me, then I will go: but if thou wilt not go with me, then I will not go. So God subdued on that day Jabin the king of Canaan before the children of Israel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Gideon ... feared his father's household, and the men of the city, that he could not do it by day... did it by night. And Gideon said unto God, If thou wilt save Israel by mine hand, as thou hast said.... let me prove, I pray thee. And God did so.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Gideon took ten men of his servants, and did as the Lord had said unto him: and so it was, because he feared his father's household, and the men of the city, that he could not do it by day, that he did it by night. And Gideon said unto God, If thou wilt save Israel by mine hand, as thou hast said, And Gideon said unto God, Let not thine anger be hot against me, and I will speak but this once: let me prove, I pray thee, but this once with the fleece; let it now be dry only upon the fleece, and upon all the ground let there be dew.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who hath despised the day of small things? Zech 4:10
EVENING.verse_kjv: For who hath despised the day of small things? for they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel with those seven; they are the eyes of the Lord, which run to and fro through the whole earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, increase our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon. His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon. His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And there shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth, neither whatsoever worketh abomination, or maketh a lie: but they which are written in the Lamb's book of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is no spot in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art all fair, my love; there is no spot in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall be holy: for I the LORD your God am holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Speak unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, and say unto them, Ye shall be holy: for I the Lord your God am holy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance: but as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy. And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts; and be renewed in the spirit of your mind; and ... put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Gold tried in the fire.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and that the shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's, but he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's, But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations that the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the world ye shall have tribulation but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take this child away, and nurse it for me, and I will give thee thy wages.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Pharaoh's daughter said unto her, Take this child away, and nurse it for me, and I will give thee thy wages. And the woman took the child, and nursed it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Go ye ... into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love.... in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, when saw we thee an hungered, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink? When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee? And the King shall answer and say unto them.... Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me. Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink? When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee? And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou compassest my path and my lying down.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jacob awaked out of his sleep, and he said, Surely the LORD is in this place; and I knew it not. And he was afraid, and said, How dreadful is this place! this is none other but the house of God, and this is the gate of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jacob awaked out of his sleep, and he said, Surely the Lord is in this place; and I knew it not. And he was afraid, and said, How dreadful is this place! this is none other but the house of God, and this is the gate of heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The eyes of the LORD run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him. Herein thou hast done foolishly: therefore from henceforth thou shalt have wars.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only, makest me dwell in safety.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation; there shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling. For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid: yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid: yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So he giveth his beloved sleep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ suffered for us, leaving us an example that ye should follow his steps.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever of you will be the chiefest, shall be servant of all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest, shall be servant of all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus of Nazareth ... went about doing good.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The meekness and gentleness of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence am base among you, but being absent am bold toward you:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Father, forgive them: for they know not what they do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tender-hearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that saith he abideth in him, ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sought him, but I could not find him: I called him: but he gave me no answer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O Lord, what shall I say, when Israel turneth their backs before their enemies And the LORD said unto Joshua, Get thee up; wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face? Israel hath sinned.... for they have even taken of the accursed thing.... and they have put it even among their own stuff.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, what shall I say, when Israel turneth their backs before their enemies! And the Lord said unto Joshua, Get thee up; wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face?
