Israel hath sinned, and they have also transgressed my covenant which I commanded them: for they have even taken of the accursed thing, and have also stolen, and dissembled also, and they have put it even among their own stuff.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the LORD'S hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear: but your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, the Lord's hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God. And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God. And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How shall we, that are dead to sin, live any longer therein? Rom 6:2
MORNING.verse_kjv: God forbid. How shall we, that are dead to sin, live any longer therein?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am crucified with Christ, nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh, I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because I live, ye shall live also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold how he loved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said the Jews, Behold how he loved him!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He died for all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He ... liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I go to prepare a place for you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now before the feast of the passover, when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father, having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We love him, because he first loved us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: and that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, even the Spirit of truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever; Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit.... helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shall I not seek rest for thee, that it may be well with thee? Ruth 3:1
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Naomi her mother in law said unto her, My daughter, shall I not seek rest for thee, that it may be well with thee?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth ... a rest to the people of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They ... rest from their labours.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Write, Blessed are the dead which die in the Lord from henceforth: Yea, saith the Spirit, that they may rest from their labours; and their works do follow them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus, made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus, made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In returning and rest shall ye be saved; in quietness and in confidence shall be your strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord God, the Holy One of Israel; In returning and rest shall ye be saved; in quietness and in confidence shall be your strength: and ye would not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The ark of the covenant of the Lord went before them to search out a resting place for them, Num 10:33
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they departed from the mount of the Lord three days' journey: and the ark of the covenant of the Lord went before them in the three days' journey, to search out a resting place for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My times are in thy hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall choose our inheritance for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness; ... make thy way straight before my face.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lead me, O Lord, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures; he leadeth me beside the still waters.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Master, where dwellest thou? He saith unto them, Come and see.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where dwellest thou? He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was about the tenth hour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself-, that where I am, there ye may be also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When he shall appear, we shall he like him; for we shall see him as he is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ . . . shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have trodden the winepress alone; and of the people there was none with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have trodden the winepress alone; and of the people there was none with me: for I will tread them in mine anger, and trample them in my fury; and their blood shall be sprinkled upon my garments, and I will stain all my raiment.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given, and the government shall be upon his shoulder and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let all the angels of God worship him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And again, when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world, he saith, And let all the angels of God worship him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: King of kings, and Lord of lords.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND Lord OF LORDS.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil! And God granted him that which he requested.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blessing of the LORD, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When he giveth quietness, who then can make trouble? and when he hideth his face, who then can behold him? Job 34:29
MORNING.verse_kjv: When he giveth quietness, who then can make trouble? and when he hideth his face, who then can behold him? whether it be done against a nation, or against a man only:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD: thy blessing is upon thy people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Salvation belongeth unto the Lord: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men! Psa 31:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you: for every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is a night to be much observed unto the Lord for bringing them out from the land of Egypt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is a night to be much observed unto the Lord for bringing them out from the land of Egypt: this is that night of the Lord to be observed of all the children of Israel in their generations.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread: and when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said, Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me. After the same manner also he took the cup, when he had supped, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood: this do ye, as oft as ye drink it, in remembrance of me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He ... kneeled down, and prayed. And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone's cast, and kneeled down, and prayed, And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour:..... they took Jesus, and led him away; . . . into a place called.... Golgotha: where they crucified him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour: and he saith unto the Jews, Behold your King!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ our passover is sacrificed for us: therefore let us keep the feast.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us: Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall he able to stand? Rev 6:17
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who may abide the day of his coming? and who shall stand when he appeareth? for he is like a refiner's fire, and like fullers' soap.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But who may abide the day of his coming? and who shall stand when he appeareth? for he is like a refiner's fire, and like fullers' soap:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands. These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb. They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat. For the Lamb, which is in the midst of the throne, shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let Him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Or let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know that my Redeemer liveth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know that my redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But this man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because I live, ye shall live also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable. But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable. But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers; but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers; But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed therefore how ye hear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Take heed therefore how ye hear: for whosoever hath, to him shall be given; and whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them. How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth! Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments. How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth! Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His commandments are not grievous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the will of him that sent me, that every one which seeth the Son, and believeth on him, may have everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is the will of him that sent me, that every one which seeth the Son, and believeth on him, may have everlasting life: and I will raise him up at the last day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye love me, keep my commandments.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye love me, keep my commandments.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding. Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding. Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I delight in the law of God after the inward man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness' sake, O Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they shall teach no more every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the Lord: for they shall all know me, from the least of them unto the greatest of them, saith the Lord: for I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast in love to my soul delivered it from the pit of corruption: for thou hast cast all my sins behind thy back.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, for peace I had great bitterness: but thou hast in love to my soul delivered it from the pit of corruption: for thou hast cast all my sins behind thy back.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity? ... he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, ... to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My son, despise not thou the chastening of the Lord, nor faint when thou art rebuked of him: for whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children, My son, despise not thou the chastening of the Lord, nor faint when thou art rebuked of him: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom the Lord loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He maketh sore, and bindeth up: he woundeth, and his hands make whole.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he maketh sore, and bindeth up: he woundeth, and his hands make whole.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have chosen thee in the furnace of affliction.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I have refined thee, but not with silver; I have chosen thee in the furnace of affliction.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities. For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him. As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us. Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is in heaven, and thou upon earth therefore let thy words be few.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be not rash with thy mouth, and let not thine heart be hasty to utter any thing before God: for God is in heaven, and thou upon earth: therefore let thy words be few.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking. Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of before ye ask him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking. Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They ... called on the name of Baal from morning even until noon, saying, O Baal, hear us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they took the bullock which was given them, and they dressed it, and called on the name of Baal from morning even until noon, saying, O Baal, hear us. But there was no voice, nor any that answered. And they leaped upon the altar which was made.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Two men went up into the temple to pray; the one a Pharisee, and the other a publican. The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself, God, I thank thee, that I am not as other men are, extortioners, unjust, adulterers, or even as this publican. And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying, God be merciful to me a sinner. I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Two men went up into the temple to pray; the one a Pharisee, and the other a publican. The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself, God, I thank thee, that I am not as other men are, extortioners, unjust, adulterers, or even as this publican. And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying, God be merciful to me a sinner.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, teach us to pray.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is goodness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... followers of God, as dear children.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you; that ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you; That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared, not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Eben-ezer ... Hitherto hath the Lord helped us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Samuel took a stone, and set it between Mizpah and Shen, and called the name of it Eben–ezer, saying, Hitherto hath the Lord helped us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I was brought low, and he helped me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications. The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the Lord, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications. The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in princes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He led them forth by the rightway, that they might go to a city of habitation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There failed not ought of any good thing which the LORD had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There failed not ought of any good thing which the Lord had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the ordinance of the passover: There shall no stranger eat thereof.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said unto Moses and Aaron, This is the ordinance of the passover: There shall no stranger eat thereof:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: At that time ye were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise. But now, in Christ Jesus, ye who sometime were far off, are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That at that time ye were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For he is our peace, who hath made both one.... having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, so making peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us; Having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, so making peace;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellow-citizens with the saints, and of the household of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [Jesus] prayed the third time, saying the same words.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he left them, and went away again, and prayed the third time, saying the same words.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who in the days of his flesh ... offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who in the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard in that he feared;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Continuing instant in prayer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Delight thyself ... in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart. Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart. Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Things which are despised, hath God chosen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, yea, and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, are not all these which speak Galilaeans? Acts 2:7
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they were all amazed and marvelled, saying one to another, Behold, are not all these which speak Galilaeans?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus.... saw two brethren.... casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers. And he saith unto them, Follow me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers. And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man's wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power: that your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man's wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit. He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you. I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Leaning on Jesus' bosom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now there was leaning on Jesus' bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They brought young children to him, that he should touch them. And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they brought young children to him, that he should touch them: and his disciples rebuked those that brought them. And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus called his disciples unto him, and said, I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat; and I will not send them away fasting, test they faint in the way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him, and said, I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat: and I will not send them away fasting, lest they faint in the way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A high Priest ... touched with the feeling of our infirmities.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In his love and in his pity he redeemed them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not leave you comfortless (marg. orphans): I will come to you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ the righteous: the propitiation for our sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be. And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee. I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they met Moses and Aaron, who stood in the way, as they came forth from Pharaoh:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land. Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand? But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared. Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption. And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared. Let Israel hope in the Lord: for with the Lord there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption. And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All have sinned, and come short of the glory of God; being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus: whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have known and believed the love that God hath to us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;) and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus: that in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We love him, because he first loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We love him, because he first loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord of glory, with respect of persons.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord of glory, with respect of persons.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no man seek his own, but every man another's wealth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no man seek his own, but every man another's wealth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having food and raiment let us be therewith content. But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content. But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise: and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty; and base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, yea, and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are: that no flesh should glory in his presence.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your speech be alway with grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your speech be always with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A word fitly spoken is like apples of gold in pictures of silver. As an earring of gold, and an ornament of fine gold, so is a wise reprover upon an obedient ear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A word fitly spoken is like apples of gold in pictures of silver. As an earring of gold, and an ornament of fine gold, so is a wise reprover upon an obedient ear.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things. By thy words thou shalt be justified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things. For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The tongue of the wise is health.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They that feared the LORD spake often one to another: and the LORD hearkened, and heard it, and a book of remembrance was written before him for them that feared the LORD, and that thought upon his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then they that feared the Lord spake often one to another: and the Lord hearkened, and heard it, and a book of remembrance was written before him for them that feared the Lord, and that thought upon his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If thou take forth the precious from the vile, thou shalt be as my mouth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord, If thou return, then will I bring thee again, and thou shalt stand before me: and if thou take forth the precious from the vile, thou shalt be as my mouth: let them return unto thee; but return not thou unto them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore, as ye abound in every thing, in faith, and utterance, and knowledge, and in all diligence, see that ye abound in this grace also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, as ye abound in every thing, in faith, and utterance, and knowledge, and in all diligence, and in your love to us, see that ye abound in this grace also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your Father which is in heaven: maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... followers of God, as dear children; and walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling savour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children; And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ constraineth us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again; and your reward shall be great, and ye shall be the children of the Highest: for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil. Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again; and your reward shall be great, and ye shall be the children of the Highest: for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil. Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then was Jesus led up of the spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard in that he feared; though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered; and being made perfect, he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who in the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard in that he feared;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of man came to give his life a ransom for many.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh: how much more shall the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God, purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God? Heb 9:13, 14
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is brought as a lamb to the slaughter.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, yet he opened not his mouth: he is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, so he openeth not his mouth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I lay down my life for the sheep. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the Father knoweth me, even so know I the Father: and I lay down my life for the sheep. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar, to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without shedding of blood is no remission.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood; and without shedding of blood is no remission.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: While we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me. Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me. Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
