MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And he arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have blotted out as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou hast a few names even in Sardis which have not defiled their garments; and they shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ: not by water only, but by water and blood.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee? Psa 94:20
EVENING.verse_kjv: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee, which frameth mischief by a law?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: An high priest ... holy, harmless, undefiled.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The prince of the power of the air, the spirit now worketh in the children of disobedience.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not. And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not. And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are all as an unclean thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have put off the old man with his deeds; and have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds; And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not having mine own righteousness which is of the law, but ... the righteousness which is of God by faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the father said to his servants, Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him; and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fine linen is the righteousness of saints.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will greatly rejoice in the LORD, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The day shall declare it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why dost thou judge thy brother? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ. So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God. Let us not therefore judge one another any more.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But why dost thou judge thy brother? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ. So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God. Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son: and hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Great, the Mighty God, the LORD of hosts, is his name, great in counsel, and mighty in work: for thine eyes are open upon all the ways of the sons of men: to give every one according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shewest lovingkindness unto thousands, and recompensest the iniquity of the fathers into the bosom of their children after them: the Great, the Mighty God, the Lord of hosts, is his name, Great in counsel, and mighty in work: for thine eyes are open upon all the ways of the sons of men: to give every one according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The disciple is not above his master.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The disciple is not above his master, nor the servant above his lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world John 17:14.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds. Ye have not yet resisted unto blood, striving against sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds. Ye have not yet resisted unto blood, striving against sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My son, give me thine heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My son, give me thine heart, and let thine eyes observe my ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my commandments always, that it might be well with them, and with their children for ever! Deut 5:29
EVENING.verse_kjv: O that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my commandments always, that it might be well with them, and with their children for ever!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy heart is not right in the sight of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter: for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be. So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be. So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They ... first gave their own selves to the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this they did, not as we hoped, but first gave their own selves to the Lord, and unto us by the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In every work that [Hezekiah] began ... to seek his God, he did it with all his heart, and prospered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in every work that he began in the service of the house of God, and in the law, and in the commandments, to seek his God, he did it with all his heart, and prospered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart; with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart; With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am with thee to save thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will make thee unto this people a fenced brasen wall: and they shall fight against thee, but they shall not prevail against thee: for I am with thee to save thee and to deliver thee, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Shall the prey be taken from the mighty, or the lawful captive delivered? But thus saith the LORD, Even the captives of the mighty shall be taken away, and the prey of the terrible shall be delivered: for I will contend with him that contendeth with thee. And all flesh shall know that I the LORD am thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the mighty One of Jacob.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Shall the prey be taken from the mighty, or the lawful captive delivered?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; to see thy power and thy glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the Lord: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat. For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat. For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures.
EVENING.verse_kjv: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My people shall be satisfied with my goodness, saith the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will satiate the soul of the priests with fatness, and my people shall be satisfied with my goodness, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee. The LORD, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee. And the Lord, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed for the LORD thy God is with thee, withersoever thou goest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; and them which suffer adversity, as being yourselves also in the body. So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our sufficiency is of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lead us not into temptation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My times are in thy hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How forcible are right words! Job 6:25
EVENING.verse_kjv: How forcible are right words! but what doth your arguing reprove?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that feared the LORD spake often one to another: and the LORD hearkened, and heard it, and a book of remembrance was written before him for them that feared the LORD and that thought upon his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then they that feared the Lord spake often one to another: and the Lord hearkened, and heard it, and a book of remembrance was written before him for them that feared the Lord, and that thought upon his name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Two are better than one; because they have a good reward for their labour. For if they fall, the one will lift up his fellow: but woe to him that is alone when he falleth; for he hath not another to help him up.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Two are better than one; because they have a good reward for their labour. For if they fall, the one will lift up his fellow: but woe to him that is alone when he falleth; for he hath not another to help him up.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let ... no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ. Considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ. Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am my Beloved's, and His desire is toward me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am my beloved's, and his desire is toward me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD taketh pleasure in his people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My delights were with the sons of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoicing in the habitable part of his earth; and my delights were with the sons of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His great love wherewith he loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seek ye out of the book of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seek ye out of the book of the Lord, and read: no one of these shall fail, none shall want her mate: for my mouth it hath commanded, and his spirit it hath gathered them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul, and bind them for a sign upon your hand, that they may be as frontlets between your eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore shall ye lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul, and bind them for a sign upon your hand, that they may be as frontlets between your eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Concerning the works of men, by the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have ... a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O generation of vipers, how can ye, being evil, speak good things? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Death and life are in the power of the tongue.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Death and life are in the power of the tongue: and they that love it shall eat the fruit thereof.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment. The law of his God is in his heart: none of his steps shall slide.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment. The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I believed, therefore have I spoken.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever ... shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: With the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down! Isa 64:1
EVENING.verse_kjv: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down, that the mountains might flow down at thy presence,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Make haste, my beloved, and be thou like to a roe or to a young hart upon the mountains of spices.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Make haste, my beloved, and be thou like to a roe or to a young hart upon the mountains of spices.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly; Amen. even so, come, Lord Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the LORD; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the Lord; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word. Bless ye the LORD, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word. Bless ye the Lord, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not the hearers of the law are just before God, but the doers of the law shall be justified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For not the hearers of the law are just before God, but the doers of the law shall be justified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The ear trieth words, as the mouth tasteth meat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the ear trieth words, as the mouth tasteth meat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I speak as to wise men; judge ye what I say.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I speak as to wise men; judge ye what I say.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is spiritual judgeth all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things, yet he himself is judged of no man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed what ye hear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Take heed what ye hear: with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you: and unto you that hear shall more be given.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know thy works, ... and how ... thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out. And when he putteth forth his own sheep, he goeth before them, and the sheep follow him: for they know his voice. And a stranger will they not follow, but will flee from him: for they know not the voice of strangers.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To him the porter openeth; and the sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall be unto me a kingdom of priests, and a holy nation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye shall be unto me a kingdom of priests, and an holy nation. These are the words which thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation; and hast made us unto our God kings and priests.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation; And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall be named the Priests of the LORD: men shall call you the Ministers of our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye shall be named the Priests of the Lord: men shall call you the Ministers of our God: ye shall eat the riches of the Gentiles, and in their glory shall ye boast yourselves.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Priests of God and of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection: on such the second death hath no power, but they shall be priests of God and of Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We made our prayer unto our God, and set a watch against them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we made our prayer unto our God, and set a watch against them day and night, because of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you. Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour: whom resist stedfast in the faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say? Luke 6:46
EVENING.verse_kjv: And why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto the children of Israel, that they go forward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said unto Moses, Wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto the children of Israel, that they go forward:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art a gracious God, and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repentest thee of the evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he prayed unto the Lord, and said, I pray thee, O Lord, was not this my saying, when I was yet in my country? Therefore I fled before unto Tarshish: for I knew that thou art a gracious God, and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repentest thee of the evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech thee, let the power of my Lord be great, according as thou hast spoken, saying, The LORD is longsuffering, and of great mercy, forgiving iniquity and transgression, and by no means clearing the guilty; visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And now, I beseech thee, let the power of my Lord be great, according as thou hast spoken, saying, The Lord is longsuffering, and of great mercy, forgiving iniquity and transgression, and by no means clearing the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us. Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: for we are brought very low. Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, though our iniquities testify against us, do thou it for thy name's sake: for our backslidings are many; we have sinned against thee. We acknowledge, O LORD, our wickedness, and the iniquity of our fathers: for we have sinned against thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, though our iniquities testify against us, do thou it for thy name's sake: for our backslidings are many; we have sinned against thee. We acknowledge, O Lord, our wickedness, and the iniquity of our fathers: for we have sinned against thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O LORD, who shall stand? But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If thou, Lord, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand? But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctification of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you, brethren beloved of the Lord, because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Awake, O north wind; and come, thou south; blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O north wind; and come, thou south; blow upon my garden, that the spices thereof may flow out. Let my beloved come into his garden, and eat his pleasant fruits.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold this selfsame thing, that ye sorrowed after a godly sort, what carefulness it wrought in you, yea, what clearing of yourselves, yea, what indignation, yea, what fear, yea, what vehement desire, yea, what zeal, yea, what revenge! II Cor 7:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: For behold this selfsame thing, that ye sorrowed after a godly sort, what carefulness it wrought in you, yea, what clearing of yourselves, yea, what indignation, yea, what fear, yea, what vehement desire, yea, what zeal, yea, what revenge! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth: proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;) Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Comforter, is the Holy Ghost.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.
EVENING.verse_kjv: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To him the porter openeth; and the sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his; and, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ, depart from iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name? and in thy name have cast out devils? and in thy name done many wonderful works? And then will I profess unto them, I never knew you: depart from me, ye that work iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name? and in thy name have cast out devils? and in thy name done many wonderful works? And then will I profess unto them, I never knew you: depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD knoweth the way of the righteous; but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm: for love is strong as death; jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire, which hath a most vehement flame.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: She hath done what she could.
EVENING.verse_kjv: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This poor widow hath cast in more than they all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Of a truth I say unto you, that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If there be first a willing mind, it is accepted according to that a man hath, and not according to that he hath not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if there be first a willing mind, it is accepted according to that a man hath, and not according to that he hath not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food, and one of you say unto them, Depart in peace, be ye warmed and filled; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body; what doth it profit? James 2:15, 16
EVENING.verse_kjv: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which soweth bountifully, shall reap also bountifully. Every man according as he purposeth in his heart, so let him give; not grudgingly, or of necessity: for God loveth a cheerful giver.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But this I say, He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully. Every man according as he purposeth in his heart, so let him give; not grudgingly, or of necessity: for God loveth a cheerful giver.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy is his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy is his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O LORD, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders? Exod 15:11
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall not fear thee, O Lord and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hallowed be thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is this that cometh from Edom, with dyed garments from Bozrah? this that is glorious in his apparel, travelling in the greatness of his strength? I that speak in righteousness, mighty to save.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is this that cometh from Edom, with dyed garments from Bozrah? this that is glorious in his apparel, travelling in the greatness of his strength? I that speak in righteousness, mighty to save.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us.... be glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us, Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The dew of Hermon.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Mount Sion, which is Hermon.
EVENING.verse_kjv: From Aroer, which is by the bank of the river Arnon, even unto mount Sion, which is Hermon,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My doctrine shall drop as the rain, my speech shall distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My doctrine shall drop as the rain, my speech shall distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the rain cometh down, and the snow from heaven, and returneth not thither, but watereth the earth, and maketh it bring forth and bud, that it may give seed to the sower, and bread to the eater: so shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the rain cometh down, and the snow from heaven, and returneth not thither, but watereth the earth, and maketh it bring forth and bud, that it may give seed to the sower, and bread to the eater: So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is like the precious ointment upon the head ... even Aaron's ... that went down to the skirts of his garments.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus of Nazareth ... went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid. Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid. Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The joy of the LORD is your strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be filled with the Spirit; speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord; giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By him ... let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Although the fig tree shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labour of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: yet I will rejoice in the LORD, I will joy in the God of my salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Although the fig tree shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labour of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: Yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will joy in the God of my salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What profit is there of circumcision? Rom 3:1
MORNING.verse_kjv: What advantage then hath the Jew? or what profit is there of circumcision?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Much every way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Much every way: chiefly, because that unto them were committed the oracles of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Circumcise yourselves to the LORD, and take away the foreskins of your heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Circumcise yourselves to the Lord, and take away the foreskins of your heart, ye men of Judah and inhabitants of Jerusalem: lest my fury come forth like fire, and burn that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ... their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity: then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, to confirm the promises made unto the fathers.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, to confirm the promises made unto the fathers:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: You, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts; and be renewed in the spirit of your mind; and ... put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread: and when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said, Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread: And when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said, Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man, and drink his blood, ye have no life in you. Whoso eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, hath eternal life. He that eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, dwelleth in me, and I in him. As the living Father hath sent me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth me, even he shall live by me. Doth this offend you? What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before? It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man, and drink his blood, ye have no life in you. Whoso eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, hath eternal life; and I will raise him up at the last day. He that eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, dwelleth in me, and I in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; let us draw near.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was numbered with the transgressors.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore will I divide him a portion with the great, and he shall divide the spoil with the strong; because he hath poured out his soul unto death: and he was numbered with the transgressors; and he bare the sin of many, and made intercession for the transgressors.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But this man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood. Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: While we were yet sinners Christ died for us. Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch . . . as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin; that he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin; That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Keep yourselves in the love of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me. I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples. As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love. If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then cometh the end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then cometh the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God, even the Father; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of that day and that hour knoweth no man no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father. Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is. And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father. Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is. And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The coming of the Lord draweth nigh. The judge standeth before the door.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh. Grudge not one against another, brethren, lest ye be condemned: behold, the judge standeth before the door.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Surely I come quickly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ...
MORNING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved, what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning; and ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning; And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, pray for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Brethren, pray for us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is any sick among you? let him call for the elders of the church; and let them pray over him. And the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up. Pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much. Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are, and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain: and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months. And he prayed again, and the heaven gave rain, and the earth brought forth her fruit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is any sick among you? let him call for the elders of the church; and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;
