EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Patient in tribulation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is the LORD: let him do what seemeth him good.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the Lord: let him do what seemeth him good.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom, though I were righteous, yet would I not answer, but I would make supplication to my judge.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom, though I were righteous, yet would I not answer, but I would make supplication to my judge.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD gave, and the LORD hath taken away; blessed be the name of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said, Naked came I out of my mother's womb, and naked shall I return thither: the Lord gave, and the Lord hath taken away; blessed be the name of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What? shall we receive good at the hand of God, and shall we not receive evil? Job 2:10
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he said unto her, Thou speakest as one of the foolish women speaketh. What? shall we receive good at the hand of God, and shall we not receive evil? In all this did not Job sin with his lips.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus wept.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus wept.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not. Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth. Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth. Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and long-suffering with joyfulness.-In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Have faith in God. Whosoever shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass; he shall have whatsoever he saith. Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God, must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son, of whom it was said, That in Isaac shall thy seed be called: accounting that God was able to raise him up, even from the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By faith Abraham, when he was tried, offered up Isaac: and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is any thing too hard for the LORD? Gen 18:14
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is any thing too hard for the Lord? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: With God all things are possible.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, increase our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We know that we have passed from death unto life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God; who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God; Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him. Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him. Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: You hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Quickened . . . together with Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt shew me the path of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, I set before you the way of life, and the way of death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And unto this people thou shalt say, Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I set before you the way of life, and the way of death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will teach you the good and the right way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Moreover as for me, God forbid that I should sin against the Lord in ceasing to pray for you: but I will teach you the good and the right way:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Follow me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat: because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: An highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By faith Abraham, ... called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance, obeyed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By faith Abraham, when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance, obeyed; and he went out, not knowing whither he went.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall choose our inheritance for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye. As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: so the LORD alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He found him in a desert land, and in the waste howling wilderness; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD thy God which teacheth thee to profit, which leadeth thee by the way that thou shouldest go.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thus saith the Lord, thy Redeemer, the Holy One of Israel; I am the Lord thy God which teacheth thee to profit, which leadeth thee by the way that thou shouldest go.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who teacheth like Him? Job 36:22
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We walk by faith, not by sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Arise ye and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heavens are not clean in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, he putteth no trust in his saints; yea, the heavens are not clean in his sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness? Exod 15:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Holy, holy, holy, is the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And one cried unto another, and said, Holy, holy, holy, is the Lord of hosts: the whole earth is full of his glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Partakers of his holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure; but he for our profit, that we might be partakers of his holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness....
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved, what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying. And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers. And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ, who is the image of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The glory of the LORD shall be revealed, and all flesh shall see it together.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the glory of the Lord shall be revealed, and all flesh shall see it together: for the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him. And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him. And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath seen me hath seen the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God was manifest in the flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins: who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And as we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I am weak, then am I strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Asa cried unto the LORD his God, and said, LORD, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power: help us, O LORD our God; for we rest on thee, and in thy name we go against this multitude. O LORD, thou art our God; let not man prevail against thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Asa cried unto the Lord his God, and said, Lord, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power: help us, O Lord our God; for we rest on thee, and in thy name we go against this multitude. O Lord, thou art our God; let not man prevail against thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jehoshaphat cried out, and the LORD helped him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, when the captains of the chariots saw Jehoshaphat, that they said, It is the king of Israel. Therefore they compassed about him to fight: but Jehoshaphat cried out, and the Lord helped him; and God moved them to depart from him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in princes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength. An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength. An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Walk in love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love covereth all sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hatred stirreth up strifes: but love covereth all sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again; and your reward shall be great, and ye shall be the children of the Highest: for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tender-hearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let your requests be made known unto God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There was given to me a thorn in the flesh. For this thing I besought the Lord thrice, that it might depart from me. And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, the messenger of Satan to buffet me, lest I should be exalted above measure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hannah ... was in bitterness of soul, and prayed unto the Lord and wept sore. And she vowed a vow and said, O Lord of hosts, if thou wilt indeed look on the affliction of thine handmaid, and ... wilt give unto thine handmaid a man child, then I will give him unto the Lord all the days of his life. The LORD remembered her.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh, and after they had drunk. Now Eli the priest sat upon a seat by a post of the temple of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We know not what we should pray for as we ought.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall choose our inheritance for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down, that the mountains might flow down at thy presence,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Make haste, my beloved, and be thou like to a roe or to a young hart upon the mountains of spices.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Make haste, my beloved, and be thou like to a roe or to a young hart upon the mountains of spices.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ourselves groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not only they, but ourselves also, which have the firstfruits of the Spirit, even we ourselves groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bow thy heavens, O LORD, and come down: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bow thy heavens, O Lord, and come down: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the LORD; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the Lord; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That blessed hope.... the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No weapon that is formed against thee shall prosper; and every tongue that shall rise against thee in judgment thou shalt condemn. This is the heritage of the servants of the LORD, and their righteousness is of me, saith the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: No weapon that is formed against thee shall prosper; and every tongue that shall rise against thee in judgment thou shalt condemn. This is the heritage of the servants of the Lord, and their righteousness is of me, saith the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them. O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodlv heritage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you that fear my name shall the Sun of righteousness arise with healing in his wings; and ye shall go forth, and grow up as calves of the stall.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But unto you that fear my name shall the Sun of righteousness arise with healing in his wings; and ye shall go forth, and grow up as calves of the stall.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Get wisdom, get understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wisdom that is from above.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be entreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The depth saith, It is not in me: and the sea saith, It is not with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The depth saith, It is not in me: and the sea saith, It is not with me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life. For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life. For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath quickened us together with Christ.... and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seek ye the LORD, all ye meek of the earth, which have wrought his judgment; seek righteousness, seek meekness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Seek ye the Lord, all ye meek of the earth, which have wrought his judgment; seek righteousness, seek meekness: it may be ye shall be hid in the day of the Lord's anger.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Nicodemus ... he that came to Jesus by night.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Peter followed him afar off.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest's palace, and went in, and sat with the servants, to see the end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Among the chief rulers also many believed on him; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue: for they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the LORD shall be safe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Faith as a grain of mustard seed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind. Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind. Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever ... shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou therefore endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have given him for a witness to the people, a leader and commander to the people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I have given him for a witness to the people, a leader and commander to the people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We do not war after the flesh: (for the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For though we walk in the flesh, we do not war after the flesh:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The unity of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is one body, and one Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father. Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellow-citizens with the saints, and of the household of God; and are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone; in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord: in whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity! It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard; that went down to the skirts of his garments.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity! It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, I believe; help thou mine unbelief.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And straightway the father of the child cried out, and said with tears, Lord, I believe; help thou mine unbelief.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith worketh by love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith without works is dead.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We walk by faith, not by sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory; receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory: Receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is very pitiful, and of tender mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, we count them happy which endure. Ye have heard of the patience of Job, and have seen the end of the Lord; that the Lord is very pitiful, and of tender mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is gracious and full of compassion. He will ever be mindful of his covenant.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the Lord is gracious and full of compassion. He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that keepeth thee will not slumber. Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber. Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: so the Lord alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: So the Lord alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is of the Lord's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The very hairs of your head are all numbered. Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father. Fear ye not therefore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father. Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your lamb shall be without blemish.... and the whole assembly of the congregation of Israel shall kill it in the evening. And they shall take of the blood, and strike it on the two side posts and on the upper door post of the houses. wherein they shall eat it.... and when I see the blood, I will pass over you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Your lamb shall be without blemish, a male of the first year: ye shall take it out from the sheep, or from the goats:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of sprinkling.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant, and to the blood of sprinkling, that speaketh better things than that of Abel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ our passover is sacrificed for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: According to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who hath saved us, and called us with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin; that he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin; That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have trodden the winepress alone.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have trodden the winepress alone; and of the people there was none with me: for I will tread them in mine anger, and trample them in my fury; and their blood shall be sprinkled upon my garments, and I will stain all my raiment.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O LORD, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders? Exod 15:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being made a curse for us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O sing unto the Lord a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O my soul, thou hast trodden down strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The river of Kishon swept them away, that ancient river, the river Kishon. O my soul, thou hast trodden down strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They overcame ... by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His mercy is on them that fear Him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men! Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men! Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him ... in truth. He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth. He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because thine heart was tender, and thou hast humbled thyself before the LORD, ... and hast rent thy clothes, and wept before me; I also have heard thee, saith the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because thine heart was tender, and thou hast humbled thyself before the Lord, when thou heardest what I spake against this place, and against the inhabitants thereof, that they should become a desolation and a curse, and hast rent thy clothes, and wept before me; I also have heard thee, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For all those things hath mine hand made, and all those things have been, saith the Lord: but to this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Them that honour me I will honour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore the Lord God of Israel saith, I said indeed that thy house, and the house of thy father, should walk before me for ever: but now the Lord saith, Be it far from me; for them that honour me I will honour, and they that despise me shall be lightly esteemed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever ... shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me. And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me. He that findeth his life shall lose it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear none of these things which thou shalt suffer. Be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all. And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices, which can never take away sins: but this man, after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever, sat down on the right hand of God; from henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool. For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He brought me up ... out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: You hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins; wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world. We all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer. From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer. From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice. For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the Lord, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice. For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Walk in newness of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh: for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you.... brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature. And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature. And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not so learned Christ; if so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus. Put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye have not so learned Christ; If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy will be done.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, I know that the way of man is not in himself. it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not as I will, but as thou wilt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know not what ye ask.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He gave them their request; but sent leanness into their soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he gave them their request; but sent leanness into their soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would have you without carefulness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom the Lord loveth he correcteth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom the Lord loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: See now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god with me: I kill, and I make alive; I wound, and I heal: neither is there any that can deliver out of my hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: See now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god with me: I kill, and I make alive; I wound, and I heal: neither is there any that can deliver out of my hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will allure her, and bring her into the wilderness, and speak comfortably unto her.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, behold, I will allure her, and bring her into the wilderness, and speak comfortably unto her.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As a man chasteneth his son, so the LORD thy God chasteneth thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his son, so the Lord thy God chasteneth thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I know, O Lord, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: She did not know that I gave her corn, and wine, and oil, and multiplied her silver and gold. Therefore will I return, and take away my corn in the time thereof, and my wine in the season thereof, and I will recover my wool and my flax.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For she did not know that I gave her corn, and wine, and oil, and multiplied her silver and gold, which they prepared for Baal. Therefore will I return, and take away my corn in the time thereof, and my wine in the season thereof, and will recover my wool and my flax given to cover her nakedness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee. For we are strangers before thee, and sojourners, as were all our fathers: our days on the earth are as a shadow, and there is none abiding. O LORD our God, all this store ... cometh of thine hand, and is all thine own.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But who am I, and what is my people, that we should be able to offer so willingly after this sort? for all things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The living God ... giveth us richly all things to enjoy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving; for it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye ...
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not, because ye ask not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ... the Spirit of truth is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself, but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come. He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come. He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But they rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What think ye of Christ? Matt 22:42
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying, What think ye of Christ? whose son is he? They say unto him, The Son of David.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in. Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in. Who is this King of glory? The Lord of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND Lord OF LORDS.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you ... which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness; but unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we preach Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness; But unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, thou knowest all things: thou knowest that I love thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He saith unto him the third time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God; and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him, for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall he saved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom. And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom. And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What will ye that I shall do unto you? They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened. So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye ...
