MORNING.verse_kjv: Hearken to me, ye that follow after righteousness, ye that seek the Lord: look unto the rock whence ye are hewn, and to the hole of the pit whence ye are digged.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: None eye pitied thee, . but thou wast cast out in the open field, to the loathing of thy person, in the day that thou wast born. And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee.... Live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: None eye pitied thee, to do any of these unto thee, to have compassion upon thee; but thou wast cast out in the open field, to the lothing of thy person, in the day that thou wast born. And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live; yea, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He brought me up ... out of a horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings. And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings. And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly. For scarcely for a righteous man will one die: yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die. But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For when we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth. My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad. O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly. O Lord of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord God is a sun and shield: the Lord will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly. O Lord of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is any merry? let him sing psalms.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is any among you afflicted? let him pray. Is any merry? let him sing psalms.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be filled with the Spirit; speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord; giving thanks always for all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: At midnight Paul and Silas prayed, and sang praises unto God: and the prisoners heard them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed, and sang praises unto God: and the prisoners heard them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again, I say, Rejoice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt make a plate of pure gold, and grave upon it, like the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt make a plate of pure gold, and grave upon it, like the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will be sanctified in them that come nigh me, and before all the people I will be glorified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Moses said unto Aaron, This is it that the Lord spake, saying, I will be sanctified in them that come nigh me, and before all the people I will be glorified. And Aaron held his peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the law of the house: Upon the top of the mountain the whole limit thereof round about shall be most holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This is the law of the house; Upon the top of the mountain the whole limit thereof round about shall be most holy. Behold, this is the law of the house.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holiness becometh thine house, O LORD, for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy testimonies are very sure: holiness becometh thine house, O Lord, for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ... that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us . . . come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Seeing then that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast our profession. Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My cup runneth over.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him. The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is of the Lord's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot. The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot. The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whether ... the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are your's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therewith to be content.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therewith to be content.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Godliness with contentment is great gain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer. Hold up my goings in thy paths, that my footsteps slip not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Concerning the works of men, by the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer. Hold up my goings in thy paths, that my footsteps slip not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When thou goest, it shall lead thee; when thou steepest, it shall keep thee; and when thou awakest, it shall talk with thee. For the commandment is a lamp; and the law is light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When thou goest, it shall lead thee; when thou sleepest, it shall keep thee; and when thou awakest, it shall talk with thee. For the commandment is a lamp; and the law is light; and reproofs of instruction are the way of life:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have also a ... sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What meanest thou, O sleeper? arise.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So the shipmaster came to him, and said unto him, What meanest thou, O sleeper? arise, call upon thy God, if so be that God will think upon us, that we perish not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is not your rest: ... it is polluted, it shall destroy you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Set your heart and your soul to seek your God: arise therefore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now set your heart and your soul to seek the Lord your God; arise therefore, and build ye the sanctuary of the Lord God, to bring the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and the holy vessels of God, into the house that is to be built to the name of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.
EVENING.verse_kjv: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning: lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea, rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth. Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In all these things we are more than conquerors, through him that loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. And take the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The tree of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And out of the ground made the Lord God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight, and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will. As the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will. For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom. Length of days is in her right hand. She is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding. Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour. She is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus.... is made unto us wisdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: [Abraham] staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God; and being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God; And being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The children of Judah prevailed, because they relied upon the LORD God of their fathers.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thus the children of Israel were brought under at that time, and the children of Judah prevailed, because they relied upon the Lord God of their fathers.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man. It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in princes.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fail, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him. O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night. He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day; He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber. Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep. The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will trust, and not be afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty, and upon every one that is lifted up; and he shall be brought low:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The king held out ... the golden sceptre. So Esther drew near, and touched the top of the sceptre.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it was so, when the king saw Esther the queen standing in the court, that she obtained favour in his sight: and the king held out to Esther the golden sceptre that was in his hand. So Esther drew near, and touched the top of the sceptre.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It shall come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that I will hear; for I am gracious.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For that is his covering only, it is his raiment for his skin: wherein shall he sleep? and it shall come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that I will hear; for I am gracious.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him. Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world. There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love. We love him, because he first loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us draw near with a true heart, in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For through him we ... have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They said, ... It is manna: for they wist not what it was.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the children of Israel saw it, they said one to another, It is manna: for they wist not what it was. And Moses said unto them, This is the bread which the Lord hath given you to eat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your fathers did eat marina in the wilderness, and are dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness, and are dead.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For my flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The children of Israel ... gathered, some more, some less. He that gathered much had nothing over, and he that gathered little had no lack. They gathered it every morning, every man according to his eating.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the children of Israel did so, and gathered, some more, some less. And when they did mete it with an omer, he that gathered much had nothing over, and he that gathered little had no lack; they gathered every man according to his eating. And they gathered it every morning, every man according to his eating: and when the sun waxed hot, it melted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought, saying, What shall we eat: or, What shall we drink? Your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things. But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The free gift is of many offences unto justiflcation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not as it was by one that sinned, so is the gift: for the judgment was by one to condemnation, but the free gift is of many offences unto justification.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins. Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins. Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, thy transgressions, and, as a cloud, thy sins: return unto me; for I have redeemed thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not as the offence, so also is the free gift. For if through the offence of one many be dead, much more the grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But not as the offence, so also is the free gift. For if through the offence of one many be dead, much more the grace of God, and the gift by grace, which is by one man, Jesus Christ, hath abounded unto many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Occupy till I come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he called his ten servants, and delivered them ten pounds, and said unto them, Occupy till I come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business? Luke 2:49
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is meekness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The meek ... shall increase their joy in the LORD, and the poor among men shall rejoice in the Holy One of Israel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The meek also shall increase their joy in the Lord, and the poor among men shall rejoice in the Holy One of Israel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven. Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said, Verily I say unto you, Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven. Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The ornament of a meek and quiet spirit....
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up 1 Cor 13:4
MORNING.verse_kjv: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Follow after meekness 1 Tim 6:11
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take my yoke upon you and learn of me, for I am meek and lowly in heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, yet he opened not his mouth: he is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, so he openeth not his mouth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, yet he opened not his mouth: he is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, so he openeth not his mouth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again....
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said to them all, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report 2 Cor 6:8
EVENING.verse_kjv: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution 2 Tim 3:12
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The offence of the cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye: but let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If one died for all, then were all dead: and that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again 2 Cor 5:14, 15
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we suffer, we shall also reign with him 2 Tim 2:12
EVENING.verse_kjv: If we suffer, we shall also reign with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hast thou not known? hast thou not heard, that the everlasting God, the LORD, the Creator of the ends of the earth, fainteth not, neither is weary? He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hast thou not known? hast thou not heard, that the everlasting God, the Lord, the Creator of the ends of the earth, fainteth not, neither is weary? there is no searching of his understanding. He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The trying of your faith worketh patience. But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience. But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward. For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward. For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The wicked are like the troubled sea, when it cannot rest. There is no peace, saith my God, to the wicked.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the wicked are like the troubled sea, when it cannot rest, whose waters cast up mire and dirt. There is no peace, saith my God, to the wicked.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rest in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace; not with meats, which have not profited them that have been occupied therein.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That we ... be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive but speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That we henceforth be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive; But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste. He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste. He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Neither shall there be leaven seen with thee in all thy quarters.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unleavened bread shall be eaten seven days; and there shall no leavened bread be seen with thee, neither shall there be leaven seen with thee in all thy quarters.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fear of the LORD is to hate evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The fear of the Lord is to hate evil: pride, and arrogancy, and the evil way, and the froward mouth, do I hate.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abhor that which is evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abstain from all appearance of evil 1 Thess 5:22
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby many be defiled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby many be defiled;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump? Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of that bread, and drink of that cup 1 Cor 11:28
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of that bread, and drink of that cup.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let every one that nameth the name Christ depart from iniquity 2 Tim 2:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In him is no sin 1 John 3:5
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The serpent said unto the woman, Ye shall not surely die: ... your eyes shall be opened, and ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the serpent said unto the woman, Ye shall not surely die: For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof, then your eyes shall be opened, and ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I fear, lest by any means, as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty, so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ 2 Cor 11:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I fear, lest by any means, as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty, so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might. Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. Take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand. Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness and your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace; above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked. And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might. Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices 2 Cor 2:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sit still, my daughter.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said she, Sit still, my daughter, until thou know how the matter will fall: for the man will not be in rest, until he have finished the thing this day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And say unto him, Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted for the two tails of these smoking firebrands, for the fierce anger of Rezin with Syria, and of the son of Remaliah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be still, and know that I am God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Said I not unto thee, that, if thou wouldest believe, thou shouldest see the glory of God? John 11:40
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Said I not unto thee, that, if thou wouldest believe, thou shouldest see the glory of God?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The loftiness of man shall be bowed down, and the haughtiness of men shall be made low: and the LORD alone shall be exalted in that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down, and the haughtiness of men shall be made low: and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mary ... sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In returning and rest shall ye be saved; in quietness and in confidence shall be your strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord God, the Holy One of Israel; In returning and rest shall ye be saved; in quietness and in confidence shall be your strength: and ye would not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD. His heart is established.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the Lord. His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth shall not make haste.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, I lay in Zion for a foundation a stone, a tried stone, a precious corner stone, a sure foundation: he that believeth shall not make haste.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt remember all the way which the LORD thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt remember all the way which the Lord thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I passed by thee, and looked upon thee, behold, thy time was the time of love; yea, I sware unto thee, and entered into a covenant with thee, saith the Lord GOD, and thou becamest mine.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now when I passed by thee, and looked upon thee, behold, thy time was the time of love; and I spread my skirt over thee, and covered thy nakedness: yea, I sware unto thee, and entered into a covenant with thee, saith the Lord God, and thou becamest mine.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: but rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy 1 Pet 4:12, 13
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory; while we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen 2 Cor 4:17, 18
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the body is one, and hath many members, ...
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is the head of the body, the church.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The head over all things to the church, which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church, Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A body hast thou prepared me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore when he cometh into the world, he saith, Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not, but a body hast thou prepared me:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thine they were, and thou gavest them me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ: from whom the whole body fitly joined together, and compacted by that which every joint supplieth.... maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fountain of living waters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For my people have committed two evils; they have forsaken me the fountain of living waters, and hewed them out cisterns, broken cisterns, that can hold no water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings. They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house: and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures. For with thee is the fountain of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the Lord GOD, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty: behold, my servants shall rejoice, but ye shall be ashamed:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive.
EVENING.verse_kjv: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters, and he that hath no money; come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lift up our heart with our hands unto God in the heavens.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us lift up our heart with our hands unto God in the heavens.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high, who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth! Psa 113:5, 6
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto the Lord our God, who dwelleth on high,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit. Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee. Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee. Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul. For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul. For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watchman, what of the night? Isa 21:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: The burden of Dumah. He calleth to me out of Seir, Watchman, what of the night? Watchman, what of the night?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh: so likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors. Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh: So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors. Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope. My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I wait for the Lord, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope. My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly, Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watch.... for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoicing in hope.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The hope which is laid up for you in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable 1 Cor 15:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever doth not bear his cross, and come after me, cannot be my disciple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And whosoever doth not bear his cross, and come after me, cannot be my disciple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto 1 Thess 3:3
MORNING.verse_kjv: That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead 1 Pet 1:3
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory 1 Pet 1:8
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the Lord. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How precious ... are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Many, O Lord my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not many mighty, not many noble, are called 1 Cor 1:26
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom? James 2:5
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having nothing, and yet possessing all things 2 Cor 6:10
EVENING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The unsearchable riches of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art weighed in the balances, and art found wanting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: TEKEL; Thou art weighed in the balances, and art found wanting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is a God of knowledge, and by him actions are weighed 1 Sam 2:3
MORNING.verse_kjv: Talk no more so exceeding proudly; let not arrogancy come out of your mouth: for the Lord is a God of knowledge, and by him actions are weighed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Ye are they which justify yourselves before men; but God knoweth your hearts: for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the LORD looketh on the heart 1 Sam 16:7
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the Lord said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the Lord seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the Lord looketh on the heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap. For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap. For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul? Matt 16:26
MORNING.verse_kjv: For what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast proved mine heart; thou hast visited me in the night; thou hast tried me, and shalt find nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou hast proved mine heart; thou hast visited me in the night; thou hast tried me, and shalt find nothing; I am purposed that my mouth shall not transgress.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ the firstfruits 1 Cor 15:23
EVENING.verse_kjv: But every man in his own order: Christ the firstfruits; afterward they that are Christ's at his coming.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die, it abideth alone: but if it die, it bringeth forth much fruit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die, it abideth alone: but if it die, it bringeth forth much fruit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the firstfruit be holy, the lump is also holy: and if the root be holy, so are the branches.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if the firstfruit be holy, the lump is also holy: and if the root be holy, so are the branches.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept 1 Cor 15:20
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Jesus Christ ... shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The firstborn from the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked: I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich. As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore and repent.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the LORD will hear them, I the God of Israel will not forsake them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the Lord will hear them, I the God of Israel will not forsake them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD thy God.... open thy mouth wide, and I will fill it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am the Lord thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt: open thy mouth wide, and I will fill it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore do ye spend money for that which is not bread? and your labour for that which satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto me, and eat ye that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in fatness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore do ye spend money for that which is not bread? and your labour for that which satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto me, and eat ye that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in fatness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My feet were almost gone; my steps had well nigh slipped.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But as for me, my feet were almost gone; my steps had well nigh slipped.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O LORD, held me up.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O Lord, held me up.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: but I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For a just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again: but the wicked shall fall into mischief.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the LORD shall be a light unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the Lord shall be a light unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall deliver thee in six troubles: yea, in seven there shall no evil touch thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall deliver thee in six troubles: yea, in seven there shall no evil touch thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.
