MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will give them one heart, and one way, that they may fear me for ever, for the good of them, and of their children after them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I bought the field of Hanameel my uncle's son, that was in Anathoth, and weighed him the money, even seventeen shekels of silver.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A new heart ... will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way. The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way. All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I ... beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called, with all lowliness and meekness.... endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace. There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling; one Lord, one faith, one baptism, one God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength. (Or, change strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I am weak, then am I strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall be my strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now, saith the Lord that formed me from the womb to be his servant, to bring Jacob again to him, Though Israel be not gathered, yet shall I be glorious in the eyes of the Lord, and my God shall be my strength.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let him take hold of my strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Or let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The arms of his hands were made strong by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But his bow abode in strength, and the arms of his hands were made strong by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob; (from thence is the shepherd, the stone of Israel:)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the LORD of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the Lord of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Plead my cause, O LORD, with them that strive with me: fight against them that fight against me. Take hold of shield and buckler, and stand up for mine help.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Plead my cause, O Lord, with them that strive with me: fight against them that fight against me. Take hold of shield and buckler, and stand up for mine help.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil; neither shalt thou speak in a cause to decline after many to wrest judgment:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness? And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel? And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? II Cor 6:14-16
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him. The world passeth away, and the lust thereof. but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him. And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not so learned Christ; if so be that ye have heard him.... as the truth is in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye have not so learned Christ; If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The night cometh when no man can work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your tabour is not in vain in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth . . . a rest to the people of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Saying, These last have wrought but one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To whom he said, This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing: yet they would not hear.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have seen his ways, and will heal him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have seen his ways, and will heal him: I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD that healeth thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And said, If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the Lord thy God, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his commandments, and keep all his statutes, I will put none of these diseases upon thee, which I have brought upon the Egyptians: for I am the Lord that healeth thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, thou hast searched me, and known me. Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off. Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight: but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Spirit of the Lord God is upon me; because the Lord hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace, and be whole of thy plague.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto her, Daughter, thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace, and be whole of thy plague.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord taketh my part.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion. We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners. Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God. They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee; Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion; We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the Lord fulfil all thy petitions.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the LORD shall lift up a standard against him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So shall they fear the name of the Lord from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our God whom we serve is able to deliver us, and he will deliver us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If it be so, our God whom we serve is able to deliver us from the burning fiery furnace, and he will deliver us out of thine hand, O king.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the Lord: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land where no water is; to see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters, and he that hath no money; come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters, and he that hath no money; come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My blood is drink indeed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For my flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Eat, O friends; drink, yea, drink abundantly, O beloved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I am come into my garden, my sister, my spouse: I have gathered my myrrh with my spice; I have eaten my honeycomb with my honey; I have drunk my wine with my milk: eat, O friends; drink, yea, drink abundantly, O beloved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the salt of the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are the salt of the earth: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be salted? it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which is not corruptible.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth forever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The children of God, being the children of the resurrection.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Neither can they die any more: for they are equal unto the angels; and are the children of God, being the children of the resurrection.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The uncorruptible God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man, and to birds, and fourfooted beasts, and creeping things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his. And if Christ be in you, the body is dead because of sin; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness. But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye are not in the flesh, but in the Spirit, if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you. Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Have salt in yourselves, and have peace one with another.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his saltness, wherewith will ye season it? Have salt in yourselves, and have peace one with another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that comforteth you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that comforteth you: who art thou, that thou shouldest be afraid of a man that shall die, and of the son of man which shall be made as grass;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; Who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon him, for he careth for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Another Comforter ... even the Spirit of truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever; Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit ... helpeth our infirmities.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... followers of God, as dear children.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What then? shall we sin, because we are not under the law, but under grace? God forbid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: What then? shall we sin, because we are not under the law, but under grace? God forbid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, ye ... are become dead to the law by the body of Christ; that ye should be married to another, even to him who is raised from the dead, that we should bring forth fruit unto God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my brethren, ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ; that ye should be married to another, even to him who is raised from the dead, that we should bring forth fruit unto God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sting of death is sin; and the strength of sin is the law. But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sting of death is sin; and the strength of sin is the law. But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin. If the Son ... shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin. If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto him, No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed. For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive; but speaking the truth in love. . . . grow up into him in all things which is the head, even Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That we henceforth be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive; But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Abide in me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord pondereth the hearts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the Lord pondereth the hearts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will shew who are his, and who is holy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he spake unto Korah and unto all his company, saying, Even to morrow the Lord will shew who are his, and who is holy; and will cause him to come near unto him: even him whom he hath chosen will he cause to come near unto him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto. For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto. For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In me ye ... have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The night is far spent the day is at hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds; as the tender grass springing out of the earth by clear shining after rain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds; as the tender grass springing out of the earth by clear shining after rain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord GOD will wipe away tears from off all faces.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the Lord hath spoken it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be no more death, either sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and smoking flax shall he not quench, till he send forth judgment unto victory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones. For I will not contend for ever, neither will I be always wroth: for the spirit should fail before me, and the souls which I have made.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones. For I will not contend for ever, neither will I be always wroth: for the spirit should fail before me, and the souls which I have made.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will seek that which was lost, and bring again that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will seek that which was lost, and bring again that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick: but I will destroy the fat and the strong; I will feed them with judgment.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down, and the feeble knees; and make straight paths for your feet, lest that which is lame be turned out of the way; but let it rather be healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down, and the feeble knees; And make straight paths for your feet, lest that which is lame be turned out of the way; but let it rather be healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, your God ... will come and save you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: he saith.... Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom, And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The ear trieth words, as the mouth tasteth meat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the ear trieth words, as the mouth tasteth meat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I believed, and therefore have I spoken.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We having the same spirit of faith, according as it is written, I believed, and therefore have I spoken; we also believe, and therefore speak;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The goodness of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things? Rom 8:32
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby: if so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes. Even so, Father: for so it seemed good in thy sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: At that time Jesus answered and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes. Even so, Father: for so it seemed good in thy sight.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now we have received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out! For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor? For of him, and through him, and to him are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out! For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor? For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: En-hakkore. (Or, The well of him that cried.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God clave an hollow place that was in the jaw, and there came water thereout; and when he had drunk, his spirit came again, and he revived: wherefore he called the name thereof En–hakkore, which is in Lehi unto this day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith unto thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man thirst, let hirn come unto me and drink. This spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink. (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Prove me now herewith, saith the LORD of hosts, if I will not open you the windows of heaven, and pour you out a blessing, that there shall not be room enough to receive it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bring ye all the tithes into the storehouse, that there may be meat in mine house, and prove me now herewith, saith the Lord of hosts, if I will not open you the windows of heaven, and pour you out a blessing, that there shall not be room enough to receive it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye....
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will proclaim the name of the LORD before thee; and will be gracious to whom I will be gracious.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, I will make all my goodness pass before thee, and I will proclaim the name of the Lord before thee; and will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will shew mercy on whom I will shew mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being justified freely by his grace, through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus: whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the law was given by Moses, but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He giveth more grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help. My help cometh from the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help. My help cometh from the Lord, which made heaven and earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O our God, wilt thou not judge them? for we have no might against this great company that cometh against us; neither know we what to do: but our eyes are upon thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O our God, wilt thou not judge them? for we have no might against this great company that cometh against us; neither know we what to do: but our eyes are upon thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Mine eyes are ever toward the Lord; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Our help is in the name of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso findeth me findeth life, and shall obtain favour of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whoso findeth me findeth life, and shall obtain favour of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD, Let not the wise man glory in his wisdom, neither let the mighty man glory in his might: ... but let him that glorieth glory in this, that he understandeth and knoweth me, that I am the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thus saith the Lord, Let not the wise man glory in his wisdom, neither let the mighty man glory in his might, let not the rich man glory in his riches: But let him that glorieth glory in this, that he understandeth and knoweth me, that I am the Lord which exercise lovingkindness, judgment, and righteousness, in the earth: for in these things I delight, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ. Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ. Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus, . . . is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that winneth souls is wise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Poor, yet making many rich.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you; that ye, always having all sufficiency in all things, may abound to every good work:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him? James 2:5
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called: but God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We know that all things work together for good to them that love God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye thought evil against me: but God meant it unto good, Gen 50:20
MORNING.verse_kjv: But as for you, ye thought evil against me; but God meant it unto good, to bring to pass, as it is this day, to save much people alive.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things are yours; whether ... the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours; and ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things are for your sakes, that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God. For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day. For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For all things are for your sakes, that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations; knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience. But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The communion of the Holy Ghost be with you all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you forever; even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever; Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall not speak of himself. He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come. He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grieve not the Holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD? Psa 89:6
MORNING.verse_kjv: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the Lord? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the Lord?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved is white and ruddy, the chiefest among ten thousand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My beloved is white and ruddy, the chiefest among ten thousand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One pearl of great price.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had, and bought it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The prince of the kings of the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His head is as the most fine gold, his locks are bushy, and black as a raven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His head is as the most fine gold, his locks are bushy, and black as a raven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The head over all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is the head of the body, the church.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His cheeks are as a bed of spices, as sweet flowers.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His cheeks are as a bed of spices, as sweet flowers: his lips like lilies, dropping sweet smelling myrrh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He could not be hid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And from thence he arose, and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon, and entered into an house, and would have no man know it: but he could not be hid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His lips like lilies, dropping sweet smelling myrrh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His cheeks are as a bed of spices, as sweet flowers: his lips like lilies, dropping sweet smelling myrrh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Never man spake like this man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His countenance is as Lebanon, excellent as the cedars.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His legs are as pillars of marble, set upon sockets of fine gold: his countenance is as Lebanon, excellent as the cedars.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies' sake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He ... became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard in that he feared though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who in the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard in that he feared; Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father, and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels? Matt 26:53
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father, and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day: and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our God hath not forsaken us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we were bondmen; yet our God hath not forsaken us in our bondage, but hath extended mercy unto us in the sight of the kings of Persia, to give us a reviving, to set up the house of our God, and to repair the desolations thereof, and to give us a wall in Judah and in Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye endure chastening, God dealeth with you as with sons; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not? But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye endure chastening, God dealeth with you as with sons; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not? But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD your God proveth you, to know whether ye love the LORD your God with all your heart and with all your soul.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not hearken unto the words of that prophet, or that dreamer of dreams: for the Lord your God proveth you, to know whether ye love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the LORD to make you his people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the Lord to make you his people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that overcometh shall inherit all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God; for he hath prepared for them a city.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: An inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All things are yours; ... the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours; Whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is good for me to draw near to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But it is good for me to draw near to God: I have put my trust in the Lord God, that I may declare all thy works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a door-keeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore will the LORD wait that he may be gracious unto you, and therefore will he be exalted that he may have mercy upon you: for the LORD is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And therefore will the Lord wait, that he may be gracious unto you, and therefore will he be exalted, that he may have mercy upon you: for the Lord is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us; ... let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We speak that we do know, and testify that we have seen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, We speak that we do know, and testify that we have seen; and ye receive not our witness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations: that the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations: ... knowing that tribulation worketh patience; and patience, experience; and experience, hope.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience; And patience, experience; and experience, hope:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.
