MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance. Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompence of reward. For ye have need of patience, that after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds, and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods, knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, comfort your hearts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son: because he is the Son of man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of God ... hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They say, How doth God know? and is there knowledge in the most High? Psa 73:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they say, How doth God know? and is there knowledge in the most High?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These things thou hast done, and I kept silence; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself: but I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These things hast thou done, and I kept silence; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself: but I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed neither hid, that shall not be known.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; neither hid, that shall not be known.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Examine me, O Lord, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is He.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: a God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Him that judgeth righteously.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every one of us shall give account of himself to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The soul that sinneth it shall die.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul that sinneth, it shall die.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts: smite the shepherd.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mercy and truth are met together: righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mercy rejoiceth against judgment.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he shall have judgment without mercy, that hath shewed no mercy; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A just God and a Saviour; there is none beside me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Tell ye, and bring them near; yea, let them take counsel together: who hath declared this from ancient time? who hath told it from that time? have not I the Lord? and there is no God else beside me; a just God and a Saviour; there is none beside me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Death is swallowed up in victory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we be dead with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him: knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more; death hath no more dominion over him. For in that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God. Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now if we be dead with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Humble yourselves under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the LORD: though hand join in hand, he shall not be unpunished.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the Lord: though hand join in hand, he shall not be unpunished.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, thou art our father; we are the clay, and thou our potter; and we all are the work of thy hand. Be not wroth very sore, O LORD, neither remember iniquity for ever: behold, see, we beseech thee, we are all thy people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now, O Lord, thou art our father; we are the clay, and thou our potter; and we all are the work of thy hand. Be not wroth very sore, O Lord, neither remember iniquity for ever: behold, see, we beseech thee, we are all thy people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised, as a bullock unaccustomed to the yoke: turn thou me, and I shall be turned; for thou art the LORD my God. Surely after that I was turned, I repented; and after that I was instructed, I smote upon my thigh: I was ashamed, yea, even confounded, because I did bear the reproach of my youth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself thus; Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised, as a bullock unaccustomed to the yoke: turn thou me, and I shall be turned; for thou art the Lord my God. Surely after that I was turned, I repented; and after that I was instructed, I smote upon my thigh: I was ashamed, yea, even confounded, because I did bear the reproach of my youth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Affliction cometh not forth of the dust, neither doth trouble spring out of the ground; yet man is born unto trouble, as the sparks fly upward.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Although affliction cometh not forth of the dust, neither doth trouble spring out of the ground; Yet man is born unto trouble, as the sparks fly upward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, hath God said? Gen 3:1
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the serpent was more subtil than any beast of the field which the Lord God had made. And he said unto the woman, Yea, hath God said, Ye shall not eat of every tree of the garden?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the tempter came to Jesus, he said, If thou be the Son of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus said unto him, It is written.... it is written... it is written.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God. Jesus said unto him, It is written again, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God. Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then the devil leaveth him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then the devil leaveth him, and, behold, angels came and ministered unto him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I may not return with thee. For it was said to me by the word of the LORD, Thou shalt eat no bread nor drink water there. He said unto him, I am a prophet also as thou art; and an angel spake unto me by the word of the LORD, saying, Bring him back with thee into thine house, that he may eat bread and drink water. But he lied unto him. So he went back with him. The man of God.... was disobedient unto the word of the LORD: therefore the LORD hath delivered him unto the lion, which hath torn him, and slain him, according to the word of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, I may not return with thee, nor go in with thee: neither will I eat bread nor drink water with thee in this place:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall put my name upon the children of Israel; and I will bless them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they shall put my name upon the children of Israel; and I will bless them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are thine: thou never barest rule over them; they were not called by thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We are thine: thou never barest rule over them; they were not called by thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All people of the earth shall see that thou are called by the name of the LORD; and they shall be afraid of thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all people of the earth shall see that thou art called by the name of the Lord; and they shall be afraid of thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the Lord to make you his people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the Lord to make you his people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O Lord hear; O Lord, forgive; O Lord, hearken and do; defer not, for thine own sake, O my God: for thy city and thy people are called by thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, hear; O Lord, forgive; O Lord, hearken and do; defer not, for thine own sake, O my God: for thy city and thy people are called by thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Help us O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The name of the LORD is a strong tower; the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The name of the Lord is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heavens declare the glory of God ; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He left not himself without witness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness, in that he did good, and gave us rain from heaven, and fruitful seasons, filling our hearts with food and gladness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge. There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge. There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained; what is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him? Psa 8:3, 4
EVENING.verse_kjv: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory. So also is the resurrection of the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory. So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The love of Christ, which passeth knowledge.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends John 15:13
MORNING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet foryour sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye also ought to wash one another's feet. For I have given you an example, that ye should do as I have done to you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If I then, your Lord and Master, have washed your feet; ye also ought to wash one another's feet. For I have given you an example, that ye should do as I have done to you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What things soever the Father doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then answered Jesus and said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he seeth the Father do: for what things soever he doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wait on the LORD: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Them that are sanctified by God the Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jude, the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ, and called:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? saith the Lord. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fulness of him that filleth all in all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth our frame.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity. But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour. If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the LORD an offering in righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he shall sit as a refiner and purifier of silver: and he shall purify the sons of Levi, and purge them as gold and silver, that they may offer unto the Lord an offering in righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I ... will refine them as silver is refined.... they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It is my people: and they shall say, The LORD is my God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It is my people: and they shall say, The Lord is my God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shew me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Shew me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Moses said unto the LORD, I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee. And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Moses said unto the Lord, See, thou sayest unto me, Bring up this people: and thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send with me. Yet thou hast said, I know thee by name, and thou hast also found grace in my sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way. What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way. What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the Lord sustained me. I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is temperance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible. I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air: but I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober. For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night. But let us, who are of the day, be sober.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: First the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself; first the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They measuring themselves by themselves, and comparing themselves among themselves, are not wise. But he that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord. For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we dare not make ourselves of the number, or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves: but they measuring themselves by themselves, and comparing themselves among themselves, are not wise. But he that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord. For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The body is of Christ. Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind, and not holding the Head, from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered, and knit together, increaseth with the increase of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which are a shadow of things to come; but the body is of Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The goat shall bear upon him all their iniquities unto a land not inhabited: and he shall let go the goat in the wilderness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the goat shall bear upon him all their iniquities unto a land not inhabited: and he shall let go the goat in the wilderness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In those days, and in that time, saith the LORD, the iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In those days, and in that time, saith the Lord, the iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He will turn again, he will have compassion upon us; he will subdue our iniquities; and thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths of the sea.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity? Micah 7:18
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All we like sheep have gone astray: we have turned every one to his own way; and the LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall bear their iniquities. Therefore will I divide him a portion with the great, and he shall divide the spoil with the strong, because he hath poured out his soul unto death; and he was numbered with the transgressors; and he bare the sin of many, and made intercession for the transgressors.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities. Therefore will I divide him a portion with the great, and he shall divide the spoil with the strong; because he hath poured out his soul unto death: and he was numbered with the transgressors; and he bare the sin of many, and made intercession for the transgressors.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who maketh thee to differ from another? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? I Cor 4:7
EVENING.verse_kjv: For who maketh thee to differ from another? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive it, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received it?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By the grace of God I am what I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth, that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is not of him that willeth, nor of him that runneth, but of God that sheweth mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So then it is not of him that willeth, nor of him that runneth, but of God that sheweth mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where is boasting then? It is excluded.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus.... is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption: ... He that glorieth let him glory in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption: That, according as it is written, He that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: You hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins; wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience: among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are washed.... ye are sanctified.... ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins In his own blood.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Many waters cannot quench love, neither can the floods drown it. Love is strong as death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Many waters cannot quench love, neither can the floods drown it: if a man would give all the substance of his house for love, it would utterly be contemned. Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm: for love is strong as death; jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire, which hath a most vehement flame.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are washed.... ye are sanctified.... ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you . . . brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Over the king's treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses ... Jehonathan: and over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri: and over the vineyards was Shimei. 'these were the rulers of the substance which was king David's.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And over the king's treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, was Jonathan the son of Uzziah:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of hearings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues. All these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues. But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God. If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God. If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Moses wist not that the skin of his face shone while he talked with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, when Moses came down from mount Sinai with the two tables of testimony in Moses' hand, when he came down from the mount, that Moses wist not that the skin of his face shone while he talked with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not unto us, O Lord, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, when saw we thee a hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink? Matt 25:37
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In lowliness of mind, let each esteem other better than themselves.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be clothed with humility.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: [Jesus] was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on [Stephen], saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The glory which thou gavest me, I have given them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we all, with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Spirit of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid. Neither do men light a candle, and put it under a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid. Neither do men light a candle, and put it under a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There fell some of Manasseh to David. And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads. And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There should be no schism in the body; but ... the members should have the same care one for another. And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another. And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One Lord, one faith, one baptism.
EVENING.verse_kjv: One Lord, one faith, one baptism,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Call upon me in the day of trouble, I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jacob said unto his household, . . . Let us arise, and go up to Bethel; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Jacob said unto his household, and to all that were with him, Put away the strange gods that are among you, and be clean, and change your garments: And let us arise, and go up to Beth–el; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live. The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow. Then called I on the name of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yet a little while, (Gr. how little, how little,) and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Write the vision, and make it plain upon tables, that he may run that readeth it. For the vision is yet for an appointed time, but at the end it shall speak, and not lie: though it tarry, wait for it; because it will surely come, it will not tarry.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord answered me, and said, Write the vision, and make it plain upon tables, that he may run that readeth it. For the vision is yet for an appointed time, but at the end it shall speak, and not lie: though it tarry, wait for it; because it will surely come, it will not tarry.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day. The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day. The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down. For since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens, that thou wouldest come down, that the mountains might flow down at thy presence, For since the beginning of the world men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither hath the eye seen, O God, beside thee, what he hath prepared for him that waiteth for him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord God omnipotent reigneth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know that thou canst do every thing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I know that thou canst do every thing, and that no thought can be withholden from thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The things which are impossible with men are possible with God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, The things which are impossible with men are possible with God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou? Dan 4:35
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all the inhabitants of the earth are reputed as nothing: and he doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it? Isa 43:13
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yea, before the day was I am he; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord. Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord. Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean. And Jesus put forth his hand and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And, behold, there came a leper and worshipped him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean. And Jesus put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The mighty God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the Lord our God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and courageous, be not afraid nor dismayed.... there be more with us than with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be strong and courageous, be not afraid nor dismayed for the king of Assyria, nor for all the multitude that is with him: for there be more with us than with him:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I Sam 3:17
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said, What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God? Micah 6:8
EVENING.verse_kjv: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the Lord require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To keep the commandments of the LORD, and his statutes, which I command thee this day for thy good.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To keep the commandments of the Lord, and his statutes, which I command thee this day for thy good?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As many as are of the works of the law are under the curse: for it is written, Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them. But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, it is evident: for the just shall live by faith. Wherefore then serveth the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse: for it is written, Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them. But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, it is evident: for, The just shall live by faith. Wherefore then serveth the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets, hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets, Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Speak, LORD; for thy servant heareth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak, Lord; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The meek will he teach his way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are the meek.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I returned, and saw under the sun, that the race is not to the swift, nor the battle to the strong, neither yet bread to the wise, nor yet riches to men of understanding, nor yet favour to men of skill.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I returned, and saw under the sun, that the race is not to the swift, nor the battle to the strong, neither yet bread to the wise, nor yet riches to men of understanding, nor yet favour to men of skill; but time and chance happeneth to them all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the LORD directeth his steps.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the Lord directeth his steps.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens. Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee. Psa 143:8O our God, wilt thou not judge them? for we have no might against this great company that cometh against us; neither know we what to do: but our eyes are upon thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee. O our God, wilt thou not judge them? for we have no might against this great company that cometh against us; neither know we what to do: but our eyes are upon thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When he, the Spirit of truth, is come he will guide you into all truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O Lord God, ... with thy blessing let the house of thy servant be blessed for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore now let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may continue for ever before thee: for thou, O Lord God, hast spoken it: and with thy blessing let the house of thy servant be blessed for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou blessest, O LORD, and it shall be blessed for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now therefore let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may be before thee for ever: for thou blessest, O Lord, and it shall be blessed for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The blessing of the LORD, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou makest a feast, call the poor, the maimed, the lame, the blind: and thou shalt be blessed; for they cannot recompense thee: for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But when thou makest a feast, call the poor, the maimed, the lame, the blind: And thou shalt be blessed; for they cannot recompense thee: for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: for I was an hungered, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in: naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the LORD will deliver him in time of trouble.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD God is a sun and shield.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord God is a sun and shield: the Lord will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword? Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword? Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do. But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I say unto you my friends, Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do. But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven. Blessed are ye, when men shall revile you, and persecute you, and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely, for my sake. Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: None of these things move me, neither count I my life dear unto myself, so that I might finish my course with joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But none of these things move me, neither count I my life dear unto myself, so that I might finish my course with joy, and the ministry, which I have received of the Lord Jesus, to testify the gospel of the grace of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will speak of thy testimonies ... before kings, and will not be ashamed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He set my feet upon a rock.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That Rock was Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And did all drink the same spiritual drink: for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them: and that Rock was Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Simon Peter ... said, Thou art the Christ the Son of the living God. Upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God. And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Full assurance of faith. Faith without wavering.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water. Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Faith, nothing wavering. . . . He that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword? Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us. For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword? Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us. Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art a God ready to pardon, gracious and merciful.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And refused to obey, neither were mindful of thy wonders that thou didst among them; but hardened their necks, and in their rebellion appointed a captain to return to their bondage: but thou art a God ready to pardon, gracious and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and forsookest them not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The longsuffering of our Lord is salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance? Rom 2:4
MORNING.verse_kjv: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rend your heart, and not your garments, and turn unto the LORD your God: for he is gracious and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repenteth him of the evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And rend your heart, and not your garments, and turn unto the Lord your God: for he is gracious and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repenteth him of the evil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The words of the Lord are pure words.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The words of the Lord are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The statutes of the Lord are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the Lord is pure, enlightening the eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him. Add thou not unto his words, lest he reprove thee, and thou be found a liar.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him. Add thou not unto his words, lest he reprove thee, and thou be found a liar.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee. I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee. I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Nor handling the word of God deceitfully.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man's conscience in the sight of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The whole family in heaven and earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: One God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times, he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is not ashamed to call them brethren.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold my mother and my brethren! Whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven, the same is my brother, and sister, and mother.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren! For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven, the same is my brother, and sister, and mother.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I saw under the altar the souls of them that were slain for the word of God, and for the testimony which they held: ... and white robes were given unto every one of them; and it was said unto them, that they should rest for a little season, until their fellow-servants also and their brethren, that should be killed as they were, should be fulfilled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And when he had opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of them that were slain for the word of God, and for the testimony which they held:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That they without us should not be made perfect.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God having provided some better thing for us, that they without us should not be made perfect.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: After this manner ... pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My Father, and your Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father. The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father. The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father. Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father. Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will receive you, and will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you, And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not far from me; for trouble is near.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not far from me; for trouble is near; for there is none to help.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How long wilt thou forget me, O LORD? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me? How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily? Psa 13:1, 2
MORNING.verse_kjv: How long wilt thou forget me, O Lord? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth. He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
