MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth. He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hallowed be thy name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt worship no other god: for the LORD, whose name is Jealous, is a jealous God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thou shalt worship no other god: for the Lord, whose name is Jealous, is a jealous God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O LORD, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders? Exod 15:11
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Give unto the Lord the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come before him: worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw ... the Lord sitting upon a throne, high and lifted up, and his train filled the temple. Above it stood the seraphims. And one cried unto another, and said, Holy, holy, holy, is the LORD of hosts; the whole earth is full of his glory. Then said I, Woe is me! for I am undone.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the year that king Uzziah died I saw also the Lord sitting upon a throne, high and lifted up, and his train filled the temple.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have heard of thee by the hearing of the ear: but now mine eye seeth thee. Wherefore I abhor myself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have heard of thee by the hearing of the ear: but now mine eye seeth thee. Wherefore I abhor myself, and repent in dust and ashes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That we might be partakers of his holiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure; but he for our profit, that we might be partakers of his holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, let us draw near with a true heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To wit, that God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father, that in him should all fulness dwell; and, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell; And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shalt be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity? Micah 7:18
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy kingdom come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the days of these kings shall the God of heaven set up a kingdom, which shall never be destroyed: and the kingdom shall not be left to other people, but it shall break in pieces and consume all these kingdoms, and it shall stand for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And in the days of these kings shall the God of heaven set up a kingdom, which shall never be destroyed: and the kingdom shall not be left to other people, but it shall break in pieces and consume all these kingdoms, and it shall stand for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A stone . . . cut out without hands.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou sawest till that a stone was cut out without hands, which smote the image upon his feet that were of iron and clay, and brake them to pieces.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The kingdom of God cometh not with observation: neither shall they say, Lo here! or, lo there! for, behold, the kingdom of God is within you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees, when the kingdom of God should come, he answered them and said, The kingdom of God cometh not with observation: Neither shall they say, Lo here! or, lo there! for, behold, the kingdom of God is within you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God. So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should cast seed into the ground; and should sleep, and rise night and day, and the seed should spring and grow up, he knoweth not how. But when the fruit is brought forth, immediately he putteth in the sickle, because the harvest is come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables: And he said, So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should cast seed into the ground; And should sleep, and rise night and day, and the seed should spring and grow up, he knoweth not how.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye ... ready: for in such an hour as ye think not, the Son of man cometh.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: From the first day that thou didst set thine heart to understand, and to chasten thyself before thy God, thy words were heard.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said he unto me, Fear not, Daniel: for from the first day that thou didst set thine heart to understand, and to chasten thyself before thy God, thy words were heard, and I am come for thy words.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Though the LORD be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Though the Lord be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble. Submit yourselves therefore to God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble. Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee. Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications. In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Understanding what the will of the Lord is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This is the will of God, even your sanctification.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth: wherefore lay apart all filthiness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth, that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures. Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye holy; for I am holy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [Jesus] said, Whosoever shall do the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he looked round about on them which sat about him, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren! For whosoever shall do the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock: and the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house and it fell not; for it was founded upon a rock.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For to this end Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the LORD to bruise him; he hath put him to grief: when thou shalt make his soul an offering for sin, he shall see his seed, he shall prolong his days, and the pleasure of the LORD shall prosper in his hand. He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yet it pleased the Lord to bruise him; he hath put him to grief: when thou shalt make his soul an offering for sin, he shall see his seed, he shall prolong his days, and the pleasure of the Lord shall prosper in his hand. He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory? Luke 24:26
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: and that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that if one died for all, then were all dead: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you, who by him do believe in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you, Who by him do believe in God, that raised him up from the dead, and gave him glory; that your faith and hope might be in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Give us this day our daily bread.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Give us this day our daily bread.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His bread shall be given him; his waters shall be sure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall dwell on high: his place of defence shall be the munitions of rocks: bread shall be given him; his waters shall be sure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He humbled thee, and suffered thee to hunger, and fed thee with manna.... that he might make thee know that man doth not live by bread only, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of the LORD doth man live.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he humbled thee, and suffered thee to hunger, and fed thee with manna, which thou knewest not, neither did thy fathers know; that he might make thee know that man doth not live by bread only, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of the Lord doth man live.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven. For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world. Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is my defence.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because of his strength will I wait upon thee: for God is my defence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my rock, and My fortress, and my deliverer; the God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; The God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour; thou savest me from violence.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the LORD shall lift up a standard against him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So shall they fear the name of the Lord from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We may boldly say, The LORD is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? The LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? Psa 27:1
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For thy name's sake lead me, and guide me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name's sake lead me, and guide me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times? Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times? Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me: shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellow-servant, even as I had pity on thee? And his lord was wroth, and delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due unto him. So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you, if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: You.... hath he quickened, . I . having forgiven you all trespasses; blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses; Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever thy band findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men; knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men; Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business? Luke 2:49
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shalt never fall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end; that ye be not slothful, but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end: That ye be not slothful, but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: So run, that ye may obtain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man: but every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man: But every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of Jordan, that it was well watered every where.... even as the garden of the LORD. Then Lot chose him all the plain of Jordan; but the men of Sodom were wicked and sinners before the LORD exceedingly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of Jordan, that it was well watered every where, before the Lord destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah, even as the garden of the Lord, like the land of Egypt, as thou comest unto Zoar. Then Lot chose him all the plain of Jordan; and Lot journeyed east: and they separated themselves the one from the other. But the men of Sodom were wicked and sinners before the Lord exceedingly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [The Lord] delivered just Lot, vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked. The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And delivered just Lot, vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations, and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, he shall be holden up: for God is able to make him stand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who art thou that judgest another man's servant? to his own master he standeth or falleth. Yea, he shall be holden up: for God is able to make him stand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day; and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day: and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the LORD have I righteousness and strength: even to him shall men come; and all that are incensed against him shall be ashamed. In the LORD shall all the seed of Israel be justified, and shall glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Surely, shall one say, in the Lord have I righteousness and strength: even to him shall men come; and all that are incensed against him shall be ashamed. In the Lord shall all the seed of Israel be justified, and shall glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be glad in the LORD, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets; even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe. To declare ... at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets; Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference: To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty: thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the Lord is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved. Thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is ... great in power.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is slow to anger, and great in power, and will not at all acquit the wicked: the Lord hath his way in the whirlwind and in the storm, and the clouds are the dust of his feet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our God whom we serve is able to deliver us, . . . and he will deliver us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If it be so, our God whom we serve is able to deliver us from the burning fiery furnace, and he will deliver us out of thine hand, O king.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not unto us, O Lord, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thine, O LORD, is the greatness, and the power, and the glory, and the victory, and the majesty: for all that is in the heaven and in the earth is thine; thine is the kingdom, O LORD, and thou art exalted as head above all. Now therefore, our God, we thank thee, and praise thy glorious name. But who am I, and what is my people, that we should be able to offer so willingly after this sort? for all things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thine, O Lord, is the greatness, and the power, and the glory, and the victory, and the majesty: for all that is in the heaven and in the earth is thine; thine is the kingdom, O Lord, and thou art exalted as head above all. Now therefore, our God, we thank thee, and praise thy glorious name. But who am I, and what is my people, that we should be able to offer so willingly after this sort? for all things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold the blood of the covenant, which the LORD hath made with you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Moses took the blood, and sprinkled it on the people, and said, Behold the blood of the covenant, which the Lord hath made with you concerning all these words.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace through the blood of his cross.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold.... but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot.... manifest in these last times for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: ... from all your idols, will I cleanse you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Amen: the LORD God ... say so too.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada answered the king, and said, Amen: the Lord God of my lord the king say so too.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth (Heb. The Amen); and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth (The Amen).
EVENING.verse_kjv: That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth; and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth; because the former troubles are forgotten, and because they are hid from mine eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When God made promise to Abraham, because he could swear by no greater, he sware by himself. For men verily swear by the greater: and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife. Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath: that by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For when God made promise to Abraham, because he could swear by no greater, he sware by himself,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For all the promises of God in him are yea, and in him Amen, unto the glory of God by us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For all the promises of God in him are yea, and in him Amen, unto the glory of God by us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things. And blessed be his glorious name for ever. Amen, and Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed be the Lord God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things. And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord shall be thy confidence and shall keep thy foot from being taken.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord shall be thy confidence, and shall keep thy foot from being taken.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The king's heart is in the hand of the LORD, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The king's heart is in the hand of the Lord, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When a man's ways please the LORD, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When a man's ways please the Lord, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I wait for the LORD, my soul cloth wait, and in his word do I hope. My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I wait for the Lord, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope. My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I sought the Lord, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the LORD, and whose hope the LORD is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
MORNING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Consolation in Christ, ... comfort of love, ... fellowship of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble. He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down; he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble. He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down: he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Father ... shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever: the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort; Who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him. And so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him. Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I delight in the law of God after the inward man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy words were found, and I did eat them; and thy word was unto me the joy and rejoicing of mine heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy words were found, and I did eat them; and thy word was unto me the joy and rejoicing of mine heart: for I am called by thy name, O Lord God of hosts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have esteemed the words of his mouth more than my necessary food.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither have I gone back from the commandment of his lips; I have esteemed the words of his mouth more than my necessary food.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I delight to do thy will, O my God: thy law is within my heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes. More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The statutes of the Lord are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the Lord is pure, enlightening the eyes. More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves. For if any be a hearer of the word, and not a doer, he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves. For if any be a hearer of the word, and not a doer, he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord thy God accept thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All these things did Araunah, as a king, give unto the king. And Araunah said unto the king, The Lord thy God accept thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherewith shall I come before the LORD, and bow myself before the high God? shall I come before him with burnt offerings, with calves of a year old? Will the LORD be pleased with thousands of rams, or with ten thousands of rivers of oil? shall I give my firstborn for my transgression, the fruit of my body for the sin of my soul? He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God? Micah 6:6-8
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherewith shall I come before the Lord, and bow myself before the high God? shall I come before him with burnt offerings, with calves of a year old?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is none righteous, no, not one. For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God; being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus: whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood. To declare ... at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Accepted in the Beloved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are complete in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
MORNING.verse_kjv: While he yet spake, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them: and behold a voice out of the cloud, which said, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; hear ye him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I and my Father are one. The Father is in me, and I in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I and my Father are one. But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My Father, and your Father; and ... my God, and your God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Church, which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church, Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having ... these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him. If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him. If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There was ... a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest. And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors. But ye shall not be so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve. For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but  to give his life a ransom for many.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus riseth from supper, and laid aside his garments; and took a towel, and girded himself. After that he poureth water into a bason, and began to wash the disciples' feet, and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he was come from God, and went to God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O God, my heart is fixed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? Psa 27:1
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD. His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the Lord. His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock. And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy: I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock. And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered awhile, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you. To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you. To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The lot is cast into the lap; but the whole disposing thereof is of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The lot is cast into the lap; but the whole disposing thereof is of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shall there be evil in a city, and the LORD hath not done it? Amos 3:6
EVENING.verse_kjv: Shall a trumpet be blown in the city, and the people not be afraid? shall there be evil in a city, and the Lord hath not done it?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the LORD, and there is none else, there is no God beside me: I girded thee, though thou hast not known me: that they may know from the rising of the sun, and from the west, that there is none beside me. I am the LORD, and there is none else. I form the light, and create darkness: I make peace, and create evil: I the Lord do all these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the Lord, and there is none else, there is no God beside me: I girded thee, though thou hast not known me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou? Dan 4:35
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all the inhabitants of the earth are reputed as nothing: and he doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A man's life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Take heed, and beware of covetousness: for a man's life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Better is little with the fear of the Lord than great treasure and trouble therewith.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Godliness with contentment is great gain. Having food and raiment let us be therewith content.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But godliness with contentment is great gain. And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Give me neither poverty nor riches; feed me with food convenient for me: lest I be full, and deny thee, and say, Who is the LORD? or lest I be poor, and steal, and take the name of my God in vain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Remove far from me vanity and lies: give me neither poverty nor riches; feed me with food convenient for me: Lest I be full, and deny thee, and say, Who is the Lord? or lest I be poor, and steal, and take the name of my God in vain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Give us this day our daily bread.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Give us this day our daily bread.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let your conversation be without covetousness: and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is the spirit that quickeneth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his. And if Christ be in you, the body is dead because of sin; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness. But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you, he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye are not in the flesh, but in the Spirit, if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you. Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ, he is none of his.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Reckon ye ... yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Zion said, The LORD hath forsaken me, and my Lord hath forgotten me. Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But Zion said, The Lord hath forsaken me, and my Lord hath forgotten me. Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I forgat prosperity. And I said, My strength and my hope is perished from the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou hast removed my soul far off from peace: I forgat prosperity. And I said, My strength and my hope is perished from the Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Awake, why steepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why sayest thou, O Jacob, and speakest, O Israel, My way is hid from the LORD, and my judgment is passed over from my God? Isa 40:27
MORNING.verse_kjv: Why sayest thou, O Jacob, and speakest, O Israel, My way is hid from the Lord, and my judgment is passed over from my God?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the LORD thy Redeemer.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the Lord thy Redeemer.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are troubled on every side, yet not distressed; we are perplexed, but not in despair; persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We are troubled on every side, yet not distressed; we are perplexed, but not in despair; Persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the Lord will hear them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the Lord will hear them, I the God of Israel will not forsake them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Psa 4:6
EVENING.verse_kjv: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What hath man of all his labour, and of the vexation of his heart, wherein he hath laboured under the sun? For all his days are sorrows, and his travail grief; yea, his heart taketh not rest in the night. All is vanity and vexation of spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For what hath man of all his labour, and of the vexation of his heart, wherein he hath laboured under the sun? For all his days are sorrows, and his travail grief; yea, his heart taketh not rest in the night. This is also vanity. Therefore I hated life; because the work that is wrought under the sun is grievous unto me: for all is vanity and vexation of spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They have forsaken me the fountain of living waters, and hewed them out cisterns, broken cisterns, that can hold no water.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For my people have committed two evils; they have forsaken me the fountain of living waters, and hewed them out cisterns, broken cisterns, that can hold no water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will pour water upon him that is thirsty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I will pour water upon him that is thirsty, and floods upon the dry ground: I will pour my spirit upon thy seed, and my blessing upon thine offspring:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven. For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven. For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world? ... If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world? Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The end of all things is at hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw a great white throne, and him that sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw a great white throne, and him that sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away; and there was found no place for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The heavens and the earth, which are now... are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea; though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof.
EVENING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, we have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We ... look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord reigneth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear ye not me? saith the LORD: will ye not tremble at my presence, which have placed the sand for the bound of the sea by a perpetual decree, that it cannot pass it: and though the waves thereof toss themselves, yet can they not prevail; though they roar yet can they not pass over it? Jer 5:22
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear ye not me? saith the Lord: will ye not tremble at my presence, which have placed the sand for the bound of the sea by a perpetual decree, that it cannot pass it: and though the waves thereof toss themselves, yet can they not prevail; though they roar, yet can they not pass over it?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south. But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south. But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He changeth the times and the seasons: he removeth kings, and setteth up kings: he giveth wisdom unto the wise, and knowledge to them that know understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he changeth the times and the seasons: he removeth kings, and setteth up kings: he giveth wisdom unto the wise, and knowledge to them that know understanding:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If God be for us, who can be against us? Rom 8:31
MORNING.verse_kjv: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father. The very hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed to your spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And did not he make one? Yet had he the residue of the spirit. And wherefore one? That he might seek a godly seed. Therefore take heed to your spirit, and let none deal treacherously against the wife of his youth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name; and we forbad him, because he followeth not with us. And Jesus said unto him, Forbid him not: for he that is not against us is for us. Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did? But he ... rebuked them, and said, Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And John answered and said, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name; and we forbad him, because he followeth not with us. And Jesus said unto him, Forbid him not: for he that is not against us is for us. And when his disciples James and John saw this, they said, Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Eldad and Medad do prophesy in the camp. And Joshua the son of Nun ... answered and said, My lord Moses, forbid them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there ran a young man, and told Moses, and said, Eldad and Medad do prophesy in the camp.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts. If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit. Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Himself took our infirmities and bare our sicknesses.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying, Himself took our infirmities, and bare our sicknesses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall the priest command to take for him that is to be cleansed two birds alive and clean, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop: and the priest shall command that one of the birds be killed in an earthen vessel over running water: as for the living bird, he shall take it, and the cedar wood, and the scarlet, and the hyssop, and shall dip them and the living bird in the blood of the bird that was killed over the running water: and he shall sprinkle upon him that is to be cleansed from the leprosy seven times, and shall pronounce him clean, and shall let the living bird loose into the open field.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then shall the priest command to take for him that is to be cleansed two birds alive and clean, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it came to pass, when he was in a certain city, behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And Jesus, moved with compassion, put forth his hand, and touched him, and saith unto him, I will; be thou clean. And as soon as he had spoken, immediately the leprosy departed from him, and he was cleansed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus, moved with compassion, put forth his hand, and touched him, and saith unto him, I will; be thou clean. And as soon as he had spoken, immediately the leprosy departed from him, and he was cleansed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He whom thou blessest is blessed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now therefore, I pray thee, curse me this people; for they are too mighty for me: peradventure I shall prevail, that we may smite them, and that I may drive them out of the land: for I wot that he whom thou blessest is blessed, and he whom thou cursest is cursed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted. Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth. Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled. Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy. Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God. Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God. Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven. Blessed are ye, when men shall revile you, and persecute you, and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely, for my sake. Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
