EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire: mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required. Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book it is written of me, I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire; mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is no God else beside me: a just God and a Saviour; there is none beside me. Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth: for I am God, and there is none else.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Tell ye, and bring them near; yea, let them take counsel together: who hath declared this from ancient time? who hath told it from that time? have not I the Lord? and there is no God else beside me; a just God and a Saviour; there is none beside me. Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth: for I am God, and there is none else.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might be rich.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Enemy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand. Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness; and your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace; above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the LORD shall be a light unto me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the Lord shall be a light unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He is altogether lovely.
MORNING.verse_kjv: His mouth is most sweet: yea, he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, and this is my friend, O daughters of Jerusalem.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My meditation of him shall be sweet.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My beloved is ... the chiefest among ten thousand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My beloved is white and ruddy, the chiefest among ten thousand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A chief corner stone, elect, precious: and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture, Behold, I lay in Sion a chief corner stone, elect, precious: and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God ... hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I count all things but loss, for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ, and be found in him, not having mine own righteousness which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ, And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: David encouraged himself in the Lord his God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And David was greatly distressed; for the people spake of stoning him, because the soul of all the people was grieved, every man for his sons and for his daughters: but David encouraged himself in the Lord his God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Simon Peter answered him, Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears. They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay. He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my distress I called upon the Lord, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears. They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the Lord was my stay. He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth. My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad. O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together. I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears. O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? Psa 77:9
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though He bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wait on the LORD, and he shall save thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Say not thou, I will recompense evil; but wait on the Lord, and he shall save thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall not need to fight in this battle: set yourselves, stand ye still, and see the salvation of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye shall not need to fight in this battle: set yourselves, stand ye still, and see the salvation of the Lord with you, O Judah and Jerusalem: fear not, nor be dismayed; to morrow go out against them: for the Lord will be with you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be weary in well doing.... in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be patient therefore, brethren, unto the coming of the Lord. Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take us the foxes, the little foxes, that spoil the vines for our vines have tender grapes.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Take us the foxes, the little foxes, that spoil the vines: for our vines have tender grapes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby many be defiled.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby many be defiled;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth? Gal 5:7
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ: only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The tongue is a little member, and boasteth great things. Behold, how great a matter a little fire kindieth And the tongue is a fire, a world of iniquity: so is the tongue among our members, that it defileth the whole body, and setteth on fire the course of nature; and it is set on fire of hell. The tongue can no man tame; it is an unruly evil, full of deadly poison.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even so the tongue is a little member, and boasteth great things. Behold, how great a matter a little fire kindleth! And the tongue is a fire, a world of iniquity: so is the tongue among our members, that it defileth the whole body, and setteth on fire the course of nature; and it is set on fire of hell. But the tongue can no man tame; it is an unruly evil, full of deadly poison.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your speech be always with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who hath directed the Spirit of the LORD, or being his counsellor hath taught him? Isa 40:13
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who hath directed the Spirit of the Lord, or being his counsellor hath taught him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty; and base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, yea, and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are: that no flesh should glory in his presence.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Born not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My Spirit remaineth among you: fear ye not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: According to the word that I covenanted with you when ye came out of Egypt, so my spirit remaineth among you: fear ye not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The battle is not yours, but God's.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, Hearken ye, all Judah, and ye inhabitants of Jerusalem, and thou king Jehoshaphat, Thus saith the Lord unto you, Be not afraid nor dismayed by reason of this great multitude; for the battle is not yours, but God's.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD saveth not with sword and spear: for the battle is the LORD'S.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all this assembly shall know that the Lord saveth not with sword and spear: for the battle is the Lord's, and he will give you into our hands.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Do as thou hast said.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And now, O Lord God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear. So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word. Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope. Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage. The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver. For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven. Thy faithfulness is unto all generations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear. So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word. Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath; that by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us: which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil; whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Exceeding great and precious promises.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that heareth me, watching daily at my gates, waiting at the posts of my doors.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that heareth me, watching daily at my gates, waiting at the posts of my doors.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A continual burnt offering throughout your generations at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the LORD: where I will meet you, to speak there unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This shall be a continual burnt offering throughout your generations at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the Lord: where I will meet you, to speak there unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In all places where I record my name I will come unto thee, and I will bless thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: An altar of earth thou shalt make unto me, and shalt sacrifice thereon thy burnt offerings, and thy peace offerings, thy sheep, and thine oxen: in all places where I record my name I will come unto thee, and I will bless thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him. God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him. God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Pray without ceasing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Pray without ceasing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His name shall be called Counsellor.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit of the LORD shall rest upon him, the spirit of wisdom and understanding, the spirit of counsel and might, the spirit of knowledge, and of the fear of the LORD. And shall make him of quick understanding in the fear of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the spirit of the Lord shall rest upon him, the spirit of wisdom and understanding, the spirit of counsel and might, the spirit of knowledge and of the fear of the Lord; And shall make him of quick understanding in the fear of the Lord: and he shall not judge after the sight of his eyes, neither reprove after the hearing of his ears:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Doth not wisdom cry? and understanding put forth her voice? Unto you, O men, I call; and my voice is to the sons of man. O ye simple, understand wisdom: and ye fools, be ye of an understanding heart. Hear; for I will speak of excellent things; and the opening of my lips shall be right things. Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Doth not wisdom cry? and understanding put forth her voice?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD of hosts ... is wonderful in counsel, and excellent in working.
EVENING.verse_kjv: This also cometh forth from the Lord of hosts, which is wonderful in counsel, and excellent in working.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ever follow that which is good.
MORNING.verse_kjv: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps. who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; ... but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The mighty God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever. Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most Mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty. And in thy majesty ride prosperously... Thy throne, O God is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou spakest in vision to thy Holy One, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The man that is my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, God, is my salvation; I will trust and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now thanks be unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy. To the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The ways of the Lord are right, and the just shall walk in them: but the transgressors shall fall therein.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is wise, and he shall understand these things? prudent, and he shall know them? for the ways of the Lord are right, and the just shall walk in them: but the transgressors shall fall therein.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto you ... which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient.... a stone of stumbling, and a rock of offence.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner, And a stone of stumbling, and a rock of offence, even to them which stumble at the word, being disobedient: whereunto also they were appointed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The way of the LORD is strength to the upright: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The way of the Lord is strength to the upright: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance: but whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken away even that he hath.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that is of God heareth God's words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that is of God heareth God's words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye will not come unto me, that ye might have life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The everlasting Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God is one LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I and my Father are one, the Father is in me, and I in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I and my Father are one. But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us. Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us. Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold I and the children which God hath given me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And again, I will put my trust in him. And again, Behold I and the children which God hath given me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall see of the travail of his soul, and shall be satisfied: by his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; for he shall bear their iniquities.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Before Abraham was, I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Before Abraham was, I am.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God said unto Moses, I AM THAT I AM: and he said, Thus shalt thou say unto the children of Israel, I AM hath sent me unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God said unto Moses, I AM THAT I AM: and he said, Thus shalt thou say unto the children of Israel, I AM hath sent me unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is before all things, and by him all things consist.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: but rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The exhortation ... speaketh unto you as unto children, My son, despise not thou the chastening of the Lord, nor faint when thou art rebuked of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children, My son, despise not thou the chastening of the Lord, nor faint when thou art rebuked of him:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless, afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We have not a high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Prince of Peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment. The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness. He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass; as showers that water the earth. In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment. The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness. He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Glory to God ... on earth peace, good will toward men.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Through the tender mercy of our God; ... the dayspring from on high hath visited us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: peace by Jesus Christ: (he is Lord of all).
EVENING.verse_kjv: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel, preaching peace by Jesus Christ: (he is Lord of all:)

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take thou also unto thee principal spices, and thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take thou also unto thee principal spices, of pure myrrh five hundred shekels, and of sweet cinnamon half so much, even two hundred and fifty shekels, and of sweet calamus two hundred and fifty shekels, And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it shall be an holy anointing oil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Upon man's flesh shall it not be poured, neither shall ye make any other like it, after the composition of it: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Upon man's flesh shall it not be poured, neither shall ye make any other like it, after the composition of it: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy God hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fulness have all we received.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which ... hath anointed us, is God; who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God; Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fashion of this world passeth away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they that use this world, as not abusing it: for the fashion of this world passeth away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted: but the rich, in that he is made low: because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away. For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat, but it withereth the grass, and the flower thereof falleth, and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth: so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is; that I may know how frail I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is; that I may know how frail I am.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape. But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape. But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is sown in dishonour; it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness; it is raised in power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is sown in dishonour; it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness; it is raised in power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ... the Spirit of truth is come, he will guide you into all truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To the law and to the testimony: if they speak not according to this word, it is because there is no light in them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To the law and to the testimony: if they speak not according to this word, it is because there is no light in them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness; That the man of God may be perfect, throughly (Note: "throughly" is an archaic spelling still found in most KJV Bibles, for the modern word spelled "thoroughly") furnished unto all good works.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness: That the man of God may be perfect, thoroughly furnished unto all good works.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The holy Scriptures ... are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that men would praise the Lord for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men Psa 107:8
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh that men would praise the Lord for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee! Psa 31:19
MORNING.verse_kjv: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will, to the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved. That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will, To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved. That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How great is his goodness, and how great is his beauty! Zech 9:17
MORNING.verse_kjv: For how great is his goodness, and how great is his beauty! corn shall make the young men cheerful, and new wine the maids.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works. All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee. They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power; to make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, we count them happy which endure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, we count them happy which endure. Ye have heard of the patience of Job, and have seen the end of the Lord; that the Lord is very pitiful, and of tender mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations: . . . knowing that tribulation worketh patience; And patience, experience; and experience, hope: and hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations; knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience. But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. For when I am weak, then am I strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness; above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked. And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness; Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked. And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord GOD will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the LORD hath spoken it. And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the LORD; ... we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the Lord hath spoken it. And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the Lord; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The children of Israel pitched before them like two little flocks of kids; but the Syrians filled the country.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the children of Israel were numbered, and were all present, and went against them: and the children of Israel pitched before them like two little flocks of kids; but the Syrians filled the country.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD, because the Syrians have said, the LORD is God of the hills, but he is not God of the valleys; therefore will I deliver all this great multitude into thine hand, and ye shall know that I am the LORD. And they pitched one over against the other seven days; and so it was, that in the seventh day the battle was joined: and the children of Israel slew of the Syrians an hundred thousand footmen in one day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there came a man of God, and spake unto the king of Israel, and said, Thus saith the Lord, Because the Syrians have said, The Lord is God of the hills, but he is not God of the valleys, therefore will I deliver all this great multitude into thine hand, and ye shall know that I am the Lord. And they pitched one over against the other seven days. And so it was, that in the seventh day the battle was joined: and the children of Israel slew of the Syrians an hundred thousand footmen in one day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not, dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They shall fight against thee; but they shall not prevail against thee; for I am with thee, saith the LORD, to deliver thee, Jer 1:19
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they shall fight against thee; but they shall not prevail against thee; for I am with thee, saith the Lord, to deliver thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The mighty God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross. Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time, without sin, unto salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is the mediator of the new testament, that by means of death, . . . they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament, that by means of death, for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament, they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth, to the uttermost part of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the LORD thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the Lord thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you.... brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness. In Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature. And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature. And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I sought him, but I found him not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By night on my bed I sought him whom my soul loveth: I sought him, but I found him not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Return unto the LORD thy God; for thou hast fallen by thine iniquity. Take with you words, and turn to the LORD: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Israel, return unto the Lord thy God; for thou hast fallen by thine iniquity. Take with you words, and turn to the Lord: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously: so will we render the calves of our lips.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God. But every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man: But every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Do not err, my beloved brethren. Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Do not err, my beloved brethren. Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wait on the Lord; be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them? Luke 18:7
EVENING.verse_kjv: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation. My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation. My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He led them on safely.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I lead in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of judgment.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I lead in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of judgment:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I send an Angel before thee, to keep thee in the way, and to bring thee into the place which I have prepared.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Behold, I send an Angel before thee, to keep thee in the way, and to bring thee into the place which I have prepared.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: So didst thou lead thy people, to make thyself a glorious name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As a beast goeth down into the valley, the Spirit of the Lord caused him to rest: so didst thou lead thy people, to make thyself a glorious name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lead me, O Lord, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O send out thy light and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy tabernacles. Then will I go unto the altar of God, unto God my exceeding joy: yea, upon the harp will I praise thee, O God my God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O send out thy light and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy tabernacles. Then will I go unto the altar of God, unto God my exceeding joy: yea, upon the harp will I praise thee, O God my God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are washed, ... ye are sanctified, ye are justified.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And such were some of you: but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified, but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and by the Spirit of our God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word, that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God's elect? It is God that justifieth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven. Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. Blessed is the man unto whom the Lord imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Godly sorrow worketh repentance not to be repented of.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of: but the sorrow of the world worketh death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peter remembered the word of Jesus, which said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And he went out, and wept bitterly.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus, which said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And he went out, and wept bitterly.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of my head: therefore my heart faileth me. Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me: O LORD, make haste to help me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me. Be pleased, O Lord, to deliver me: O Lord, make haste to help me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good: and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God? Micah 6:8
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the Lord require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is it well with thee? And she answered, It is well.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Run now, I pray thee, to meet her, and say unto her, Is it well with thee? is it well with thy husband? is it well with the child? And she answered, It is well.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We having the same spirit of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We having the same spirit of faith, according as it is written, I believed, and therefore have I spoken; we also believe, and therefore speak;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As chastened, and not killed; as sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed; As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are troubled on every side, yet not distressed; we are perplexed, but not in despair; persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed; always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body. For which cause we faint not, but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day. For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory; while we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We are troubled on every side, yet not distressed; we are perplexed, but not in despair;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it; That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet smelling savour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy word hath quickened me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple. The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
