MORNING.verse_kjv: The law of the Lord is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the Lord is sure, making wise the simple. The statutes of the Lord are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the Lord is pure, enlightening the eyes.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son. If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it. And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever; even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son. If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it. And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling; one Lord, one faith, one baptism, one God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done, as in heaven, so in earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way ... let us draw near.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the fear of the LORD is strong confidence: and his children shall have a place of refuge.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the fear of the Lord is strong confidence: and his children shall have a place of refuge.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who art thou, that thou shouldest be afraid of a man that shall die, and of the son of man which shall be made as grass; and forgettest the LORD thy maker? Isa 51:12, 13
MORNING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that comforteth you: who art thou, that thou shouldest be afraid of a man that shall die, and of the son of man which shall be made as grass;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am with thee to deliver thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: How wilt thou do in the swellings of Jordan? Jer 12:5
EVENING.verse_kjv: If thou hast run with the footmen, and they have wearied thee, then how canst thou contend with horses? and if in the land of peace, wherein thou trustedst, they wearied thee, then how wilt thou do in the swelling of Jordan?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For Jordan overfloweth all his banks all the time of harvest. The priests that bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD stood firm on dry ground in the midst of Jordan, and all the Israelites passed over on dry ground, until all the people were passed clean over Jordan.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the priests that bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord stood firm on dry ground in the midst of Jordan, and all the Israelites passed over on dry ground, until all the people were passed clean over Jordan.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels, for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; for he is faithful that promised.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That ye, being rooted and grounded in love, may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height; and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We are his workmanship.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They brought great stones, costly stones, and hewed stones, to lay the foundation of the house.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the king commanded, and they brought great stones, costly stones, and hewed stones, to lay the foundation of the house.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief cornerstone; in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord: in whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Which in time past were not a people, but are now the people of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which in time past were not a people, but are now the people of God: which had not obtained mercy, but now have obtained mercy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are God's building.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word. With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word. With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul: discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul; Discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined. Neither have I gone back from the commandment of his lips; I have esteemed the words of his mouth more than my necessary food.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined. Neither have I gone back from the commandment of his lips; I have esteemed the words of his mouth more than my necessary food.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed; and ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed; And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fellow citizens with the saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are come unto mount Sion, and unto the city of the living God, the heavenly Jerusalem, and to an innumerable company of angels, to the general assembly and church of the firstborn, which are written in heaven, and to God the Judge of all, and to the spirits of just men made perfect.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye are come unto mount Sion, and unto the city of the living God, the heavenly Jerusalem, and to an innumerable company of angels, To the general assembly and church of the firstborn, which are written in heaven, and to God the Judge of all, and to the spirits of just men made perfect,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: These all died in faith, not having received the promises, but having seen them afar off, and were persuaded of them, and embraced them, and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: These all died in faith, not having received the promises, but having seen them afar off, and were persuaded of them, and embraced them, and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our conversation (Gr. citizenship) is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Father, . . . hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy thoughts are very deep.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We . . . do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That ye, being rooted and grounded in love, may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height; and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out! Rom 11:33
MORNING.verse_kjv: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out!

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the Lord. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to usward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Many, O Lord my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They that plow iniquity, and sow wickedness, reap the same.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Even as I have seen, they that plow iniquity, and sow wickedness, reap the same.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: To him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting. And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not. As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But this I say, He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In measure, when it shooteth forth, thou wilt debate with it: he stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us fall now into the hand of the LORD; for his mercies are great.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And David said unto Gad, I am in a great strait: let us fall now into the hand of the Lord; for his mercies are great: and let me not fall into the hand of man.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am with thee, saith the LORD, to save thee: ... I wilt correct thee in measure, and will not leave thee altogether unpunished.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I am with thee, saith the Lord, to save thee: though I make a full end of all nations whither I have scattered thee, yet will I not make a full end of thee: but I will correct thee in measure, and will not leave thee altogether unpunished.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever. He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever. He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities. For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will spare them, as a man spareth his own son that serveth him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they shall be mine, saith the Lord of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels; and I will spare them, as a man spareth his own son that serveth him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: but I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I believed not the words, until I came, and mine eyes had seen it; and, behold, the half was not told me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Howbeit I believed not the words, until I came, and mine eyes had seen it: and, behold, the half was not told me: thy wisdom and prosperity exceedeth the fame which I heard.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father, full of grace and truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My speech and my preaching was ... in demonstration of the Spirit and of power: that your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God. But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man's wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God. But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thine eyes shall see the King in his beauty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thine eyes shall see the king in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We shall see him as he is.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my flesh I shall see God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I shall be satisfied.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By their fruits ye shall know them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter? Can the fig tree, my brethren, bear olive berries? either a vine, figs? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh. Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Either make the tree good, and his fruit good; or else make the tree corrupt, and his fruit corrupt; for the tree is known by his fruit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Either make the tree good, and his fruit good; or else make the tree corrupt, and his fruit corrupt: for the tree is known by his fruit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What could have been done more to my vineyard, that I have not done in it? Isa 5:4
MORNING.verse_kjv: What could have been done more to my vineyard, that I have not done in it? wherefore, when I looked that it should bring forth grapes, brought it forth wild grapes?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will make the place of my feet glorious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD, The heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thus saith the Lord, The heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool: where is the house that ye build unto me? and where is the place of my rest?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth! Behold, heaven and the heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house which I have built! II Chron 6:18
EVENING.verse_kjv: But will God in very deed dwell with men on the earth? behold, heaven and the heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house which I have built!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, Yet once, it is a little while, and I will shake the heavens, and the earth, and the sea, and the dry land; and I will shake all nations, and the desire of all nations shall come: and I will fill this house with glory, saith the LORD of hosts. The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former, saith the LORD of hosts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord of hosts; Yet once, it is a little while, and I will shake the heavens, and the earth, and the sea, and the dry land; And I will shake all nations, and the desire of all nations shall come: and I will fill this house with glory, saith the Lord of hosts. The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former, saith the Lord of hosts: and in this place will I give peace, saith the Lord of hosts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea. And I heard a great voice out of heaven, saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea. And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When I sit in darkness the Lord shall be a light unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the Lord shall be a light unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned neither shall the flame kindle upon thee. For I am the LORD thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee. For I am the Lord thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt for thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will bring the blind by a way that they knew not; I will lead them in paths that they have not known: I will make darkness light before them, and crooked things straight. These things will I do unto them, and not forsake them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will bring the blind by a way that they knew not; I will lead them in paths that they have not known: I will make darkness light before them, and crooked things straight. These things will I do unto them, and not forsake them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee. In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee. In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? Psa 27:1
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God is one LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A mediator is not a mediator of one, but God is one.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one, but God is one.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have sinned with our fathers, we have committed iniquity, we have done wickedly. Our fathers understood not thy wonders in Egypt; they remembered not the multitude of thy mercies. .. . Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had not Moses his chosen stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, lest he should destroy them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: We have sinned with our fathers, we have committed iniquity, we have done wickedly. Our fathers understood not thy wonders in Egypt; they remembered not the multitude of thy mercies; but provoked him at the sea, even at the Red sea. Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had not Moses his chosen stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, lest he should destroy them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is the mediator of a better covenant, which was established upon better promises. I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry, by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant, which was established upon better promises. For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
MORNING.verse_kjv: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It shall come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that I will hear; for I am gracious.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For that is his covering only, it is his raiment for his skin: wherein shall he sleep? and it shall come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that I will hear; for I am gracious.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the Lord their God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the LORD, and he will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the Lord, and he will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom. And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom. And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: His dear Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold my servant, whom I uphold; mine elect, in whom my soul delighteth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold my servant, whom I uphold; mine elect, in whom my soul delighteth; I have put my spirit upon him: he shall bring forth judgment to the Gentiles.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his son to be the propitiation for our sins. And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins. And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying in the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ... have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit ... helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is a hope of a tree, if it he cut down, that it will sprout again, and that the tender branch thereof will not cease.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For there is hope of a tree, if it be cut down, that it will sprout again, and that the tender branch thereof will not cease.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He restoreth my soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of. but the sorrow of the world worketh death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of: but the sorrow of the world worketh death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless, afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: After all that is come upon us for our evil deeds, and for our great trespass, seeing that thou our God hast punished us less than our iniquities deserve, and hast given us such deliverance as this.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And after all that is come upon us for our evil deeds, and for our great trespass, seeing that thou our God hast punished us less than our iniquities deserve, and hast given us such deliverance as this;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the LORD shall be a light unto me. He will bring me forth to the light, and I shall behold his righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the Lord shall be a light unto me. I will bear the indignation of the Lord, because I have sinned against him, until he plead my cause, and execute judgment for me: he will bring me forth to the light, and I shall behold his righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: His truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thus saith the Lord of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear ye not, stand still, and see the salvation of the LORD. The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Moses said unto the people, Fear ye not, stand still, and see the salvation of the Lord, which he will shew to you to day: for the Egyptians whom ye have seen to day, ye shall see them again no more for ever. The Lord shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts? Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself. handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts? Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My kingdom is not of this world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: This man, after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever, sat down on the right hand of God; from henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But this man, after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever, sat down on the right hand of God; From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Thou hast said: nevertheless I say unto you, Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places, far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come: and hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church, which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall shew who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Which in his times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he answered and said unto them, My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren: saying, I will declare thy name unto my brethren; in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren, Saying, I will declare thy name unto my brethren, in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My meat is to do the will of him that sent me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected; hereby know we that we are in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What doest thou here, Elijah? I Kings 19:9
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he came thither unto a cave, and lodged there; and, behold, the word of the Lord came to him, and he said unto him, What doest thou here, Elijah?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth the way that I take.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But he knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, thou hast searched me, and known me. Thou knowest my downsitting, and mine uprising; thou understandest my thought afar off. Thou compassest my path, and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways, Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence? If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea; even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are, and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain: and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the LORD shall be safe.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For a just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again: but the wicked shall fall into mischief.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye cannot serve God and Mammon.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness. What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed? for the end of those things is death. But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For when ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me: for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: O Lord our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: [Manasseh] did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, after the abominations of the heathen, and he reared up altars for Baal. And he built altars for all the host of heaven in the two courts of the house of the LORD. And he made his son pass through the fire, and observed times, and used enchantments, and dealt with familiar spirits and wizards: he wrought much wickedness in the sight of the LORD, to provoke him to anger.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, after the abominations of the heathen, whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel. For he built up again the high places which Hezekiah his father had destroyed; and he reared up altars for Baal, and made a grove, as did Ahab king of Israel; and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served them. And he built altars for all the host of heaven in the two courts of the house of the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And when he was in affliction, he besought the LORD his God, and humbled himself greatly before the God of his fathers, and prayed unto him: and he was entreated of him, and heard his supplication.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he was in affliction, he besought the Lord his God, and humbled himself greatly before the God of his fathers, And prayed unto him: and he was entreated of him, and heard his supplication, and brought him again to Jerusalem into his kingdom. Then Manasseh knew that the Lord he was God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the LORD: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord delighteth in thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi–bah, and thy land Beulah: for the Lord delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thus saith the LORD that created thee.... Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee. Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of mine hands: thy walls are continually before me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee. Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My delights were with the sons of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoicing in the habitable part of his earth; and my delights were with the sons of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They shall be mine, saith the LORD of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels; and I will spare them, as a man spareth his own son that serveth him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they shall be mine, saith the Lord of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels; and I will spare them, as a man spareth his own son that serveth him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: You, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The sorrow of the world worketh death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of: but the sorrow of the world worketh death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When Ahithophel saw that his counsel was not followed, he saddled his ass, and arose, and gat him home to his house, to his city, and put his household in order, and hanged himself, and died.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when Ahithophel saw that his counsel was not followed, he saddled his ass, and arose, and gat him home to his house, to his city, and put his household in order, and hanged himself, and died, and was buried in the sepulchre of his father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A wounded spirit who can bear? Prov 18:14
EVENING.verse_kjv: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is there no balm in Gilead? is there no physician there? why then is not the health of the daughter of my people recovered? Jer 8:22
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is there no balm in Gilead; is there no physician there? why then is not the health of the daughter of my people recovered?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek: he hath sent me to bind up the broken-hearted, to comfort all that mourn; to appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Spirit of the Lord God is upon me; because the Lord hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Philip preached unto him Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Philip opened his mouth, and began at the same scripture, and preached unto him Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The glory which thou gavest me I have given them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I saw ... the Lord sitting upon a throne, high and lifted up, and his train filled the temple. Above it stood the seraphims. And one cried unto another, and said, Holy, holy, holy, is the LORD of hosts; the whole earth is full of his glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In the year that king Uzziah died I saw also the Lord sitting upon a throne, high and lifted up, and his train filled the temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: These things said Esaias, when he saw his glory, and spake of him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things said Esaias, when he saw his glory, and spake of him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness ... of a man above upon it. As the appearance of the bow that is in the cloud in the day of rain, so was the appearance of the brightness round about. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And above the firmament that was over their heads was the likeness of a throne, as the appearance of a sapphire stone: and upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it. As the appearance of the bow that is in the cloud in the day of rain, so was the appearance of the brightness round about. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the Lord. And when I saw it, I fell upon my face, and I heard a voice of one that spake.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech thee, shew me thy glory. And he said, Thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory. And he said, Thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My son, if sinners entice thee, consent thou not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My son, if sinners entice thee, consent thou not.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: She took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Did not Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the accursed thing, and wrath fell on all the congregation of Israel? and that man perished not alone in his iniquity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Did not Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the accursed thing, and wrath fell on all the congregation of Israel? and that man perished not alone in his iniquity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil; neither shalt thou speak in a cause to decline after many to wrest judgment:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: None of us liveth to himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For none of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingbiock to them that are weak. When ye sin so against the brethren, and wound their weak conscience, ye sin against Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak. But when ye sin so against the brethren, and wound their weak conscience, ye sin against Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: All we, like sheep, have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not every one that saith.... Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge; and to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness; and to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity. For if these things be in you, and abound, they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ. But he that lacketh these things is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins. Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God: not of works, lest any man should boast.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that he might deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil; And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O death, where is thy sting? O grave, where is thy victory? Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: O death, where is thy sting? O grave, where is thy victory? But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, we have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens. Therefore we are always confident, knowing that, whilst we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord. We are willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, we have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me. In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: One thing have I desired of the Lord, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the LORD, and to enquire in his temple.
MORNING.verse_kjv: One thing have I desired of the Lord, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to enquire in his temple.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings. They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures. For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Do ye now believe? John 16:31
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: What doth it profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him? Faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What doth it profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him? Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By faith Abraham, when he was tried, offered up Isaac: and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son. Accounting that God was able to raise him up, even from the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: By faith Abraham, when he was tried, offered up Isaac: and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar? Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar? Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By their fruits ye shall know them. Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them. Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord be with you all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord be with you all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come.
MORNING.verse_kjv: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;
