MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Comforter ... even the Spirit of truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest. And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We glory in tribulations.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: but rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, rejoice.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Although the fig tree shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labour of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: Yet I will rejoice in the LORD, I will joy in the God of my salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Although the fig tree shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labour of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: Yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will joy in the God of my salvation.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A man shall be as a hiding place from the wind, and a covert from the tempest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And a man shall be as an hiding place from the wind, and a covert from the tempest; as rivers of water in a dry place, as the shadow of a great rock in a weary land.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Forasmuch ... as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The man that is my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I and my Father are one.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I and my Father are one.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There shall be a tabernacle for a shadow in the daytime from the heat, and for a place of refuge, and for a covert from storm and from rain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And there shall be a tabernacle for a shadow in the daytime from the heat, and for a place of refuge, and for a covert from storm and from rain.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand. The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord is thy keeper: the Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand. The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
MORNING.verse_kjv: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I create new heavens and a new earth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The new heavens and the new earth, which I will make, shall remain before me.... so shall your seed and your name remain.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the new heavens and the new earth, which I will make, shall remain before me, saith the Lord, so shall your seed and your name remain.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea. And I John saw the holy city, new Jerusalem, coming down from God out of heaven, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband. And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God. And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away. And he that sat upon the throne said, Behold, I make all things new.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Of his fullness have all we received, and grace for grace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou anointest my head with oil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you ail things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh: How much more shall the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God, purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For if the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh: How much more shall the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God, purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of sprinkling, that speaketh better things than that of Abel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant, and to the blood of sprinkling, that speaketh better things than that of Abel.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law, he took the blood of calves and of goats, with water, and scarlet wool, and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book, and all the people. Moreover he sprinkled ... with blood both the tabernacle, and all the vessels of the ministry. And almost all things are by the law purged with blood; and without shedding of blood is no remission.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law, he took the blood of calves and of goats, with water, and scarlet wool, and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book, and all the people, Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle, and all the vessels of the ministry. And almost all things are by the law purged with blood; and without shedding of blood is no remission.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Is any thing too hard for the LORD? Gen 18:14
MORNING.verse_kjv: Is any thing too hard for the Lord? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication, with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known unto God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Casting all your care upon him, for he careth for you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hezekiah received the letter from the hand of the messengers, and read it: and Hezekiah went up unto the house of the LORD, and spread it before the LORD. And Hezekiah prayed unto the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Hezekiah received the letter from the hand of the messengers, and read it: and Hezekiah went up unto the house of the Lord, and spread it before the Lord. And Hezekiah prayed unto the Lord, saying,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It shall come to pass, that before they call, I will answer; and while they are yet speaking, I will hear.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And it shall come to pass, that before they call, I will answer; and while they are yet speaking, I will hear.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications. Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our bodies washed with pure water.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt ... make a laver of brass.... and thou shalt put it between the tabernacle of the congregation and the altar, and thou shalt put water therein. For Aaron and his sons shall wash their hands and their feet thereat: when they go into the tabernacle of the congregation, they shall wash with water, that they die not; ... they shall wash their hands and their feet, that they die not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou shalt also make a laver of brass, and his foot also of brass, to wash withal: and thou shalt put it between the tabernacle of the congregation and the altar, and thou shalt put water therein.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In my flesh shall I see God: whom I shall see for myself, and mine eyes shall behold, and not another.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God: Whom I shall see for myself, and mine eyes shall behold, and not another; though my reins be consumed within me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And there shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth, neither whatsoever worketh abomination, or maketh a lie: but they which are written in the Lamb's book of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art of purer eyes than to behold evil, and canst not look on iniquity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thou art of purer eyes than to behold evil, and canst not look on iniquity: wherefore lookest thou upon them that deal treacherously, and holdest thy tongue when the wicked devoureth the man that is more righteous than he?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I beseech you, therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Where shall wisdom be found? Job 28:12
MORNING.verse_kjv: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him. But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him. But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The only wise God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be not wise in thine own eyes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the Lord, and depart from evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ah, Lord GOD! behold, I cannot speak: for I am a child. But the Lord said unto me, Say not, I am a child: for thou shalt go to all that I shall send thee, and whatsoever I command thee thou shalt speak. Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the LORD.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then said I, Ah, Lord God! behold, I cannot speak: for I am a child.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you. Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: All things whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would not live alway.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I loathe it; I would not live alway: let me alone; for my days are vanity.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And I said, O that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest. I would hasten my escape from the windy storm and tempest.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest. I would hasten my escape from the windy storm and tempest.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In this we groan, earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven. For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For in this we groan, earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us run with patience the race that is set before us. Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who, for the joy that was set before him, endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God. For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together. For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together. For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold. My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he knoweth the way that I take: when he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold. My foot hath held his steps, his way have I kept, and not declined.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thou shalt remember all the way which the LORD thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no. Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his son, so the LORD thy God chasteneth thee. Therefore thou shalt keep the commandments of the LORD thy God, to walk in his ways, and to fear him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And thou shalt remember all the way which the Lord thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no. Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his son, so the Lord thy God chasteneth thee. Therefore thou shalt keep the commandments of the Lord thy God, to walk in his ways, and to fear him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By strength shall no man prevail.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will keep the feet of his saints, and the wicked shall be silent in darkness; for by strength shall no man prevail.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the Lord of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied. And David put his hand in his bag, and took thence a stone, and slang it. So David prevailed over the Philistine with a sling and with a stone.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the Lord of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied. And David put his hand in his bag, and took thence a stone, and slang it, and smote the Philistine in his forehead, that the stone sunk into his forehead; and he fell upon his face to the earth. So David prevailed over the Philistine with a sling and with a stone, and smote the Philistine, and slew him; but there was no sword in the hand of David.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength. Behold, the eye of the Lord is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength. Behold, the eye of the Lord is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Both riches and honour come of thee, and thou reignest over all; and in thine hand is power and might; and in thine hand it is to make great, and to give strength unto all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Both riches and honour come of thee, and thou reignest over all; and in thine hand is power and might; and in thine hand it is to make great, and to give strength unto all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me. Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is God which worketh in you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.
MORNING.verse_kjv: John answered and said, A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: And I will give them one heart, and one way, that they may fear me for ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will give them one heart, and one way, that they may fear me for ever, for the good of them, and of their children after them:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Do not err, my beloved brethren. Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning. Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth, that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Do not err, my beloved brethren.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In the way of thy judgments, O LORD, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee. With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O Lord, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee. With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I know that in me, (that is, in my flesh) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not. For I delight in the law of God after the inward man: but I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know that in me (that is, in my flesh,) dwelleth no good thing: for to will is present with me; but how to perform that which is good I find not. For I delight in the law of God after the inward man: But I see another law in my members, warring against the law of my mind, and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Our sufficiency is of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My grace is sufficient for thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
MORNING.verse_kjv: All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the Lord hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As by one man's disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For as by one man's disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: After that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared, not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost; which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour; that being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD our Righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In his days Judah shall be saved, and Israel shall dwell safely: and this is his name whereby he shall be called, THE Lord OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will be as the dew unto Israel.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The meekness and gentleness of Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence am base among you, but being absent am bold toward you:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench.
EVENING.verse_kjv: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised, to preach the acceptable year of the Lord. And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears. And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised, To preach the acceptable year of the Lord. And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter, and Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And Peter went out and wept bitterly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall feed his flock like a shepherd: he shall gather the lambs with his arm, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently lead those that are with young.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall feed his flock like a shepherd: he shall gather the lambs with his arm, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently lead those that are with young.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By love serve one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted. Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted. Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, if any of you do err from the truth, and one convert him; let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Brethren, if any of you do err from the truth, and one convert him; Let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be kindly affectioned one to another in brotherly love; in honour preferring one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ... that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The dust shall return to the earth as it was.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the dust return to the earth as it was: and the spirit shall return unto God who gave it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is sown in corruption; it is sown in dishonour; it is sown in weakness; it is sown a natural body.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The first man is of the earth, earthy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The first man is of the earth, earthy: the second man is the Lord from heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet. And another dieth in the bitterness of his soul, and never eateth with pleasure. They shall lie down alike in the dust, and the worms shall cover them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet. And another dieth in the bitterness of his soul, and never eateth with pleasure. They shall lie down alike in the dust, and the worms shall cover them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My flesh ... shall rest in hope.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord Jesus Christ shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ: Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is; that I may know how frail I am.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is; that I may know how frail I am.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the Lord than sacrifice.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the Lord than sacrifice.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God? Micah 6:8
MORNING.verse_kjv: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the Lord require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath the LORD as great delight in burnt offerings and sacrifices, as in obeying the voice of the LORD? Behold, to obey is better than sacrifice, and to hearken than the fat of rams.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And Samuel said, Hath the Lord as great delight in burnt offerings and sacrifices, as in obeying the voice of the Lord? Behold, to obey is better than sacrifice, and to hearken than the fat of rams.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: To love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And to love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Mary ... sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word. One thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word. But one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit shall return unto God who gave it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall the dust return to the earth as it was: and the spirit shall return unto God who gave it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There is a spirit in man; and the inspiration of the Almighty giveth them understanding.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But there is a spirit in man: and the inspiration of the Almighty giveth them understanding.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The first man Adam was made a living soul.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The spirit of man that goeth upward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who knoweth the spirit of man that goeth upward, and the spirit of the beast that goeth downward to the earth?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whilst we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord. We are confident.... and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore we are always confident, knowing that, whilst we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord: We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: With Christ; which is far better.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope. For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
EVENING.verse_kjv: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you. And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are more than conquerors through him that loved us. For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your life is hid with Christ in God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him? James 2:5
MORNING.verse_kjv: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace, Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The perfect law of liberty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin. If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage. For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage. For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another. For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth; but if the husband be dead, she is loosed from the law of her husband.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth; but if the husband be dead, she is loosed from the law of her husband.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let not your good be evil spoken of.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let not then your good be evil spoken of:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Providing for honest things, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Providing for honest things, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: For so is the will of God, that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For so is the will of God, that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters. Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters. Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Awake thou that steepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober. For they that sleep sleep in the night: and they that be drunken are drunken in the night. But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Arise, shine; for thy light is come, and the glory of the Lord is risen upon thee. For behold darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people, but the Lord shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Arise, shine; for thy light is come, and the glory of the Lord is risen upon thee. For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people: but the Lord shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning; and ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning; And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord is in the midst of thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath taken away thy judgments, he hath cast out thine enemy: the king of Israel, even the Lord, is in the midst of thee: thou shalt not see evil any more.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wait on the LORD: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I heard a great voice out of heaven, saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God. And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God. And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto the children of Israel, that they go forward.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said unto Moses, Wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto the children of Israel, that they go forward:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be of good courage, and let us behave ourselves valiantly for our people, and for the cities of our God: and let the LORD do that which is good in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be of good courage, and let us behave ourselves valiantly for our people, and for the cities of our God: and let the Lord do that which is good in his sight.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We made our prayer unto our God, and set a watch against them day and night.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Nevertheless we made our prayer unto our God, and set a watch against them day and night, because of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the Lord: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees. Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him: rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trees of righteousness, the planting of the LORD, that he might be glorified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planting of the Lord, that he might be glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone; in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto a holy temple in the Lord: in whom ye also are builded together for a habitation of God through the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And now, brethren, I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fight the good fight of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In nothing terrified by your adversaries.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou Tenderest to every man according to his work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ. If any man's work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward. If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ. If any man's work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward. If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ; that every one may receive the things done in his body, according to that he hath done, whether it be good or bad.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: When thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth: that thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth: That thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves; but our sufficiency is of God;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Make his praise glorious.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.
MORNING.verse_kjv: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me. And it shall be to me a name of joy, a praise and an honour before all the nations of the earth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me. And it shall be to me a name of joy, a praise and an honour before all the nations of the earth, which shall hear all the good that I do unto them: and they shall fear and tremble for all the goodness and for all the prosperity that I procure unto it.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore. For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore. For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is like unto thee, O LORD....
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is like unto thee, O Lord, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: They sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: By nature the children of wrath, even as others.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We ourselves also were sometime foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Job answered the LORD, and said, Behold, I am vile: what shall I answer thee? I will lay mine hand upon my mouth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Job answered the Lord, and said, Behold, I am vile; what shall I answer thee? I will lay mine hand upon my mouth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: David ... to whom also he gave testimony, and said, I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after mine own heart, which shall fulfil all my will.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And when he had removed him, he raised up unto them David to be their king; to whom also he gave testimony, and said, I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after mine own heart, which shall fulfil all my will.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I obtained mercy... who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others. Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus: who ... took upon him the form of a servant.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others. Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When Jesus ... saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled. Jesus wept.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled, Jesus wept.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye all of one mind, having compassion one of another, love as brethren, be pitiful, be courteous: not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Finally, be ye all of one mind, having compassion one of another, love as brethren, be pitiful, be courteous: Not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Son, go work to day in my vineyard.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But what think ye? A certain man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Reckon ye ... yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord. Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof. Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin; but yield yourselves unto God, as those that are alive from the dead, and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance: but as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation; because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now before the feast of the passover, when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father, having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine. And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them. I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil. They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine. And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them. I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends. Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends. Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ ... loved the church, and gave himself for it; that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it; That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The deep things of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have received, not the spirit of the world, but the Spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now we have received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.
