EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named, that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man that ye, being rooted and grounded in love, may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height; and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is the Spirit that quickeneth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The letter killeth, but the spirit giveth life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament; not of the letter, but of the spirit: for the letter killeth, but the spirit giveth life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: No man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump! Purge out therefore the old leaven. I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators. Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world. I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump? Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: In a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let us come boldly unto the throne of grace that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I have not spoken in secret, in a dark place of the earth: I said not unto the seed of Jacob, Seek ye me in vain: I the Lord speak righteousness, I declare things that are right.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore.... boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; and having an high priest over the house of God; let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the Son ... shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Brethren, we are not children of the bond-woman, but of the free.
EVENING.verse_kjv: So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is among you that feareth the LORD, that obeyeth the voice of his servant, that walketh in darkness, and hath no light? let him trust in the name of the LORD, and stay upon his God.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is among you that feareth the Lord, that obeyeth the voice of his servant, that walketh in darkness, and hath no light? let him trust in the name of the Lord, and stay upon his God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The commandment is a lamp, and the law is light.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the commandment is a lamp; and the law is light; and reproofs of instruction are the way of life:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the LORD shall be a light unto me. I will bear the indignation of the LORD, because I have sinned against him, until he plead my cause, and execute judgment for me: he will bring me forth to the light, and I shall behold his righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Rejoice not against me, O mine enemy: when I fall, I shall arise; when I sit in darkness, the Lord shall be a light unto me. I will bear the indignation of the Lord, because I have sinned against him, until he plead my cause, and execute judgment for me: he will bring me forth to the light, and I shall behold his righteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light. But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He shall feed his flock like a shepherd: he shall gather the lambs with his arm, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently lead those that are with young.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He shall feed his flock like a shepherd: he shall gather the lambs with his arm, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently lead those that are with young.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat: ... I will not send them away fasting, lest they faint in the way.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him, and said, I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat: and I will not send them away fasting, lest they faint in the way.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: They brought young children to him, and he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And they brought young children to him, that he should touch them: and his disciples rebuked those that brought them. And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will feed my flock, and I will cause them to lie down, saith the Lord GOD.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will feed my flock, and I will cause them to lie down, saith the Lord God.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He hath chosen us in Him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth: whereunto he called you. . . . to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you, brethren beloved of the Lord, because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren. Moreover whom he did predestinate, them he also called: and whom he called, them he also justified: and whom he justified, them he also glorified.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren. Moreover whom he did predestinate, them he also called: and whom he called, them he also justified: and whom he justified, them he also glorified.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you a heart of flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If the Lord would make windows in heaven might this thing be? II Kings 7:2
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then a lord on whose hand the king leaned answered the man of God, and said, Behold, if the Lord would make windows in heaven, might this thing be? And he said, Behold, thou shalt see it with thine eyes, but shalt not eat thereof.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Have faith in God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Without faith it is impossible to please God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: With God all things are possible.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? Isa 50:2
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man? when I called, was there none to answer? Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea, I make the rivers a wilderness: their fish stinketh, because there is no water, and dieth for thirst.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the Lord. For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways, and my thoughts than your thoughts.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Prove me now herewith, saith the LORD of hosts, if I will not open you the windows of heaven, and pour you out a blessing, that there shall not be room enough to receive it.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bring ye all the tithes into the storehouse, that there may be meat in mine house, and prove me now herewith, saith the Lord of hosts, if I will not open you the windows of heaven, and pour you out a blessing, that there shall not be room enough to receive it.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, the LORD'S hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, the Lord's hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: LORD, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Asa cried unto the Lord his God, and said, Lord, it is nothing with thee to help, whether with many, or with them that have no power: help us, O Lord our God; for we rest on thee, and in thy name we go against this multitude. O Lord, thou art our God; let not man prevail against thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We should not trust in ourselves, but in God which raiseth the dead.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God which raiseth the dead:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The days of thy mourning shall be ended.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the Lord shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In the world ye shall have tribulation.
MORNING.verse_kjv: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now. And not only they, but ourselves also, which have the firstfruits of the Spirit, even we ourselves groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now. And not only they, but ourselves also, which have the firstfruits of the Spirit, even we ourselves groan within ourselves, waiting for the adoption, to wit, the redemption of our body.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb, Therefore are they before the throne of God, and serve him day and night in his temple: and he that sitteth on the throne shall dwell among them. They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat. For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters; and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Master, carest thou not that we perish? Mark 4:38
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he was in the hinder part of the ship, asleep on a pillow: and they awake him, and say unto him, Master, carest thou not that we perish?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Every moving thing that liveth shall be meat for you; even as the green herb have I given you all things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Every moving thing that liveth shall be meat for you; even as the green herb have I given you all things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: While the earth remaineth, seed-time and harvest, and cold and heat, and summer and winter, and day and night, shall not cease.
EVENING.verse_kjv: While the earth remaineth, seedtime and harvest, and cold and heat, and summer and winter, and day and night shall not cease.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God heard the voice of the lad: and the angel of God called to Hagar out of heaven, and said unto her, What aileth thee, Hagar? fear not; for God hath heard the voice of the lad where he is. And God opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water; and she went, and filled the bottle with water, and gave the lad drink.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And God heard the voice of the lad; and the angel of God called to Hagar out of heaven, and said unto her, What aileth thee, Hagar? fear not; for God hath heard the voice of the lad where he is. And God opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water; and she went, and filled the bottle with water, and gave the lad drink.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, what shall we drink? for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Trust ... in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Your work of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Jesus answered and said unto them, This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Faith worketh by love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that soweth to his flesh, shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth. Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy of this calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness, and the work of faith with power.
MORNING.verse_kjv: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth; Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy of this calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness, and the work of faith with power:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where is the promise of his coming? II Pet 3:4
EVENING.verse_kjv: And saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Enoch ... the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints, to execute judgment upon all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him; and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men, teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Or let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There is no peace, saith the LORD, unto the wicked.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There is no peace, saith the Lord, unto the wicked.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In Christ Jesus ye who sometime were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ. For he is our peace.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ. For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: It pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell: and having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell; And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Christ Jesus: whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past: ... that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: if we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Trust ye in the LORD for ever, for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: As the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself. As the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself; For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live: and whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die. Believest thou this?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep. I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep. Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again. No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: No man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that hath the Son, hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God, hath not life.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God. When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God. When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: If ye live after the flesh, ye shall die: but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For if ye live after the flesh, ye shall die: but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body, ye shall live.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now the works of the flesh are manifest which are these; Adultery, fornication.... and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God. But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance: against such there is no law. And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts. If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men, teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world; looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ; who gave himself for us that he might redeem us from all iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Then said the princes of the Phillistines, What do these Hebrews here? I Sam 29:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: Then said the princes of the Philistines, What do these Hebrews here? And Achish said unto the princes of the Philistines, Is not this David, the servant of Saul the king of Israel, which hath been with me these days, or these years, and I have found no fault in him since he fell unto me unto this day?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye: for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified. But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief... or as a busy body in other men's matters.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified. But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let not ... your good be evil spoken of.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Let not then your good be evil spoken of:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness? Ye are the temple of the living God. Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness? And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people. Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people: that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I have loved thee with an everlasting love.
MORNING.verse_kjv: The Lord hath appeared of old unto me, saying, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him. Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: When the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law, to redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law, To redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father), full of grace and truth.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands. Serve the LORD with gladness; come before his presence with singing. Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Make a joyful noise unto the Lord, all ye lands. Serve the Lord with gladness: come before his presence with singing. Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He ... spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having yet ... one son, his well beloved, he sent him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men! Psa 107:21
EVENING.verse_kjv: Oh that men would praise the Lord for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My soul doth magnify the Lord, and my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord, And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As ye have ... received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him: rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That on the good ground are they, which in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, keep it, and bring forth fruit with patience.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But that on the good ground are they, which in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, keep it, and bring forth fruit with patience.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: By faith ye stand.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Not for that we have dominion over your faith, but are helpers of your joy: for by faith ye stand.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: He that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting. And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not. As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is able... to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me: and I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.
EVENING.verse_kjv: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Is any thing too hard for the LORD? Gen 18:14
EVENING.verse_kjv: Is any thing too hard for the Lord? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.
MORNING.verse_kjv: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Here have we no continuing city.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds, and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods, knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.
MORNING.verse_kjv: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He is our peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them; for he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
EVENING.verse_kjv: To wit, that God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation. For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself. And you that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, so making peace.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, so making peace;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Thy sins be forgiven thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: When Jesus saw their faith, he said unto the sick of the palsy, Son, thy sins be forgiven thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And they shall teach no more every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the Lord: for they shall all know me, from the least of them unto the greatest of them, saith the Lord: for I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who can forgive sins but God only? Mark 2:7
MORNING.verse_kjv: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
MORNING.verse_kjv: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. Blessed is the man unto whom the Lord imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity? Micah 7:18
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin. If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us. If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For sin shall not have dominion over you: for ye are not under the law, but under grace. Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: We would see Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The same came therefore to Philip, which was of Bethsaida of Galilee, and desired him, saying, Sir, we would see Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: O LORD, we have waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O Lord, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
EVENING.verse_kjv: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Lo, I am with you always even unto the end of the world.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Let us run with patience the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us, Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Beloved, now are we the sons of God; and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is. And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Understanding what the will of the Lord is.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is the will of God, even your sanctification.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: We ... do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory... give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him: the eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints, and what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Draw nigh to God, and be will draw nigh to you.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Enoch walked with God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Can two walk together, except they be agreed? Amos 3:3
EVENING.verse_kjv: Can two walk together, except they be agreed?

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: It is good for me to draw near to God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But it is good for me to draw near to God: I have put my trust in the Lord God, that I may declare all thy works.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The LORD is with you, while ye be with him: and if ye seek him, he will be found of you: but if ye forsake him, he will forsake you. When they in their trouble did turn unto the LORD God of Israel, and sought him, he was found of them.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And he went out to meet Asa, and said unto him, Hear ye me, Asa, and all Judah and Benjamin; The Lord is with you, while ye be with him; and if ye seek him, he will be found of you; but if ye forsake him, he will forsake you. But when they in their trouble did turn unto the Lord God of Israel, and sought him, he was found of them.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end. Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you. And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
EVENING.verse_kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, by a new and living way... and having an high priest over the house of God; let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: You, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight: if ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Sincere and without offence till the day of Christ.
MORNING.verse_kjv: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He will keep the feet of his saints.
EVENING.verse_kjv: He will keep the feet of his saints, and the wicked shall be silent in darkness; for by strength shall no man prevail.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth: but if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
EVENING.verse_kjv: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Jesus saith to him, He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit: and ye are clean, but not all.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths. When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble. Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men. Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away. Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee. Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established. Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.
EVENING.verse_kjv: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths. When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble. Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is thy life.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: The Lord thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the Lord thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: I bare you on eagles' wings, and brought YOU unto myself.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Ye have seen what I did unto the Egyptians, and how I bare you on eagles' wings, and brought you unto myself.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: In his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.
MORNING.verse_kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: so the LORD alone did lead him.
MORNING.verse_kjv: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: So the Lord alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Even to your old age I am he; and even to hoar hairs will I carry you: I have made, and I will bear; even I will carry, and will deliver you.
MORNING.verse_kjv: And even to your old age I am he; and even to hoar hairs will I carry you: I have made, and I will bear; even I will carry, and will deliver you.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: This God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
MORNING.verse_kjv: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. For your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

MORNING.verse_dailyLight: Hitherto hath the LORD helped us.
MORNING.verse_kjv: Then Samuel took a stone, and set it between Mizpah and Shen, and called the name of it Eben–ezer, saying, Hitherto hath the Lord helped us.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth yet very much land to be possessed.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Now Joshua was old and stricken in years; and the Lord said unto him, Thou art old and stricken in years, and there remaineth yet very much land to be possessed.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Be ye therefore perfect Matt 5:48
EVENING.verse_kjv: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge; and to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness; and to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment.
EVENING.verse_kjv: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love Him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit.
EVENING.verse_kjv: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: There remaineth ... a rest for the people of God.
EVENING.verse_kjv: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

EVENING.verse_dailyLight: Thine eyes shall see the King in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.
EVENING.verse_kjv: Thine eyes shall see the king in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.
